-  Each of a glass tube will be packed individually with bubble wrap for protection to ensure all in perfect conditions before shipment.

And that's all there is to it.

","Short Summary
People like to have green life on their desk and let their eyes soothed by all the greenery. With Woody, you have to get a few green stuff benefits for your eye health.
All of our products are made of natural environmentally friendly materials.  We want to brings the greenery and functional products to everyone.
We need the funding to support our innovation products.   Each of your contributions will help & support our new product concept come to life.
Woody with an ambient lamp that is great for building mood on the desk, bar table, living room.
Note: Woody is made of Pine Wood. Thus, the patterns & colors will be different features of each product.
In addition to contributing to our campaign, you can also help us by telling your friends and family by using the Indiegogo share tools. Thank you :)
We thank you in advance for your support!

Since the exact number of backers is unknown to us, so the timing may fall out of schedule a little. But we did leave ourselves with extra time already, and we will try to get ahead of time for each step, so don't worry. :)
Shipping is another potential problem as well. Should the shipping take way too long than regular time, we will assume the package is lost and resend the reward. Promises :)

We will arrange the refund if it is strongly insisted. There is no point in keeping the money from backers if they don't have our back anymore. We will do our best to meet backers' anticipation as we should, and hope the worst won't happen.
The tube is made of a glass.  All glasses item has chances to break during shipping.  Always beware a glass shattering while un-pack the packaging.  Keep away from small children.
-  Each of a glass tube will be packed individually with bubble wrap for protection to ensure all in perfect conditions before shipment.
And that's all there is to it.",9.0,0,"1 Campaign

Hello, my name is Liviu Cezar, I am an engineer, I have a master's degree in Energy at UTCB (Technical University of Civil Engineering Bucharest). I have been working for the last 7 years in a heating, ventilation and air conditioning company (HVAC). My dream is to build energy-independent houses, protect the environment by reducing the pollution due to the production of energy by burning coal and hydrocarbons and to teach people to build their own solar houses as well.
Expert tests have demonstrated that a small 3 kW solar power plant will save about 800 kg of CO2 per year - that is, the amount of CO2 emitted by a car that runs 10,000 kilometers or 6200 miles .

This system is being ideal for your own home. A photovoltaic power plant is in all ways a way of enriching a home, increasing its real estate value, having a particularly long life, and last but not least, the quality of life.
You can help me fulfill my dream, and I can help you to improve your life, the home you live in and together to do great things.

The approximate sum that I need to complete the first project is about $ 200,000. About half of the sum will go on buying the land on which the house will be built, and the other half on the building of the house and on the solar system itself.
After finishing the first solar house and capitalizing on it I will be able to buy land and build other houses that will be sold at affordable prices for future owners.

My perks for you will be unique. I will document each stage of the house construction and will send you all the details of the photovoltaic system and not only. I will answer your questions about the construction of the house and all the equipment used. Depending on the contribution of everyone, I will send my project (56 pages) in Romanian and English, T-shirts with the Solar Home logo and other rewards.
If I do not manage to raise the entire amount of money I will not give up, but I hope we will succeed together.

The production of the first solar cell in 1954 in American Bell's laboratories is, however, due to a happy happening. Employees of the firm under Morton Price have noticed when they searched for a silicon rectifier that produced more current when exposed to the sun. As a result, Bell, through Chapin, Fuller and Pearson, developed in 1953 the first silicon arsenic cells contaminated with arsenic but had a yield of only 4%, which was increased to 6% by changing impurities. In 1958, solar cells were tested for the first time on the Vanguard I satellite with a solar panel with 108 silicon solar cells. The results obtained were above expectations - to this day the space probes up to Mars are powered by electricity produced by electric photovoltaic panels, and in 2011 the space probe Juno was launched which is the first Jupiter spacecraft to be supplied with current produced by the cells solar.

The calculation for determining the electrical energy produced by photovoltaic panels was carried out in the PVGIS, SMA Sunny Design and PVSOL Expert programs.
For the calculations, the same type of solar panel (Schott Poly) with the same power (180 Wp) was used to compare the results obtained.

The calculation is performed for a number of 15 photovoltaic panels to be mounted on the roof of the house and will be oriented to the South coordinate at an angle of approximately 35.54 degrees as the roof slope is very close to the optimal angle of 35 degrees.
The estimate of the annual average of electricity produced by the photovoltaic system is 3100 kWh.
Nominal photovoltaic system power: 2.7 kWp (silicon)
column2: Estimated losses due to temperatures: 14.5% (relative to the ambient temperature in this area)
column3:
Other losses (cables, inverter): 14%
Photovoltaic system losses: 28.5%

column1: This is just a small part of the project and the calculations made. They can be rebuilt and calculated depending on the roof surface or other types of stronger panels can be chosen. They can also be mounted in the yard if there is space on special supports, and they can have an automatic system that tracks the sun's position throughout the day.

Such projects are important for reducing pollution and greenhouse gases and for being energy independent. I hope that together we will achieve as many such projects worldwide and thus have a major impact on the quality of life and the protection of the environment.
Even if you can not contribute to my campaign, please share and spread the word about Solar Home !!!

column2:
>In Insopol we have been fighting Climate Change for over 9 years

We are an energy company with disruptive solutions in the application of solar energy for Smart Cities.

The Idea

Insopol manufacture energetic solution for the environment by renewable systems integrated in the different elements of a city: buildings, street furniture, vehicles, etc. , to produce energy near the consumption and to reduce the CO2 emissions.

Patents

 Our patents are the integration (fusion) of the flexible solar panel with fiber reinforced resins. This total fusion allows us to give the desired shape to the product, so that it all behaves like a large solar panel.

In 2014 we went on the market after 4 years of research and development, and were awarded nationally (best Spanish invention) and internationally in several events in Geneva and Kuwait.

Now we need your help to develop our most ambitious project yet
column3:
>INSOPOL’S SOLAR CONTAINER

 

The camps are evolving, tents first, later prefabricated modules or containers, but don’t have minimal amenities, or guarantee them is very expensive with big energy generators.

From Insopol want to help in their solution by recycling maritime containers as emergency housing.

The solar container arises from the global emergency concern for living conditions in refugee camps, both climate and war conflicts, for the desire to make your stay more bearable, with minimal services to lead a decent life. (clean water, security, climate protection, electricity, toilets, schools, restrooms ...)

    The benefit of this action is quadruple
column4:
1.-WE RECYCLE MARITIME CONTAINERS THAT ARE NO LONGER USEFUL, GIVING SECOND USE.

2.-WE MANUFACTURE FROM THEM, MULTIFUNCTIONAL HABITABLE MODULES.

3.-WE WILL CREATE A HIGH OFFER OF JOBS AND THUS HELP PEOPLE TO PERFORM PERSONALLY AND WITH IT ALL THEIR SURROUNDINGS.

4.-WE ENDOW THEM, AUTONOMY POWER OF RENEWABLE  SOURCE.

     RESUME:

(1 + 2 + 3 + 4), RECYCLING MORE FUNCTIONALITY MORE RENEWABLE POWER) =

Our containers have integrated on the deck, flexible PV modules. May be do many different containers, and as a result, in addition to the cover, the solar panels will be integrated in the side walls (folding panels) or below deck (sliding panels). In this way, the solar power is tripled

So please, make a donation and you will contribute to make a more susteinable world
column5:
>All our Solar Containers will include a QR code where all our benefactors will be listed

column1: ""Sometimes reasonable men must do unreasonable things."" Marvin J. Heemeyer, 2004

Le Killdozer, c'est 85 tonnes de haine mécanique, de fonte, d’acier et de béton. C'est aussi plus de 400CV de poussée, pour démolir, détruire, écraser, piétiner.

Maintenant que le concept vous est familier, voici une brève introduction à l'histoire de l'homme, du génie visionnaire, derrière cette superbe création.

Marvin John Heemeyer, né le 28 octobre 1951 dans le Dakota du Sud et mort le 4 juin 2004 à Granby, Colorado, était un soudeur et propriétaire d'un magasin de silencieux automobiles américain. Il a construit et utilisé le « Killdozer », un bulldozer qu'il avait passé six mois à blinder dans le but de détruire la ville de Granby dans le Colorado le 4 juin 2004.

Il acquiert un terrain à Granby 1992, pour une somme particulièrement faible, étant donné que la zone était à l'abandon et peu propice à toute activité industrielle. Détail anodin pour le moment, mais crucial par la suite : le terrain n'a pas d'accès direct à la route, et Heemeyer est obligé d'emprunter le terrain mitoyen pour accéder à sa propriété – ce qui ne gêne absolument personne, puisque la parcelle est abandonnée, et appartient à la commune.

Malheureusement, son petit business fonctionnant particulièrement bien, la commune finit par comprendre que la zone abandonnée possède un potentiel à exploiter. Un beau jour, Mountain Park Concrete, une entreprise locale spécialisée dans la production de béton, vient donc s'installer sur la parcelle voisine de celle de Marvin. Ce dernier perd donc son seul accès à la route, et ne peut plus atteindre sa propriété sans autorisation de Mountain Park – ce qu'on lui refuse, évidemment.

Après avoir lancé des pétitions, épuisé tous les recours légaux possibles et imaginables, Marvin, de manière prévisible se retrouve broyé par l’implacable machine administrativo-technocrate. C’est dès lors qu’il envisage une fin d’histoire plus romanesque.

Parce que ce projet artistiquement engagé et hautement symbolique nous semble la meilleure réponse à une gestion déplorable de la crise sanitaire que nous subissons de plein fouet, aux mesures absurdes, grotesques et souvent contradictoires d’un gouvernement qui navigue à vue, parce qu’il représentera et portera mieux que n’importe qui la voix de la France périphérique, celle des ronds-points et des petits commerces que l’on assassine depuis de longs mois. C'est également pour toutes ces raisons que notre Killdozer sera baptisé ""Louis VI le Gros"", car il représentera la figure tutélaire qui manque aujourd'hui au peuple de France, démuni devant la perfidie de la ploutocratie technocrato-administrative.

Parce qu’enfin pour sa construction, nous allons solliciter et faire travailler de nombreux artisans, commerçants locaux (circuit court), personnes précaires, en recherche d’emploi ou en réinsertion.

Le Killdozer est LA réponse à tous vos soucis.
Vous trouverez ici une liste détaillée des besoins pour la construction du Killdozer et de l'ensemble des éléments destinés à en faire une véritable œuvre d'art sur chenilles.

Si le financement atteint plus de 500.000 €, nous opterons pour un modèle KOMATSU D375A ou équivalent, ce qui permettra de gagner en puissance moteur et en masse.
A partir de 800 000 €, nous pourrons alors commencer à nous intéresser au modèle KOMATSU D475A qui développe plus de 1000 CV pour 100 tonnes.

Il va de soi, en ces temps difficiles de Covid-19, que notre Killdozer sera construit dans le respect des gestes barrière et des valeurs de la République.
Un site web sera mis en place duquel vous pourrez suivre le développement et l'avancée du projet.

Le Killdozer, une fois achevé, sera expédié à la capitale. Cette œuvre magnifique servira à envoyer un message clair et percutant au gouvernement français. Ainsi, celui-ci bénéficiera, nous l'espérons, d'une belle exposition en paradant dans tout le 8ème arrondissement de Paris, puis, si cela est possible, nous déplacerons notre œuvre près des locaux de BFM TV et ceux de CNEWS. Un détour par les rédactions du Monde et de Libération serait un bonus.

Vous pouvez nous aider de multiples manières, soit en participant directement au financement de ce superbe projet, soit, si la macronie vous a déjà tout pris, en partageant massivement notre démarche sur internet et les réseaux sociaux.
Vous pouvez également vous faire connaitre si vous souhaitez proposer des améliorations, ou nous venir en aide par tout autre moyen en envoyant un message à lekilldozerfrancais@protonmail.com

The Killdozer is 85 tons of mechanical hatred, cast iron, steel and concrete. It is also more than 400CV of thrust, to demolish, destroy, crush, trample. Now that you are familiar with the concept, here is a brief introduction to the history of the man, the visionary genius, behind this superb creation.

Marvin John Heemeyer, born October 28, 1951 in South Dakota and died June 4, 2004 in Granby, Colorado was a welder and owner of an American auto muffler store. He built and used the ""Killdozer"", a bulldozer he had spent six months armouring in order to destroy the town of Granby, Colorado on June 4, 2004.

He acquired land in Granby 1992, for a particularly low sum, given that the area was abandoned and not very conducive to any industrial activity. Small detail for the moment, but crucial thereafter: the land has no direct access to the road, and Heemeyer is obliged to take the adjoining land to access his property - which absolutely does not bother anyone, since the plot is abandoned, and belongs to the municipality. Unfortunately, with its small business running particularly well, the town finally understood that the abandoned area had potential to be exploited.

One fine day, Mountain Park Concrete, a local company specializing in the production of concrete, comes to settle on the plot next to that of Marvin. The latter therefore loses his only access to the road, and can no longer reach his property without authorization from Mountain Park - which he is obviously refused.

After launching petitions, exhausting every possible legal remedy imaginable, Marvin predictably finds himself crushed by the implacable administrative-technocratic machine. It is therefore that he envisions a more romantic end to the story.

Because this artistically engaged and highly symbolic project seems to be the best response to the deplorable management of the health crisis that we are suffering head-on, to the absurd, grotesque and often contradictory measures of a government that sails on sight, because it will represent and carry better than anyone the voice of peripheral France, that of roundabouts and small businesses that have been murdered for many months.

It is also for all these reasons that our Killdozer will be baptized ""Louis VI the Fat"", because he will represent the tutelary figure which the people of France lack today, helpless before the perfidy of the technocratic-administrative plutocracy.
An finally, because for its construction, we are going to solicit and employ many craftsmen, local traders (short circuit), precarious people, looking for employment or reintegrating.
The Killdozer is THE answer to all your worries.
Here you will find a detailed list of the needs for the construction of the Killdozer and all the elements intended to make it a true work of art on tracks :

If the financing reaches more than 500,000 €, we will obtain for a KOMATSU D375A or equivalent model, which will make it possible to gain engine power and mass. From 800,000 €, we can then start to take an interest in the KOMATSU D475A model which develops more than 1000 HP for 100 tonnes.
It goes without saying, in these difficult times of Covid-19, that our Killdozer will be built with respect for barrier gestures and the values ​​of the Republic.

A website will be set up from which you can follow the development and progress of the project. The Killdozer, once completed, will be shipped to the capital. This magnificent work will serve to send a clear and powerful message to the French government. Thus, we hope, it will benefeat  a beautiful exhibition throughout the 8th arrondissement of Paris, then, if possible, we will move our art masterpiece near the premises of BFM TV and those of CNEWS. A detour by the editorial staff of Le Monde and Liberation would be a bonus.

You can help us in many ways, either by directly participating in the financing of this superb project, or, if the government has already taken everything from you, by massively sharing our approach on the internet and social networks. You can also make yourself known if you wish to suggest improvements, or help us by any other means by sending a message to lekilldozerfrancais@protonmail.com
","""Sometimes reasonable men must do unreasonable things."" Marvin J. Heemeyer, 2004

This magnificent work will serve to send a clear and powerful message to the French government. Thus, we hope, it will benefeat  a beautiful exhibition throughout the 8th arrondissement of Paris, then, if possible, we will move our art masterpiece near the premises of BFM TV and those of CNEWS. A detour by the editorial staff of Le Monde and Liberation would be a bonus.

You can help us in many ways, either by directly participating in the financing of this superb project, or, if the government has already taken everything from you, by massively sharing our approach on the internet and social networks. You can also make yourself known if you wish to suggest improvements, or help us by any other means by sending a message to lekilldozerfrancais@protonmail.com",2.0,0,"1 Campaign

","Everyone deserves an affordable home The future is affordable, sustainable housing……….that keeps on giving! Join the trail-blazing movement that's impacting present and future generations.

column1: Live off the grid - Solar PV and battery bank system
Save money - optimize water, heating and hydro costs
Live and eat healthily - eliminate air pollutants
Benefit from community training and job opportunities
Over 30% of the Canadian population live below the poverty line and can’t afford food, energy and other basic necessities.
1.6 million Canadian households live in unsuitable, inadequate or unaffordable dwellings, and can’t afford alternative housing in their community.

The Ontario government and the agricultural  community have struggled to respond to the increasing food demands in local and rural Indigenous communities. Although the economy is recovering, many families are still struggling to put food on the table.

This needs to change. You can help drive this change!PFWCES’s revolutionary vision of building a sustainable zero-emission housing market brings individuals, families and communities together with clear social, economical and environmental benefits for all. What is the PFWCES program?

Affordable solar-powered housing units for working individuals, families and building communities in Canada and across the globe that provide energy savings and reduces the carbon footprint.  The first community opportunity is located in Colborne Ontario, the Township of Cramahe with other locations are being sighted for possibilities.
The floor plan of an innovative solar-powered housing unit.
Aquaponic agricultural program with a ‘no waste’ food agenda to increase the availability of food for residents.
How the agricultural program achieves zero-waste.

Training and education for individuals  and families in trades and techology resulting in greater food security, job opportunities and sustainable living. Training in trades and technologies increase skills and job opportunities for residents.
A ‘Mini Market’ with a shared community approach that enables residents to earn income.  Earn extra income with our community market.

Creating and embracing partnerships with community leaders, electoral leaders and investors that identifies innovative solutions to affordable housing and food security challenges.By working together, we move forward as a community, as families and as individuals. Building sustainable housing communities takes funding. So far, five (5) organizations have chosen to joint venture with PFWCES to make a difference to the lives of individuals and families who desperately need affordable housing.Join the journey! By donating to the program, you’re driving the change to a kinder, fairer and more compassionate society.With your gift, you are creating affordable, sustainable housing and communities with greater opportunities. You’re making lives better for individuals and families who need a little help. Donate and create a brighter future!
We want to thank you in advance for believing in us. Together we can create a brighter future for our loved ones and Mother Earth!",5.0,0,"1 Campaign

Hi!   I’m Lynn.   I have been a dental hygienist for almost 20 years and have loved (almost) every minute of it.  My husband, Steven, is a handy man and has been in the building/repair business for 30 years.   We both enjoy the way we have been able to help people, albeit in different ways, and want to continue to do so for the rest of our days…

With that said, the physical demand that we both experience on a daily basis has played it toll on us both.  We have back and neck pain that we manage on a daily basis.  So after many conversations about what we can do for the next chapter of our working lives, we agree that we need to find another way to give to our community.   We feel like the way we want to do this is to help people in dealing with end of life of their beloved pets.  We have found aqua cremation as a way for us to do this.  Being eco-friendly is very important to us and this is the most gentle and eco-friendly way to see our furry loved ones off.  The process is much kinder than fire cremation and does not have any toxic bi-products and there is almost no loss of bone tissue as a result.

After the recession hit our economy in the late 2000’s, we experienced a hit to our savings that cost us our retirement savings to survive and then sadly, we lost our home to foreclosure.  We have been working to rebuild, but unfortunately all of our hard work has simply kept our heads above water.  So, in order for us to make our new dream come true, we will need help to purchase the equipment necessary to do the work as well as obtain a space to rent  to work in.

We thank you for your assistance to help us get that dream started!   Donations from you will go towards purchasing the equipment and renting the space to get us started to build our business.  For your donation, we would love to send you a thank you.  For $ 100.00, we will send you a t-shirt to celebrate our green business and your love for your pet.   For $ 250.00 we will send you a t-shirt and a discount of 50% off the disposal of your pet, if you are in the greater Orlando, FL area, or a decorative urn for future use if you are not in Orlando.  For $ 500.00 we will send you a t-shirt AND a free disposal of your pet INCLUDING a decorative urn if you are in the Orlando, FL area.

Introducing Me

I am the sole owner of the company and its driving force. I am a twenty-year old entrepreneur who seeks to make affordable, healthy, and organic produce for all. The vertical farming dream has been one which I have obsessed over for many years until I believed (finally) that it was possible.

At risk of a cliché, a man once said ""I want to think about a future and not be sad"". I too believe that this should be a motivation for all. Vertical farming is a practice which I envision to be part of our future if I am to be happy. Without it, overpopulation will generate unparalelled pressures on our Earth, and I intend to change that.

 

The goal

The business intends to set up and manage a vertical farming network that spans the United Kingdom, and in the future beyond. Vertical Veg requires a single farm to begin its crusade against unsustainability, its odyssey to affordable and clean eating. Affordable and organic leafy greens are an envisioned staple for all, where one's wage does not dictate health. Organic food at inorganic prices makes affordable the product that I would like to sell in a way that only vertical farming can achieve. The mathematics work and so will I to achieve my vision. Conventional agriculture is inherently damaging to our health and the health of our planet, vertical agriculture seeks to lift that burden while providing great tasting and fresh food. The money will be used as maturing capital for the company's setup, and is designed to demonstrate support for the idea when we seek investors in the near future.

 

My brand is young, much like me. But let that not be a source of worry, but a driving force in helping to change the world. My company does not have to pander to invested interests
column2:
the only invested interest it works for is mine, and that, I have explained to you.

 

I am ready, are you?

column1: Hello. We're a small group of scientists and professionals who are petrified about the damage humans are doing to our planet.
⚔️ We are fighting two major problems:
• The damage plastic-waste is causing to wildlife in the oceans and on land.
• The damage our excessive use of fossil-fuels is doing to our health and the climate.
With your help, this Crowdfund will help build an ecoPlant that can turn non-recyclable waste-plastic, into an ultra-clean fuel. It can clean our oceans of plastic, and our air of poisonous gases.
A massive thanks for reading further, from the team:

column2:
>

In 2019 the world will use 500 million more barrels of oil fossil-fuels than it used last year! This is pouring more and more CO2 and other poisonous gasses into our air, dramatically changing our climate.

column1: Change is needed, but it's not happening. Why?
Put simply, it costs far too much money (£/$/¥/€) to replace all the vehicles &
column2: machines in the world today that are using dirty fossil fuels, so people and companies are just not doing it fast enough.

column1: What if we could replace the dirty fossil-fuel instead?

We've designed a process to create ULTRA-CLEAN-FUEL that burns with negligible nitrogen (N0x) and sulphur (S0x) emissions. The fuel works on CURRENT vehicles, and produces c.50% less CO2 than traditional fossil-fuels.

column2: >(NOx and SOx are the emissions that cause breathing difficulties and early death from pollution. The United Nations (UN) states we need to reduce our CO2 by 50% in the next 10 years to stop catastrophic damage from climate change.)

column1: Oh... and the ultra-clean fuel is made ENTIRELY from non-recyclable plastics too! So it helps remove the world of waste-plastic which ends up in our ocean.

column2: >The team on-site from a previous plant.

>This crowd-fund can help fund the completion of the final due-diligence for the project. On completion (and if successful) this will unlock the pre-arranged funding to build the complete the 1st ecoPlant.
>In short, this crowd-fund can provide the final funding for us to build the first ecoPlant together!

column1: Using a new (and already commercially tested) scientific technology called 'ThermoCatalytic Pyrolysis', together we'll build an ecoPlant that can turn non-recyclable waste-plastics into ULTRA-clean fuel.
• The ecoPlant is designed to have 24/7 operation, and a 40-tonne/day capacity of waste-plastic. That will produce thousands upon thousands of litres of ultra-clean-fuel every DAY!

column2: >➡️ That's enough to fill roughly 500 cars with ultra clean fuel, and remove over 2 MILLION plastic bottles - EVERY DAY! ⬅️

column1: • Our automatic plastic feeding and discharging system means that unlike traditional recycling waste-plastic systems, WE DO NOT need to sort or check plastics before entering our ecoPlant, reducing cost and increasing production of the ultra-clean fuel.
• The ecoPlant creates enough power to power itself. There is no incineration process, meaning negligible emissions in production

column2: >The ThermoCatalytic Pyrolysis process does not burn/incinerate plastic. It is a clean &amp
column3: green ecologically friendly process that turns non-recyclable waste-plastic into ultra-clean fuel

column1: ...We really mean it! Today's recycling plants cannot take 90% of all plastic produced. Worse, if the 10% of the remaining 'good-plastic' isn't clean (or if it is contaminated with stuff such as food) it also has to be sent to landfill, be incinerated or shipped abroad (which can end up in our oceans).
✅ There are 7 different types of plastic, this ecoPlant can take them all!
• Plastic packaging, agricultural film, food and beverage containers. Single use &
• Even including types of plastic that have high oil yield: PP, PS, LDPE, HDPE
• Some plastic contaminated? Metal slipped in? No problem. The ecoPlant can still work with up to 10% non-plastics in every load.
...And what comes out the other end?
⭐ How will this help clean the planet?
The ULTRA-clean fuel produced can be used in all today's commercial and residential vehicles and machinery. This means businesses can switch overnight to a cleaner solution.
The world wants to be greener - This provides business who rely on significant amount of dirty-fuel usage to make an immediate positive impact to their carbon footprint.
There's strong demand for it - The UK renewables and waste-to-energy market is set to reach £425bn by 2020. Together we can move people to ultra-clean energy.
Government-backed Initiative - Governments worldwide continue to invest in the green government- backed renewables energy sector,.

column2: clean-fuel market is here to stay. It's commercially tested and  solves two global problems at once.

column1: We've designed the ecoPlants to have real impact, just see below:

We're a small team (Andrew, Adel, Marina, Fernando, and Bertie) who are power-plant, energy, commodities and business professionals.  Between us, over the last 20 years we've built dozens of industrial plants around the world, and traded billions of dollars in commodities - we know the space.

We also have the leading professional in this recycling process, as a founding member of this project. Andrew holds a PHD (doctorate), which was directly focussed on the processes of making non-recyclable waste plastic into ultra-clean fuel.
In 2008 Andrew was the senior member on the team that designed and built a pilot-plant of this technology in Spain, which still runs today!

It's been a long journey. Over the last 10 years the ThermoCatalytic Pyrolysis technology has improved, which means we are now ready to launch our latest and newest plant which we believe can change the world.
We have bundles experience - the experience to build and run the equipment, plus all the technology, patents &
We now need your support and backing to complete the final due-diligence and 3rd party tests which will enable us to unlock the full funding to launch the plant.
As we mentioned earlier, it costs money to save our planet, which is the main reason humans just aren't doing it. It also costs money to build a CPE ecoPlant.
The fundraising from this crowd-fund is being used to complete the core Due-Diligence which is required to unlock the next £10M - the full cost to build the ecoPlant
✔️ The initial crowd-fund will be used to complete:
• Pre-Permits Application Discussion (PAD) with Municipal Councils and Environmental Agency
• Finalize equipment agreements with technology providers (we are building some of the tech ourselves plus will use third-party tech)
• Secure lease of site. (we have chosen 3 candidate sites at the time of writing)
• Finalise feedstock agreements with local counsels (who are overrun with plastic)
• Finalise Off taker agreements with (the people/companies that will use our fuel).
• Final project funding which will allow us to complete the ecoPlant.
We commit to update you on our process every 6-8 weeks (and answer as many of your questions in between).
What about over funding? If we are lucky enough to get the support that takes us beyond our goal, we'll continue looking for support to help build more and more ecoPlants.
The team out and about in the midst of the #ClimateChange protests in London (April 2019)

Between the lead members of the team (Andrew, Adel, Marina, Fernando, and Bertie) we've been fortunate to have had the experience of building over dozens of industrial plants over the last 20 years, trading $billions of commodities, running energy companies and successful businesses. We believe this experience puts this crowd-fund project in good hands.
However, no matter how much experience, the project does hold some risks. Here they are and how we are going to mitigate them:

Risk 1: Competition: there are no plants like ours in the UK yet (the location of the first plant). Whilst we're confident the world has space for many ecoPlants from both ourselves and competitors, we need to make sure the feedstock (waste-plastic) is available in the local area we're going to build them.

Risk 2: The price of fuel might fall, diminishing our ability to invest and run the plant economically. However, as long as oil is above $25 per barrel the ecoPlant can run. ( $25 is a very low number, it’s over double that amount now and was 5 times that amount 4 years ago)
Risk 3: Power outages, fires, other hazards. We have insurance that covers all that, but we need to take extra care to make sure the ecoPlant is built to the highest standards

Risk 4: Our DD is not successful . There is always a chance there are key areas of the DD which are not successful and we may have a delay in unlocking the full funding we have agreed in principle. Should this be the case we believe the crowd-fund has enough contingency to mitigate and sort these issues, but until the DD is complete it is unknown. Over the last 18 months we have done everything we can to prepare for this crowd-fund.
⭐Other ways you can help and learn more
If you back us, we'll be updating you regularly via IndieGoGo, however we're also keen to share this with the wider world. Please help share our YouTube video and Website with the below links:
And that's all there is to it.
column6: > - A massive thank you for your backing from the lead team members, Andrew, Adel, Marina, Fernando, and Bertie
column8:
>

","Hello. We're a small group of scientists and professionals who are petrified about the damage humans are doing to our planet.

column1: ⚔️ We are fighting two major problems:
The damage plastic-waste is causing to wildlife in the oceans and on land.
The damage our excessive use of fossil-fuels is doing to our health and the climate.
With your help, this Crowdfund will help build an ecoPlant that can turn non-recyclable waste-plastic, into an ultra-clean fuel. It can clean our oceans of plastic, and our air of poisonous gases.
A massive thanks for reading further, from the team:

In 2019 the world will use 500 million more barrels of oil fossil-fuels than it used last year! This is pouring more and more CO2 and other poisonous gasses into our air, dramatically changing our climate.
Change is needed, but it's not happening. Why?

Put simply, it costs far too much money (£/$/¥/€) to replace all the vehicles & machines in the world today that are using dirty fossil fuels, so people and companies are just not doing it fast enough.
What if we could replace the dirty fossil-fuel instead?

We've designed a process to create ULTRA-CLEAN-FUEL that burns with negligible nitrogen (N0x) and sulphur (S0x) emissions. The fuel works on CURRENT vehicles, and produces c.50% less CO2 than traditional fossil-fuels.

(NOx and SOx are the emissions that cause breathing difficulties and early death from pollution. The United Nations (UN) states we need to reduce our CO2 by 50% in the next 10 years to stop catastrophic damage from climate change.)
Oh... and the ultra-clean fuel is made ENTIRELY from non-recyclable plastics too! So it helps remove the world of waste-plastic which ends up in our ocean.
The team on-site from a previous plant.

This crowd-fund can help fund the completion of the final due-diligence for the project. On completion (and if successful) this will unlock the pre-arranged funding to build the complete the 1st ecoPlant.
In short, this crowd-fund can provide the final funding for us to build the first ecoPlant together!

Using a new (and already commercially tested) scientific technology called 'ThermoCatalytic Pyrolysis', together we'll build an ecoPlant that can turn non-recyclable waste-plastics into ULTRA-clean fuel.
The ecoPlant is designed to have 24/7 operation, and a 40-tonne/day capacity of waste-plastic. That will produce thousands upon thousands of litres of ultra-clean-fuel every DAY!
➡️ That's enough to fill roughly 500 cars with ultra clean fuel, and remove over 2 MILLION plastic bottles - EVERY DAY! ⬅️

Our automatic plastic feeding and discharging system means that unlike traditional recycling waste-plastic systems, WE DO NOT need to sort or check plastics before entering our ecoPlant, reducing cost and increasing production of the ultra-clean fuel.
The ecoPlant creates enough power to power itself. There is no incineration process, meaning negligible emissions in production
column2: It really is an ECO plant!

column1: The ThermoCatalytic Pyrolysis process does not burn/incinerate plastic. It is a clean & green ecologically friendly process that turns non-recyclable waste-plastic into ultra-clean fuel

...We really mean it! Today's recycling plants cannot take 90% of all plastic produced. Worse, if the 10% of the remaining 'good-plastic' isn't clean (or if it is contaminated with stuff such as food) it also has to be sent to landfill, be incinerated or shipped abroad (which can end up in our oceans).
✅ There are 7 different types of plastic, this ecoPlant can take them all!
Plastic packaging, agricultural film, food and beverage containers. Single use & non-recyclable
Even including types of plastic that have high oil yield: PP, PS, LDPE, HDPE
Some plastic contaminated? Metal slipped in? No problem. The ecoPlant can still work with up to 10% non-plastics in every load.
...And what comes out the other end?
IN goes non-recyclable waste-plastic... OUT comes:
⭐ How will this help clean the planet?
The ULTRA-clean fuel produced can be used in all today's commercial and residential vehicles and machinery. This means businesses can switch overnight to a cleaner solution.
The world wants to be greener - This provides business who rely on significant amount of dirty-fuel usage to make an immediate positive impact to their carbon footprint.
There's strong demand for it - The UK renewables and waste-to-energy market is set to reach £425bn by 2020. Together we can move people to ultra-clean energy.
Government-backed Initiative - Governments worldwide continue to invest in the green government- backed renewables energy sector,.
Proven Ground-breaking Technology - The waste-to-energy & clean-fuel market is here to stay. It's commercially tested and  solves two global problems at once.
We've designed the ecoPlants to have real impact, just see below:

We're a small team (Andrew, Adel, Marina, Fernando, and Bertie) who are power-plant, energy, commodities and business professionals.  Between us, over the last 20 years we've built dozens of industrial plants around the world, and traded billions of dollars in commodities - we know the space.

We also have the leading professional in this recycling process, as a founding member of this project. Andrew holds a PHD (doctorate), which was directly focussed on the processes of making non-recyclable waste plastic into ultra-clean fuel.
In 2008 Andrew was the senior member on the team that designed and built a pilot-plant of this technology in Spain, which still runs today!

It's been a long journey. Over the last 10 years the ThermoCatalytic Pyrolysis technology has improved, which means we are now ready to launch our latest and newest plant which we believe can change the world.
We have bundles experience - the experience to build and run the equipment, plus all the technology, patents & processes ready to go.
We now need your support and backing to complete the final due-diligence and 3rd party tests which will enable us to unlock the full funding to launch the plant.
As we mentioned earlier, it costs money to save our planet, which is the main reason humans just aren't doing it. It also costs money to build a CPE ecoPlant.
The fundraising from this crowd-fund is being used to complete the core Due-Diligence which is required to unlock the next £10M - the full cost to build the ecoPlant
✔️ The initial crowd-fund will be used to complete:
Pre-Permits Application Discussion (PAD) with Municipal Councils and Environmental Agency
Finalize equipment agreements with technology providers (we are building some of the tech ourselves plus will use third-party tech)
Secure lease of site. (we have chosen 3 candidate sites at the time of writing)
Finalise feedstock agreements with local counsels (who are overrun with plastic)
Finalise Off taker agreements with (the people/companies that will use our fuel).
Final project funding which will allow us to complete the ecoPlant.
We commit to update you on our process every 6-8 weeks (and answer as many of your questions in between).
What about over funding? If we are lucky enough to get the support that takes us beyond our goal, we'll continue looking for support to help build more and more ecoPlants.
The team out and about in the midst of the #ClimateChange protests in London (April 2019)

Between the lead members of the team (Andrew, Adel, Marina, Fernando, and Bertie) we've been fortunate to have had the experience of building over dozens of industrial plants over the last 20 years, trading $billions of commodities, running energy companies and successful businesses. We believe this experience puts this crowd-fund project in good hands.
However, no matter how much experience, the project does hold some risks. Here they are and how we are going to mitigate them:

Risk 1: Competition: there are no plants like ours in the UK yet (the location of the first plant). Whilst we're confident the world has space for many ecoPlants from both ourselves and competitors, we need to make sure the feedstock (waste-plastic) is available in the local area we're going to build them.

Risk 2: The price of fuel might fall, diminishing our ability to invest and run the plant economically. However, as long as oil is above $25 per barrel the ecoPlant can run. ( $25 is a very low number, it’s over double that amount now and was 5 times that amount 4 years ago)
Risk 3: Power outages, fires, other hazards. We have insurance that covers all that, but we need to take extra care to make sure the ecoPlant is built to the highest standards

Risk 4: Our DD is not successful . There is always a chance there are key areas of the DD which are not successful and we may have a delay in unlocking the full funding we have agreed in principle. Should this be the case we believe the crowd-fund has enough contingency to mitigate and sort these issues, but until the DD is complete it is unknown. Over the last 18 months we have done everything we can to prepare for this crowd-fund.
⭐Other ways you can help and learn more
If you back us, we'll be updating you regularly via IndieGoGo, however we're also keen to share this with the wider world. Please help share our YouTube video and Website with the below links:
And that's all there is to it.   - A massive thank you for your backing from the lead team members, Andrew, Adel, Marina, Fernando, and Bertie",20.0,0,"1 Campaign

MOST EFFECTIVE, PATENTED CAT LITTER THAT SAVES NATURE - PURR-fect HARMONY: Good for the earth, Good for the People, and Loved by Cats who prefer sandy, odor free litter 

NATURE DAMAGING CLAY AND BENTONITE REPLACED BY ACTIVATED CARBON AND NATURAL CLUMPING AGENT WE CONSUME EVERY DAY

Please see www.terfalitter.ca. I own personally the IP of the product PURR-fect HARMONY. The product was successfully sold in the market in US in pilot production scale in 2013-2014 with funding from private investor for manufacturing.

Instead of bringing the product to market myself, I am licensing the product to large global company. The process was started in February and I have vast interest with many doing due-diligence on the opportunity. Companies are all very excited on licensing the product that will be the first really new and revolutionary pet litter product in the market for years. Feedback from pet stores and cat owners is exceptionally great.    

Funding needed

I look for 60,000 US Dollars to cover manufacturing and legal costs to bring the product to retailers in US, Canada and elsewhere.  The product will be introduced to pet stores, convenience stores and gas stations and soon to big box stores. US market is close to 4 Billion dollars, solid and unified.

The Impact

My product PURR-fect HARMONY is strongly patented &
column2:
trademarked. It  will replace clay-based and bentonite products that have 90% or market worldwide by company who is chosen as the licensee.

PURR-fect Harmony has all the benefits of clay litter but at lower dust, light weight, better absorbency, low raw material and manufacturing costs, naturally anti-bacterial, highly odor controlled,  emission free, safe and effective eco-friendly technology made from over 85% recycled materials. Production will reduce landfill and not only that the product is an activated carbon that can be used as a fertilizer after cat use in garden, flowers, plants and trees. In other words it is not going to landfill as clay and bentonite  litters do: Five Billion Pounds of clay go to landfill every year in US only and never decompose. My product received endorsements and Green America Certification already.

Product is patented till 2030.

Your contribution to this project will reduce fly ash landfills and in addition reduce strip-mining and landfills of nature harming substances, clay and bentonite, worldwide. My product has a sodium alginate as clumping agent as part of the patents, a compound we all use daily in food every day. 

Feedback from pet stores and cat owners received has been magnificent:

Store Manager at Kibbles &
column4:
Cuts Stansbury Park

Oh my gosh that would be amazing if we got that back on the market. I manage a dog and cat specialty shop. I had used everything on the market as far as ethically produced products go but my cats never liked the feel of the corn based litters and would not use the litter box. When we brought on purrfect harmony the fact that is was made from recycled material and was helping the environment but still had the clay feel to it is what made me decide to try it. Within the first week of using it all my litter box issues went away and my cats loved it. The odor control was impressive, the clumping was amazing. My customers loved the product so much I had a hard time keeping it in stock. My best wishes to you, I can't wait for it to come back out.

Cat owner and user of PURR-fect HARMONY, Sandpoint, Idaho

Yes, I did use the product and really enjoyed it. The cat litter was by far the best I have used.

Healthy Pets Mountain West, Cottonwood Heights

Yes we sold the litter in our store, it was a big seller in fact we had customers asking for it long after we were not able to get it anymore.

Rockstar Pets, USA

We did very well with PURR-fect Harmony litter, I really hope you can bring it back. That was a while ago, so I'm not sure what I can do for customer testimonial, but nearly all of my employees used it and we bought a lot out of the remaining stock when it folded.

Risks &
column5:
Challenges

My product has already been in the market and pet store owners, cat owners and cats loved it (www.terfalitter.ca). PURR-fect HARMONY is Clean and Green. Good for the earth, good for the people
column6:
loved by cats, who prefer sandy, odor free litter. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Should you decide not to contribute yourself to financing my project, I appreciate your help in making connections  with people you know and who would be likely to become investors and collaborate with me to get this product to US and Canadian markets first and subsequently to other large markets. 

Indiegogo shearing tools are available for you for this purpose.

Looking for more information or have a question? See the FAQ

column1: Our story at Algas Organics, is quite different.

Since 2011, increasingly severe influxes of Sargassum seaweed continually affect St. Lucia (our home base) and 18 other Caribbean territories. This invasive species floats in and complete inundates the coast, as seen above, for up to 8 months of the year, resulting in:
• Mass killings of marine life, including turtles.
• Exposure of thousands of coastal residents to high concentrations of hydrogen sulfide, emitted by decomposing Sargassum seaweed, posing a serious health threat.
St. Lucia and other affected islands depend heavily on tourism. Imagine paying $3,000 for that Caribbean get away and arriving on beaches looking like this. Would you come back? Exactly.

Algas Organics was founded in 2014, by then 21 year old entrepreneur Johanan Dujon, with the vision to solve this problem, by creating a line of world class, organic, bio-fertilizers from Sargassum seaweed.
Johanan developed a proprietary, energy neutral process, after 12 months of extensive experimentation. Through this process, Algas Organics has successfully created a system which:
1. Keeps beaches clean by harvesting Sargassum seaweed.
2. Rather than dumping seaweed in a landfill, converts it into organic fertilizer for export.
3. Empowers women and youth in affected communities, through employment opportunities in the collection and processing  of Sargassum seaweed.
To date, the company has processed over 3 million pounds of Sargassum into its flagship product, the Algas Total Plant Tonic for export to the Caribbean region.
With your support, we will scale up our impact, create additional jobs and supply every corner of the globe with high quality, cost effective,bio-fertilizer.
Using seaweed as fertilizer isn't new. It's been done for hundreds of years and even today.

Although marketed under different brands, 99% of seaweed fertilizers available today, are made from Ascophyllum Nodosom, a cold water species which grows in Norway, Ireland, UK and the eastern coast of Canada. If you've used one, you've used all.

The Total Plant Tonic is derived from  a totally different and superior, Sargassum Natans and Fluitans species, from the Caribbean. This unique seaweed in combination with our patent-pending, energy neutral extraction technology, put our product in a league of its own. Naturally occurring growth hormones and amino acids are extracted in an eco-friendly manner, maintaining their molecular integrity. This provides plants with the highest quality nutrition.
The secret to healthier plants, more flowers and more fruits, is in your roots !
Algas Total Plant Tonic stimulates the exact root system your plants need to thrive in their unique soil and growing conditions. Talk about precision agriculture !
A better root system allows your plants to absorb more water and nutrients, for optimum growth.

Are your plants stunted? Does your garden look neglected? Have a plant that isn't flowering or bearing fruit? Or just want to make your neighbours, fellow farmers, gardeners, landscapers jealous? Use Algas !

column2: >Results You Can See, Every Time, On Any Plant.

column1: To get your plants growing like never before, follow these simple steps:
1. Fill your watering can, backpack sprayer, boom sprayer or mixing tank with water.
2. Mix 1-2 Tbsp (15-30ml) of Algas Total Plant Tonic per gallon of water.

column2: >Our Goal: Why Are We On Indiegogo?

column1: To date, we've developed and utilized a patent-pending proprietary process to convert Sargassum seaweed into world class, organic, bio-fertilizer. This product has been tested by independent research companies in the Caribbean and USA, as well as ISO 9000 certified laboratories.
We've also tested the ability of our system to managing/converting Sargassum seaweed into a product that people love.

Now that now this is down to a science, our objective is to scale up operations to the next level, allowing us to get this revolutionary product into more hands and increase our impact in terms of job creation and Sargassum harvested.
The goal is $300,000 for this campaign, which will allow us to:
1. Expand our modest factory space from 1200ft2 (the size of a condo) to 5,000ft2 (an actual factory).
2. Modernize operations: upgrade filling, capping, induction sealing and labeling machines.
3. Create an additional 15 jobs for women and youth along St. Lucia's east coast.
4. Harvest and process 2.7 million pounds of Sargassum per year, making a serious dent on the problem locally.
For your assistance in helping us maximize our impact, you will receive the perk of 30% off the retail price of the Algas Total Plant Tonic.
The top 3 contributors will receive additional perk of a trip &
column2: hotel accommodation to the beautiful island St. Lucia (https://www.worldtravelawards.com/news-2627) for 3 nights, allowing for unparalleled relaxation and first hand viewing of our work on managing Sargassum seaweed.

column1: Algas Organics is proud to be a family run, for profit, social enterprise. Meet our team.
Share this campaign on Facebook, Instagram and Twitter !
Powered by Innovation & Mother Nature, Not Fossil Fuels.

Recently, I was working on an unrelated project, and needed to create a power generator or engine with some serious oomph. My research brought me to various model engines like gasoline airplane, Stirling, and steam engines. All of them were off the shelf and hard to build or scale. Also, those engines’ designs were old, and the only ones available were cheap imitations or antiques that needed restoration.

Then, I noticed some early models of 3D printed air power engines. I started building them from publicly available plans and nothing worked. Before I knew it, I was deeply involved with designing various models for myself that were finally operational.
Now, a few months later, I have several very nice engines and many prototypes that I am giving away to my friends. This hobby is so much fun that I decided to share my designs with the world.

Currently, I have four working models and am developing several new engines. My plan is to raise enough funds to buy ten 3D printers and start production in early December, before the campaign is over. This way, I can start delivering rewards before New Year. That is why it is very important to get funding early.
We need about $5000 to pay for printers and materials to get started delivering our unique engines to you.
We have four working engines for you to choose you. Also we are giving away keychain engines to first twenty backers for free.
Currently we reserved our ten early prototypes that will be offered with personalized certificate of authenticity as another pirk.

The successful funding will validate the project and the direction of idea. Without interest in project the company will die and project will be abandoned due to lack of support. I fully realize that there is a possibility that my fine engines are not as exciting or interesting to the public and I would stop designing. Hopefully that is not the case and we will witness birth of new company that will bring joy and happiness to many families.

Designing air powered engines is challenging and time consuming and sometimes can be frustrating.  The design and improvements of each engine model can take anywhere from a week to months. Yet we are far enough in our development that can take the next step and start limited production run. The current challenge we face is small production run capability limited to one engine a day. The good news is that most of our engine parts are 3D printed and we can rapidly scale the production by investing into more 3D printers. When project is successfully funded, we will have enough capability to produce ten engines a day and can meet our initial build quantity before Year end.

It will be very stressful at the beginning working with small number of printers and building everything from the garage.
In case we have large number of orders, we will be able to move into commercial building and start larger production run without any major issues. The main challenge would be the funding and number of 3D printers we utilize.
You can help the project tremendously by getting the word about the campaign. Talk about the project and share your opinions. You can use the Indiegogo share tools!

In the area of Zavidovici, Bosnia and Herzegovina over a hundred artificial stone spheres were located. The big stone sphere is the biggest artificial stone sphere found on Earth. The big stone sphere is artificially composed of iron oxide, magnetite, mineral Muscovite, some other minerals in smaller amounts, crystal quartz and it is shaped as a sphere with basalt cement. The big stone spheres were used as a producer of orgone energy. In the strange forest around the big stone sphere we found until now unknown, pieces of destroyed buildings made up of unknown materials and an unknown way
• Arrangement of pathways in and around the location

The idea is to make a Park in the forest as a space for people that share an interest for alternative energy, archeological findings, permaculture,  ancient knowledge and technologies. We already have a restaurant in the forest which we want to upgrade. We will build a Yurt with a terrace where workshops will be held. We will have a camping area. We will make a system that filters waste water and recycles it in order to use it as a bio toilet and a shower and to make a system to use the other forms of waste. The waste from the toilet will be used to make manure for building the forest garden with permaculture norms.
If we don't reach the goal we will work with what we have to make the most of it.
With this project we will protect the area from commercial use like Building Hotels, buildings and destroying archeological findings.
You can apply for volunteer work by sending an email to dragonchridhe@gmail.com
Or help us to acquire tools and equipment for archeological findings.

column13:
>

At Applant, we're aiming to empower all people to grow by providing not only the tools, such as aTree, but the knowledge and the resources to do so anywhere! aTree is a vertical garden that grows fresh fruits, vegetables, herbs, and flowers in homes, offices, and more, all year round!

Plants grow on a vertical garden bed, where they're suspended on top of one another up aTree's trunk, where their roots are exposed to a mist-like environment. With the science of aeroponics, nutrient-rich water is delivered directly to the roots of your plants, all whilst using 95% less water and encouraging substantial growth.

It's a low-maintenance, self-watering solution to growing plants and produce through urban agriculture! aTree already uses less water than traditional farming methods but also grows everything 3x faster and up to 20-30% larger! So, if you think that is nifty, just wait... aTree is also a close-looped, zero-waste system! It brings natural light and fresh air to any environment whilst empowering people to embrace nature and give back to our world!
column14: >""We need to start thinking about the Future of Food if we are going to feed 9 billion people in a way that does not destroy our environment."" - Bill Gates
column15:
>

First, let us explain WHY we’re doing this. Food is one of the most important elements in our lives. We all crave it, we all need it, but right now our world is facing some serious issues because of it. Not only that, we're also facing issues with the environment, as well as our health. Even for well-informed people, it’s sometimes difficult, even impossible, to know exactly where it is our food is coming from, how it’s handled, or even what’s added to it. Food scarcity is a huge problem, especially in our cities, where many households with children don’t even know where their next meal is coming from!
column16:
>

In just 33 years, we're expected to be home to 33% more people on Earth. That's an additional 2.2 billion mouths to feed! As of now, 50% of our world's trees are gone, and by 2030, we may have only 10% of our natural rainforests left due to deforestation. In the past 40 years, Earth has lost a third of its arable land due to erosion and pollution. We are destroying our own home before our very eyes.

Demands for food are beginning to increase, access to land is beginning to decrease, and we're running out of time.

We're reaching a tipping point. Technology makes growing food in urban environments, in spaces once deemed 'unusable' very simple and possible. And while we do face a serious crisis, there is a solution - aTree. But, we must act now, bold and united, to create an independent food system that helps us, as well as the world. 

We can no longer rely on politicians and corporations - we can grow our own food!
column17:
>

aTree harnesses the miracle of aeroponic technology, but more on that later... Nutrient-rich water is delivered directly to your plants' root structures. One notable aspect about aTree is the practical foot pump we've added to the base of the unit. Water rains down through aTree's trunk, wetting your plants' root structures with the help of a gravity-fed drip method, in turn, promoting sufficient, healthy plant growth!

By using the foot pump at the base of the unit, water and oxygen travel back up the trunk, through the process of aeration, until it comes back down through again. This healthy cycle helps your plants develop faster, and without the risks of, A, overwatering, and B, developing root rot!

In soil, plants' roots have to dig through and search for their nutrients, be at the mercy of insects and weeds and soil-borne diseases, as well as battle against other roots for its sustenance, all while attempting to gather energy from the sun to grow from above. With aTree, your plants' roots are placed in their own specific space, protected from all of those other nasties, where they're free to grow as long and wild as they wish. Since the nutrients are delivered directly to them, they don't have to spend energy searching for them. And with that energy saved, guess where it goes? You guessed it, it goes towards... GROWING! UP!

column36:
>

Now, what is aeroponics, you ask? Aeroponics is a subset of hydroponics - a method of growing plants without soil. Did you know that plants don't actually need soil to grow? It may sound strange, but growing aeroponically yields crucial advantages over traditional methods of growing with soil. The process of aeroponics involves leaving your plants' root structures suspended in the air. The roots are then sprayed with a fine coat of nutrient-enriched solution, promoting healthier growth than any other method of growing, all without the drawbacks of soil-grown plants and produce!
column37:
>

We set out to create an optimal environment for plants to grow by providing them with the right amount of water-to-air ratio, periodically feeding plant roots by raining nutrient-rich water solution down aTree's trunk.

aTree establishes an entirely new standard in water usage, reducing water fall by atomising water into tiny particles that is easily absorbed by plant roots.

With aTree, we will empower millions of people to take ownership over their food, save thousands of gallons of water per year, and sustantially reduce their overall environmental impact.
column38: >
column39:
>

aTree is designed for versatility in more than just urban environments, but for any environment! And more, it's designed and functional for any age, with any amount of growing knowledge. You'll learn to love and love to learn how to grow with aTree - we guarantee it. One of the best features is being able to create your own mini ecosystem, controlling the growing seasons just like Mother Nature.

It's perfect for high-density areas, confined spaces, and landlocked living conditions
column40: however, whilst easily accessible and portable, you can grow both indoors and outdoors with absolute ease. Let your little greens enjoy a day out under the sun by the patio, up on the rooftop, or perhaps the balcony. If you're stuck for space, let aTree sit by a nice, open window, or take advantage of our excellent indoor growing capabilities! With state-of-the-art LED hang branches, your plants can absorb optimal light in any living condition!

Using the lowest produce prices offered by a major supermarket chain as the basis for comparison, we were able to calculate the potential monetary value from six months of yield using aTree to grow...

The results of this study determined that the total value of these yields over six months came to a total of $796.00, a total already exceeding the initial outlay and ongoing running costs of aTree. Given that the initial costs associated with the unit are a one-time expense, the total cost per yield will only continue to decrease over time!

Not even factored into this study were indirect savings on things such as trips to the supermarket and waste from store-bought produce. This is without mentioning the savings for the Earth that we mentioned earlier!

column12:
>

We have brought together a team of passionate, devoted individuals that are excited to undertake such a long and arduous journey to steer the future and create a better world. With a headstrong team, a plethora of wonderful partners bestowing guidance and aid, and a range of amazing supporters, we know we will achieve our goals!

It's going to take a lot of time, a lot of work, and a lot of persistence, but it will be a journey worth it so that we can learn and grow and become a better, stronger team. One of our blessings is our team, working in perfect harmony, and that will be the backbone of us delivering on what we promise to our backers and supporters!
column13:
>

Supporting us in this endeavour means you're voting for change. You're voting for your food to become a more sustainable food network, where communities can come together and share. These networks will decentralise control of our food supply in a manner that does not have a high cost on the Earth. That, and it will instead help us learn to grow, contribute, and come together again.

The idea behind Applant is not only to grow but to change our consumption patterns and, ultimately, do more with less. This is all about empowering people to control their food needs, with a little guidance as required.

We aim to be the conversation starter on how we can do things better, the reason people want to begin to change their communities and, more importantly, their own behaviours for the better. By providing seeds, nutrients, recipes, gardening tools and more, we can empower humanity to once again adopt a more community-based approach to farming - just how farming was originally intended when the revolution first began.
column15:
>

Prototype after prototype, we were obsessed with learning how we could grow plants better. We knew we could, so we went back to the drawing board and got to work and built aTree up to where it is today. We designed a vertical garden that flowed seamlessly, with an urban design, with easily integrated LED grow branches that could grow 30 plants at a time! While the unit itself is extremely simple to use, the technology behind it is far from simple.

The material used to build aTree is polycarbonate. Where we have applied UV-stabilisers for aTree to withhold tough environments. We've engineered aTree to provide the ideal amount of nutrients and oxygen for plants' root structures at all times.
column16:
>

 

At Applant, we have large, audacious goals...

1. Vertical gardens for urban households
Planting aTree in urban households will set a trend for a new way to grow food and become self-sustainable. It will become the beginning of restoring our broken food system, as well as living healthier and smarter.

2. Vertical gardens for urban community farms
While we understand that not everybody can afford an aTree unit, we wish to create urban community farms so that everybody can grow together, bringing people and resources together, strengthening our communities.

3. Self-reliant food systems that operate on alternative energy
By creating an autonomous, self-reliant food system, we can alleviate the many burdens that prevent us from growing food locally. This can allow us, as a whole, to shift our attention towards other necessary tasks. It all begins with the tools, the resources, and the knowledge.

...by achieving these 3 goals, we believe a world of change could come about by growing food where we eat. By creating independent food systems, we can stand by our tribes, allowing wildlife to return to their natural states, save lives, create a greener world, and a greater future!
column17:
>

We’ve designed aTree to stand up against the test of time. It’s a step above the average hydroponic system that generally uses styrofoam, non-food grade plastics, and other materials. Our plastic is top-of-the-line, food-grade plastic made from polycarbonate. It’s BPA-free, the best AGDA-approved plastic that money can buy!

Will the plastic break down in the sun, you ask? If it did, it would break down as a result of leaching, not structural integrity, so we took every step to ensure that this does not happen. We’ve invested in double UV-stabilisers to protect the plastic from breaking down or leaching so aTree will last a lifetime. We’ve also gone above and beyond with opaque plastic, which helps keep your plants' root structures cooler, any algae accumulation at a minimal, a unit that reflects light back towards your plants, and keeps the inside-heating and breaking levels down.
column21:
>

We're a team of enthusiastic visionaries that see a world where people aren't denied access to food... a world where our environment can thrive as we do... a world where communities are brought together for a noble cause...

...a world that is possible with aTree.

By sowing the seeds of change today, we can reap the rewards of a grander future not just for us but for the future generations. We can be remembered as the generation that changed the way food was cultivated and eaten.

By growing today, we can secure a greater tomorrow and safeguard the future - but we can only do it together.

Let's start growing up together.

Thank you.

 

Risks and challenges

We stand for value, quality, and growth, but we'd like to move forward with an air of transparency also. Applant has a team with extensive manufacturing experience and involvement.

PROJECT BENEFITS

We've got a history of designing and manufacturing quality products in-house. That being said, we're proud to announce that aTree is the result of considerably detailed planning. To get the ball rolling, we've previously designed and manufactured the aTree garden.

Despite our expertise and careful planning, there will always be risks to the project. We’ve identified and outlined the following key risks to our project below:

INJECTION MOULDING

Injection moulding is the process that can often set hardware projects back. We’re fortunate to have experience in injection moulding, but in the event that there is a problem with the injection moulding process, our project could be set back several weeks.

EXCESSIVE DEMAND

Should we receive support in excess of our anticipated demand, there could be delays in backers receiving their products.

If demand is extraordinary, we could be forced to open a new manufacturing facility, which could further delay our project.

SUPPLY CHAIN

We have long-standing relationships with our suppliers. In addition, we have a very robust supply chain for components. However, it is not impossible that our project could get delayed due to problems with a supplier.

 

Questions about Indiegogo? Click here for Indiegogo's Help Centre.

 

","At Applant, we're aiming to empower all people to grow by providing not only the tools, such as aTree, but the knowledge and the resources to do so anywhere! aTree is a vertical garden that grows fresh fruits, vegetables, herbs, and flowers in homes, offices, and more, all year round!Plants grow on a vertical garden bed, where they're suspended on top of one another up aTree's trunk, where their roots are exposed to a mist-like environment. With the science of aeroponics, nutrient-rich water is delivered directly to the roots of your plants, all whilst using 95% less water and encouraging substantial growth.It's a low-maintenance, self-watering solution to growing plants and produce through urban agriculture! aTree already uses less water than traditional farming methods but also grows everything 3x faster and up to 20-30% larger! So, if you think that is nifty, just wait... aTree is also a close-looped, zero-waste system! It brings natural light and fresh air to any environment whilst empowering people to embrace nature and give back to our world!""We need to start thinking about the Future of Food if we are going to feed 9 billion people in a way that does not destroy our environment."" - Bill Gates First, let us explain WHY we’re doing this. Food is one of the most important elements in our lives. We all crave it, we all need it, but right now our world is facing some serious issues because of it. Not only that, we're also facing issues with the environment, as well as our health. Even for well-informed people, it’s sometimes difficult, even impossible, to know exactly where it is our food is coming from, how it’s handled, or even what’s added to it. Food scarcity is a huge problem, especially in our cities, where many households with children don’t even know where their next meal is coming from! In just 33 years, we're expected to be home to 33% more people on Earth. That's an additional 2.2 billion mouths to feed! As of now, 50% of our world's trees are gone, and by 2030, we may have only 10% of our natural rainforests left due to deforestation. In the past 40 years, Earth has lost a third of its arable land due to erosion and pollution. We are destroying our own home before our very eyes.Demands for food are beginning to increase, access to land is beginning to decrease, and we're running out of time.We're reaching a tipping point. Technology makes growing food in urban environments, in spaces once deemed 'unusable' very simple and possible. And while we do face a serious crisis, there is a solution - aTree. But, we must act now, bold and united, to create an independent food system that helps us, as well as the world. We can no longer rely on politicians and corporations - we can grow our own food! aTree harnesses the miracle of aeroponic technology, but more on that later... UP! You don't need any previous growing experience. We've worked together with some of Australia's best engineers, where we've developed a natural-looking light source to keep your plants fully primed for maximum growth. aTree can come equipped with LED hang branch extensions that are full spectrum (2000k–5000k), dimmable and automated to mimic the sun for optimal photosynthesis. These hang branches hang from the corners of aTree so that they do not interfere with the care, or the admiration, of your beautiful plants! Growing in any condition has never been so easy!

It was important to us to not only design functional grow lights for the home, but to ensure that we were providing an energy efficient solution. With these LED hang branches, we can almost argue that growing food at home is more economical than heading out to the grocery store!

Designed for your convenience, we've incorporated an inconspicuous storage space into aTree's treetop for things like your tools, seed packets, nutrient mix, husks, pots, scissors, testing kits, and other paraphernalia. Accompanied with germination trays to leave your seeds out to sprout, aTree comes with everything you'll need to get started AND finished!
