The world is switching from fossil fuels to renewable energy. In 2016, investment in new power capacity of renewable energy exceeded fossil fuel. Paris Agreement, which 195 countries signed, aims for zero emissions by 2050. This can be achieved with full replacement of fossil fuels by renewables.

However renewable energy sources are unreliable and their output tends to be volatile, going up and down sharply, with change of wind speed and sun light loss by cloud cover. Utility scale Energy Storage provides the critical ability to stabilise the volatile renewable output.

Pumped Hydro has traditionally provided the lowest cost energy storage, well below Li-ion battery, compressed air, molten salt and others. However Pumped Hydro sites, which can provide low cost energy storage, are close to 100% exploited in the developed countries and fast getting used up in the rest of the world. While Pumped Hydro is still possible, developing the sites now available requires much higher cost, so major expansions of Pumped Hydro  to support full replacement of fossil fuels by Renewable energy are not possible.

The solution Solid Pumped Hydro( SPH ) is a innovative twist on the 80 year old proven Pumped Hydro technology. It is closely related to Pumped Hydro and uses very similar equipment.  SPH overcomes the stringent geographic specifications of Pumped Hydro sites, making available a massive number of new low cost sites at convenient locations.

Convenient locations that are close to the grid, require lower costs of connecting the Energy Storage site to the grid. This can be a significant part of the project cost.  SPH projects do not require dams and as a result require a lower degree of civil construction and tunnelling, compared to Pumped Hydro. Dams and tunnelling are a major part of the cost of Pumped Hydro projects.
So Solid Pumped Hydro is a disruptive change, that could  accelerate the process of wind and solar renewable energy sources completely replacing fossil fuels like coal, petroleum and natural gas.

Solid Pumped Hydro(SPH) is a highly scalable solution to the energy storage problem. SPH is possible to roll out with existing materials, resources and manufacturing capability. Almost all the equipment can be ordered off the catalogues of industrial equipment manufacturers.

In 2017 the leading contender of energy storage was Li-ion battery. How ever Li-ion has a long way to go in developing the installed capacity, to be able to support the full replacement of fossil fuels by renewables. Li-ion requires massive investments (in the order of 500Billion USD) to build a 100 Li-ion factories that are bigger than the biggest factory in the world in 2016. The battery, equipment cost and installation cost is extra. The current  generation of battery have a specified life rating of 10 years. This means a recurring expense in battery replacement every 10 years.

The SPH concept is simple, but needs a quick validation with prototype plant and commercial demonstration site before it is massively rolled out. Existing industrial plants can supply the pumps, turbines, motors, electrical equipment and construction materials,
SPH is a practical, winning potential solution which can help restrict global warming to 2 deg C well before 2050.
You have a crucial role to play in funding an accelerated validation and trials of SPH to allow it to spread rapidly and start de-carbonising the energy industry withing 5 years.

• I am an engineer,MBA,PhD,Inventor and a teacher. I have an track record of solving hard problems.  I visualise solutions and lead teams with multidisciplinary expertise into delivering sustainable winning solutions.
• The SPH concept is simple yet innovative and powerful. It has been presented to and vetted by several engineers from Mechanical, Process and other disciplines. No showstoppers were found.
• This campaign will provide seed capital to develop and demonstrate the solid pumped hydro technology as a scalable solution to Energy Storage.
• Your contribution will provide the bias for action, in that the seed capital raised from you will be leveraged to access both state and federal Govt grants.

• The project should receive 1:1 or even 1:2 subsidies and grants, based on out initial interaction with govt funding agencies. The SPH technology meets 100% of the grant criteria by supporting renewables expansion, low environmental footprint, non polluting and potentially lowest cost/MWH.
• Based on the amount of funding raised a prototype project will be setup.

• Even the prototype will be income positive in daily operation, based on the daily difference  between wholesale peak and off peak rates. Difference in these rates can vary in the range of $40 to $80 per MWH from day to day.  So a 200MWH site can earn between $2.9 million and $5.8 million per year, on top of supplying the critical ability to stabilise the renewable output.

• An agreement will be sought with Wind farm / Solar PV farm(s) to buy unsold power which is lost, at cheaper than offpeak prices. At present as unsold wind power or solar PV is never stored and is completely lost.
• There is also a possibility to contract ongoing sale of the stored energy direct to a utility / Govt or to a large power consuming entity like a large factory or a city council.

• Your contribution is critical to start the snowball rolling downhill. Once in motion the successful project will gathers more support on its own and should become a positive planet changing avalanche

Like you, I too love our planet unconditionally. To use a cliche ""its the only one we got"" and we are at the tipping point of global warming. The solution is stop burning fossil fuels NOW and prevent the associated CO2 release. The sooner we do it lower will the the loss of bio diversity, which is our common priceless heritage and lower will be the damaging economic and social impacts of global warming induced climate change.
I have a solution but need your collective help and goodwill to make it happen for our common good.

Wind and Solar have the ability to replace fossil fuels, but can do so only if backed up by reliable energy storage. At present we rely on fossil fuels like gas to support volatility in renewables. If fossil fuel is removed, the role of energy storage becomes  even more critical. In a decarbonised future, every solar PV or wind farm will need to come with its own or contracted storage capacity to the tune of  25 to 50% of its capacity.

I have the plan to create  easily deployable massively scalable energy storage with a small environmental footprint, using Solid Pumped Hydro(SPH). This can happen at the level of utility company or community based facilities or at the smallest level to include individual farm or factory level facilities.

Being grid connected, any excess storage capacity can be offered to other reneewable energy producers or even utilities and a profit can be extracted from the difference between offpeak and peak energy rates. But more importantly SPH can provide insurance against catastrophic statewide power failure events like what occured in South Australia in Feb 2017.

• We are raising $10 million USD by this campaign. We expect to attract government subsidies and grants between 10 to 20 million USD. With this and if necessary some bank loans we aim to setup a 30MW Solid Pumped Storage facility with 4 hours storage. Providing 120MWH energy storage.

• If this project succeeds every one that contributes to will be given a piece of the equipment from the first prototype when it is retired on a commemorative plaque. The people that donate to this campaign are special they will also receive within 2 months a personalised certificate( as a pdf file to save cost)

• If the raised capital is less than the target 10million USD, we have the ability to scale down the prototype project to the size of the combined total of the funds raised in this campaign and the matching 1:1 grants and other subsidies that become available.

The impact of this project is critical. At present there in only one easy to deploy scalable solution in energy storage and this is Li-ion Battery Farm technology. The SPH project offers a practical alternative with a delivery time frame of 1 to 2 years.

• SPH technology can save the world literally. We need to de-carbonise the energy industry to limit climate change to 2 deg C warming. This project can be the catalyst to  Wind and Solar PV to massively expand to replace coal and gas power plants.

• As an engineer I have a successful track record of 2 decades in making innovative modifications to large processes to achieve major energy and material savings. I have never failed in an energy saving or process optimisation project.
• The Team already includes a mix of young and experienced design, operations and project engineers with a combined experience of 100 man years and spans continents.
• Most good ideas are simple like the light bulb, and they change the world. This one can not only change but will probably save the world.

• Don't sit on the fence, instead take ownership of the solution, make a contribution no matter how small and watch the project evolve with pride. Spread the message in your sphere of influence and your contact list.

We have two challenges. The first is to raise enough seed capital to be able to access the 1:1 grants and subsidies that this project easily qualifies for. The second is to quickly construct and commission the commercial Energy Storage facility size demo and keep it running as a cash positive venture. A 30MW / 120MWH capability is  the size being aimed for. This is similar to the  size of the Li-ion battery farm being built in South Australia by the largest battery company in the world.
• We have a team of highly experienced engineers onboard already. Who are already addressing the design and other technical issues including environmental Impact.

• We have already made contact with government arms and renewable energy funding agencies and have received an encouraging response and guidance. We are therefore now focusing on raising the seed capital through this campaign.
Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

• We understand everybody is not rich however every dollar counts and so does your goodwill and ownership. Even if you have a sausage sizzle or chocolate bar fund raiser it can make a big difference. Please feel free to ask questions and help spread the good word.
• Indiegogo itself has share tools! that you can you spread the word among your contacts

The Message is simple

We need to replace fossil fuels which burn to release CO2 to limit Global Warming to sub 2deg C. Fossil fuels make up 65% of the 2750GW of power generated globally in 2017.

Renewables like Wind Power and Solar PV are getting cheaper all the time and can produce the required power, but are not reliable in that they go from 100% to 10% unpredictably, some times more than once a day.

We need a cheap reliable and massively scalable Energy Storage technology that can buffer the peaky renewable output to provide stable dispatchable power on a country scale.

Pumped Hydro technology has 100 years or more of project life and has historically been the cheap reliable large capacity Energy Storage. In 2017 it has a total of 160GW and enjoys a 97% market share  however it has almost been fully exploited with very limited prospect of additional low cost Energy Storage.

Solid Pumped Hydro (SPH) being proposed here, is very closely related to Pumped Hydro and has the promise of unlocking a massive number of new sites of low cost Energy storage. Since it is closely related to the proven Pumped Hydro the SPH technology has a very good chance of delivering its promise of unlimited cheap energy storage.

The cheap unlimited Energy Storage promised by SPH can be the catalyst that may accelerate the replacement of  coal and gas power plants by renewable energy on a country wide scale. 

In a fossil fuel free electricity generation scenario typically one third of the global projections 3800GW(2030)  power  generation is to be backed by SPH Energy Storage. This means a demand of close to 1300GW of Energy Storage. When rolled out on a global scale SPH costs too will fall with economies of scale. As per estimates that is a one time investment USD 600 Billion in SPH facilities. But the good news is this investment can be paid back in a period between 10 to 20 years on commercial terms. The payback time can be guaranteed by monetising the stabilising capability using a levy per MWH of stored power delivered.The project life is in excess of 100 years going by the Pumped Hydro experience. This means SPH projects will deliver an an ongoing revenue stream after the payback is completed.

SPH should win a big share of the Energy Storage market by being the lowest cost technology. SPH project costs are expected to be similar of lower than the low cost Pumped Storage as it  does not need Dam construction or kilometers of tunneling. SPH also allows lower grid connection costs by enabling convenient close to grid sites to be utilised.

","Short Summary

The world is switching from fossil fuels to renewable energy. In 2016, investment in new power capacity of renewable energy exceeded fossil fuel. Paris Agreement, which 195 countries signed, aims for zero emissions by 2050. This can be achieved with full replacement of fossil fuels by renewables.

However renewable energy sources are unreliable and their output tends to be volatile, going up and down sharply, with change of wind speed and sun light loss by cloud cover. Utility scale Energy Storage provides the critical ability to stabilise the volatile renewable output.

Pumped Hydro has traditionally provided the lowest cost energy storage, well below Li-ion battery, compressed air, molten salt and others. However Pumped Hydro sites, which can provide low cost energy storage, are close to 100% exploited in the developed countries and fast getting used up in the rest of the world. While Pumped Hydro is still possible, developing the sites now available requires much higher cost, so major expansions of Pumped Hydro  to support full replacement of fossil fuels by Renewable energy are not possible.

The solution Solid Pumped Hydro( SPH ) is a innovative twist on the 80 year old proven Pumped Hydro technology. It is closely related to Pumped Hydro and uses very similar equipment.  SPH overcomes the stringent geographic specifications of Pumped Hydro sites, making available a massive number of new low cost sites at convenient locations.

Convenient locations that are close to the grid, require lower costs of connecting the Energy Storage site to the grid. This can be a significant part of the project cost.  SPH projects do not require dams and as a result require a lower degree of civil construction and tunnelling, compared to Pumped Hydro. Dams and tunnelling are a major part of the cost of Pumped Hydro projects.
So Solid Pumped Hydro is a disruptive change, that could  accelerate the process of wind and solar renewable energy sources completely replacing fossil fuels like coal, petroleum and natural gas.

Solid Pumped Hydro(SPH) is a highly scalable solution to the energy storage problem. SPH is possible to roll out with existing materials, resources and manufacturing capability. Almost all the equipment can be ordered off the catalogues of industrial equipment manufacturers.

In 2017 the leading contender of energy storage was Li-ion battery. How ever Li-ion has a long way to go in developing the installed capacity, to be able to support the full replacement of fossil fuels by renewables. Li-ion requires massive investments (in the order of 500Billion USD) to build a 100 Li-ion factories that are bigger than the biggest factory in the world in 2016. The battery, equipment cost and installation cost is extra. The current  generation of battery have a specified life rating of 10 years. This means a recurring expense in battery replacement every 10 years.

The SPH concept is simple, but needs a quick validation with prototype plant and commercial demonstration site before it is massively rolled out. Existing industrial plants can supply the pumps, turbines, motors, electrical equipment and construction materials,
SPH is a practical, winning potential solution which can help restrict global warming to 2 deg C well before 2050.
You have a crucial role to play in funding an accelerated validation and trials of SPH to allow it to spread rapidly and start de-carbonising the energy industry withing 5 years.

I am an engineer,MBA,PhD,Inventor and a teacher. I have an track record of solving hard problems.  I visualise solutions and lead teams with multidisciplinary expertise into delivering sustainable winning solutions.
The SPH concept is simple yet innovative and powerful. It has been presented to and vetted by several engineers from Mechanical, Process and other disciplines. No showstoppers were found.
This campaign will provide seed capital to develop and demonstrate the solid pumped hydro technology as a scalable solution to Energy Storage.
Your contribution will provide the bias for action, in that the seed capital raised from you will be leveraged to access both state and federal Govt grants.

The project should receive 1:1 or even 1:2 subsidies and grants, based on out initial interaction with govt funding agencies. The SPH technology meets 100% of the grant criteria by supporting renewables expansion, low environmental footprint, non polluting and potentially lowest cost/MWH.
Based on the amount of funding raised a prototype project will be setup.

Even the prototype will be income positive in daily operation, based on the daily difference  between wholesale peak and off peak rates. Difference in these rates can vary in the range of $40 to $80 per MWH from day to day.  So a 200MWH site can earn between $2.9 million and $5.8 million per year, on top of supplying the critical ability to stabilise the renewable output.

An agreement will be sought with Wind farm / Solar PV farm(s) to buy unsold power which is lost, at cheaper than offpeak prices. At present as unsold wind power or solar PV is never stored and is completely lost.
There is also a possibility to contract ongoing sale of the stored energy direct to a utility / Govt or to a large power consuming entity like a large factory or a city council.
Your contribution is critical to start the snowball rolling downhill. Once in motion the successful project will gathers more support on its own and should become a positive planet changing avalanche

An InnerG Bus is a school bus that has been renovated into a home on wheels built to reflect you. An InnerG Bus is built for the occupancy of up to 5 residents with accommodations that include personal sleeping space and storage.
column3: '> InnerG Bus residents are also equipped with, a shared bathroom, shared kitchen, additional storage, common area, light transportation, electricity, water, heat, A/C, appliances, WiFi and a community of people looking to collaborate and support each other - all for just $399/mo.

column1: Our mission is to empower people to create the life that they desire, by building the most affordable &
column2: self-sustainable homes in the world, retrofitted with everything you need to live the life you want! What we mean by retrofitted is that an InnerG Bus can be built out to be a mobile Restaurant, Photography Studio, Music Studio, Work Space, Barbershop, and the list goes on.

column1: Huffington Post recently wrote an article titled ""The Hourly Income Needed to Afford Rent Around The U.S."" - the article's main point is that in the U.S. majority of people's monthly job earnings ends up being less than the average cost of rent. This is the most significant cause of poverty. Life is too expensive for many people around the world. And it's not even the luxuries that are too expensive, it's the basic needs, the bare minimums, the food, clothes, housing &

The purpose of InnerG Bus is to dissolve the suffering that these situations produce, by alleviating impoverished circumstances through self-sustainability. At it's root, InnerG Bus will provide affordable, creative and modern, housing that anyone can afford with a minimal amount of effort.
column3: '>Our ultimate mission with InnerG is to enable people to spend their InnerG how they want.

column1: The first bus was purchased in January 2017 and the team started working on it in late March 2017. The first prototype has been 75% completed in 90 days as a result of the full-time efforts of Latrell Garnett and Brodie Cross Jr. We purchased our own tools and hustled to find a feasible work space. And by far, we would not have made it this far without all of the people who have volunteered their time and knowledge to help us move forward - the electricians, the plumbers, the carpenters, the designers, the digital interns, and the extended community that was just looking to lend a hand. Thank You!!!!! :)
If your answer is yes, then here's your opportunity. We are inviting anyone, anywhere to join the community. Just choose the Perk that best fits you and you'll be in your InnerG Bus by 2018.

Upon raising $50,000, we will be able to build 2 more InnerG Buses, allowing us to serve 100 people by the end of this year.  Artists, entrepreneurs, students, and people n general - will be able to be able to live without having to work so hard for money. An InnerG Bus Resident would only have to make $100/week to afford a place to sleep, utilities, amentities, transportation, and more. Imagine the type of life a person could live because they don't have to work so hard to live. Imagine being able to save so much more money from your pay check. Imagine having the time and energy to do more of what you want to do in life and not of what you have to do in life.

column1: http://instagram.com/innergbus     |     http://facebook.com/innergbus

An InnerG Bus is a school bus that has been renovated into a home on wheels built to reflect you. An InnerG Bus is built for the occupancy of up to 5 residents with accommodations that include personal sleeping space and storage. InnerG Bus residents are also equipped with, a shared bathroom, shared kitchen, additional storage, common area, light transportation, electricity, water, heat, A/C, appliances, WiFi and a community of people looking to collaborate and support each other - all for just $399/mo.

Our mission is to empower people to create the life that they desire, by building the most affordable & self-sustainable homes in the world, retrofitted with everything you need to live the life you want! What we mean by retrofitted is that an InnerG Bus can be built out to be a mobile Restaurant, Photography Studio, Music Studio, Work Space, Barbershop, and the list goes on.

Huffington Post recently wrote an article titled ""The Hourly Income Needed to Afford Rent Around The U.S."" - the article's main point is that in the U.S. majority of people's monthly job earnings ends up being less than the average cost of rent. This is the most significant cause of poverty. Life is too expensive for many people around the world. And it's not even the luxuries that are too expensive, it's the basic needs, the bare minimums, the food, clothes, housing & transportation that's too expensive.

The purpose of InnerG Bus is to dissolve the suffering that these situations produce, by alleviating impoverished circumstances through self-sustainability. At it's root, InnerG Bus will provide affordable, creative and modern, housing that anyone can afford with a minimal amount of effort. Our ultimate mission with InnerG is to enable people to spend their InnerG how they want.

The first bus was purchased in January 2017 and the team started working on it in late March 2017. The first prototype has been 75% completed in 90 days as a result of the full-time efforts of Latrell Garnett and Brodie Cross Jr. We purchased our own tools and hustled to find a feasible work space. And by far, we would not have made it this far without all of the people who have volunteered their time and knowledge to help us move forward - the electricians, the plumbers, the carpenters, the designers, the digital interns, and the extended community that was just looking to lend a hand. Thank You!!!!! :)
If your answer is yes, then here's your opportunity. We are inviting anyone, anywhere to join the community. Just choose the Perk that best fits you and you'll be in your InnerG Bus by 2018.

Upon raising $50,000, we will be able to build 2 more InnerG Buses, allowing us to serve 100 people by the end of this year.  Artists, entrepreneurs, students, and people n general - will be able to be able to live without having to work so hard for money. An InnerG Bus Resident would only have to make $100/week to afford a place to sleep, utilities, amentities, transportation, and more. Imagine the type of life a person could live because they don't have to work so hard to live. Imagine being able to save so much more money from your pay check. Imagine having the time and energy to do more of what you want to do in life and not of what you have to do in life.
Sharing is Caring :) We appreciate having a community of people providing feedback on our creativity. We share InnerG Bus' Design, Engineering & Community endeavors on...
Dear friends! Welcome! Lets make Healthy, Fresh air available to all! and much more!:)
Hello  everyone! My  name  is  Paul  Blank  and  I  am  the  founder  of  the  unique  Phytensor brand  and  the  inventor  of  the  Emanator  bio  and  eco - friendly technology!
• I invented the technology when I was 12 years old together with my father who is a biochemist and has multiple patents and inventions to his name.

• I  remember  looking  at  a  unique  device  he'd  created  in  2002  in  our  apartment  that's been  filled  with  dozens  of  Living  curative  plants  and  I  remember  asking what  purpose  it  served?( I  knew  plants  are  good  for  us, the  basics , some  clean  our  air,  some enrich it  and  all  are  vital  to  our  survival) My dad  told  me  that  when  these plants  are  together  they  sort  of  create  an  integral  field  of  energy  and  release  healing  elements  and  compounds  from  within  a  lot  faster  and  it is  more  potent.  Ive  watched the thing  for  hours,  while  my  father  tried  obtaining  THE ELIXIR OF LIFE AND YOUTH:)) it  was  literally 1  drop  an hour  for  this extract  to  happen  it  took about  a  week to  fill up  the smallest Pharma  style  bottle. We  didn't  even  know  what  to do  with  it:) however, it  did  smell  amazing.

• This  is  when  Ive  noticed  how  right  before  a heavy  rainstorm  was  about  to  unveil  the  condensate started  flowing  a  lot  faster  for only  about 5  minutes or so, before  the rain hit  hard.  And then and there  I've  proposed to make  a bigger device filled  with  more  unique  plants  and enrich  water  with  the  airflow  from  these amazing  gifts of  Nature.
• It is  very  important  for  me  and  I think  for  all  of us!  to  support such  unique  and amazing projects  as  they  are  in  direct  benefit  to  us  all!
• Unlike  any  other companies  out there. We  do  not  crush, steam,  cold- press and  harm plants  in  any way  to  obtain  essential- oils, antioxidants  and  other  healing ingredients

• On the  contrary,  this unique  process uses  variably  lowered  atmospheric  pressure(just like in Nature, before the Rain hits), special  lighting,  climate  controlled environment  to  carefully  stimulate  the  plants  of  choice to  release  1000's  of  times  more  effective  ingredients  for  us  to  enjoy!
1. We  preserve  and  improve  the  plants  life.  make  it  stronger  and  live  longer
2.The  elixir  we  create  is  of  Triple  Organic  quality,
I would  like  to  open  a centre  in Toronto  that  would  serve a few  purposes:)

It  would  be  an  educational  centre  for  kids  and  families  and  anyone  else  to  enjoy. special therapeutic  rooms, factory  tour  to  see  the  first  'Plant  milking' farm  in  the  world. To  show our  kids  and  elders  that  this  unique  process  is  much  more  beneficial  to  us  all  than  the existing  practices  that  lead  to  millions  of  crushed , dead  plants  every  year  in  the Pharmaceutical, beauty, Health&
column2: Wellness and food and beverage industries.  We  will  hold  free presentations  and  invite   daycare  owners, school  owners  and  many  more  to  come  join  this movement  and  show  how  the  classrooms  air  quality  is  changed  within  minutes  by  an  all Natural  way, clean  air , free  of  pathogens, viruses  and  enriched  with  billions  of  healthy molecules  that  you  would  find  in  a  highland  meadow. Allergen  free.  completely  safe  for everyone. Fitness  clubs  owners, cinema  owners  and  many  more  would  benefit  from  such technology  and  put  all  competition  to  rest. Because  clean  healthy  air  is  one  of  the  most important  subjects  ever.

column1: You'd  enjoy  the  factory  storefront  with  drinking  water  made  by Living  curative  plants  which  tastes  absolutely  amazing! along  with  other  Living  plant  made  organic products:)
Special  therapy rooms  with  a full  Phytensor  experience  to  destress, a swimming pool  and jacuzzis  with  Fresh  Bio- Oyxgen  and  more.
Pure Organic beauty, wellness and personal care products with a new standard for what Organic quality is.
I am very excited and hope you are too!.
Help us make this dream come true for everyone to enjoy:)
I am asking for your kind support

take it anywhere you go and spray on your face and skin and enjoy millions of healing molecules, fresh Bio- oxygen and moisture. May help reduce anxiety and stress and leave you feeling revitalized. No preservatives and or concentrates. Purely Living Myrtle essence.

","Dear friends! Welcome! Lets make Healthy, Fresh air available to all! and much more!:)
Hello  everyone! My  name  is  Paul  Blank  and  I  am  the  founder  of  the  unique  Phytensor brand  and  the  inventor  of  the  Emanator  bio  and  eco - friendly technology!
I invented the technology when I was 12 years old together with my father who is a biochemist and has multiple patents and inventions to his name.

I  remember  looking  at  a  unique  device  he'd  created  in  2002  in  our  apartment  that's been  filled  with  dozens  of  Living  curative  plants  and  I  remember  asking what  purpose  it  served?( I  knew  plants  are  good  for  us, the  basics , some  clean  our  air,  some enrich it  and  all  are  vital  to  our  survival) My dad  told  me  that  when  these plants  are  together  they  sort  of  create  an  integral  field  of  energy  and  release  healing  elements  and  compounds  from  within  a  lot  faster  and  it is  more  potent.  Ive  watched the thing  for  hours,  while  my  father  tried  obtaining  THE ELIXIR OF LIFE AND YOUTH:)) it  was  literally 1  drop  an hour  for  this extract  to  happen  it  took about  a  week to  fill up  the smallest Pharma  style  bottle. We  didn't  even  know  what  to do  with  it:) however, it  did  smell  amazing.

This  is  when  Ive  noticed  how  right  before  a heavy  rainstorm  was  about  to  unveil  the  condensate started  flowing  a  lot  faster  for only  about 5  minutes or so, before  the rain hit  hard.  And then and there  I've  proposed to make  a bigger device filled  with  more  unique  plants  and enrich  water  with  the  airflow  from  these amazing  gifts of  Nature.
It is  very  important  for  me  and  I think  for  all  of us!  to  support such  unique  and amazing projects  as  they  are  in  direct  benefit  to  us  all!
Unlike  any  other companies  out there. We  do  not  crush, steam,  cold- press and  harm plants  in  any way  to  obtain  essential- oils, antioxidants  and  other  healing ingredients

On the  contrary,  this unique  process uses  variably  lowered  atmospheric  pressure(just like in Nature, before the Rain hits), special  lighting,  climate  controlled environment  to  carefully  stimulate  the  plants  of  choice to  release  1000's  of  times  more  effective  ingredients  for  us  to  enjoy!
1. We  preserve  and  improve  the  plants  life.  make  it  stronger  and  live  longer
2.The  elixir  we  create  is  of  Triple  Organic  quality,
I would  like  to  open  a centre  in Toronto  that  would  serve a few  purposes:)

It  would  be  an  educational  centre  for  kids  and  families  and  anyone  else  to  enjoy. special therapeutic  rooms, factory  tour  to  see  the  first  'Plant  milking' farm  in  the  world. To  show our  kids  and  elders  that  this  unique  process  is  much  more  beneficial  to  us  all  than  the existing  practices  that  lead  to  millions  of  crushed , dead  plants  every  year  in  the Pharmaceutical, beauty, Health& Wellness and food and beverage industries.  We  will  hold  free presentations  and  invite   daycare  owners, school  owners  and  many  more  to  come  join  this movement  and  show  how  the  classrooms  air  quality  is  changed  within  minutes  by  an  all Natural  way, clean  air , free  of  pathogens, viruses  and  enriched  with  billions  of  healthy molecules  that  you  would  find  in  a  highland  meadow. Allergen  free.  completely  safe  for everyone. Fitness  clubs  owners, cinema  owners  and  many  more  would  benefit  from  such technology  and  put  all  competition  to  rest. Because  clean  healthy  air  is  one  of  the  most important  subjects  ever.
You'd  enjoy  the  factory  storefront  with  drinking  water  made  by Living  curative  plants  which  tastes  absolutely  amazing! along  with  other  Living  plant  made  organic products:)
Special  therapy rooms  with  a full  Phytensor  experience  to  destress, a swimming pool  and jacuzzis  with  Fresh  Bio- Oyxgen  and  more.
Pure Organic beauty, wellness and personal care products with a new standard for what Organic quality is.
I am very excited and hope you are too!.

VACCARS - Vehicle Assist Carbon Capture Air Refresh System is the integration of using a clean energy source such as solar panels to operate air compressors that draws air past different types of filter systems.

The compressed air is then stored and then used for an air engine that drives the vehicles of the Hail Ride transport system. Passengers and clients pay for this transport, which in turn pays for the construction and operation of the system. This makes the system financially viable and scalable to a point of making a difference to air quality and the reduction of greenhouse gases.
To provide a commercially viable solution to inner city transport in as many large cities across the world, with our revolutionary carbon negative system, which is a first of its kind.
“Time to Drive Change for the Environment”
VACCARS is designed on the principal of real change for the environment that we are all desperately seeking and need to combat global warming.
VACCARS was invented by Terry Garratt through research into Green Technologies as he was seeking to get a better understanding of what is happening to global climate change.
The market opportunity lies in the urgent need in combating climate change without straining government and country finances.

High quality, low cost hail ride transport in the future has mass market appeal for the urban public, because there are no parking problems, no high up-front expense of purchasing a vehicle that includes no vehicle maintenance to worry about, no repairs to pay for, no need to worry about refilling, no need to get car insurance, no need to get the vehicle tested and no need to worry about emission tests.

Petrol vehicles are becoming more recognized as a threat to our environment, through fossil fuel combustion, releasing a high amount of Carbon Dioxide and other toxic gases into our atmosphere, worsening climate change and polluting our air. We are now in the start of a transition period for their replacement,

Health is a growing industry as more and more people are looking for healthier lifestyles. Bottled water, fitness centers and health foods are all growing industries, now is the time for healthy clean air.
We are now asking for a small contribution from you to reach an initial $150,000 AUD to create a component working model of VACCARS.

This will provide us with proof of concept that will give us a key facts and figures of what this system can achieve and a platform to campaign for future funds so that we can create a full scale VACCARS Roadway to integrate all of the various components and have a fully functional system operational.

In return for your support, we will write a personalized letter back to you thanking you and as a show of good faith we will provide you with a top priority to access future investment into VACCARS at an initial discounted rate, for more details please feel free to contact us for more information and terms and conditions will apply.

Any amount will help towards us reaching our 1st milestone! If you are unable to contribute financially, then please help get the word out and share with your family and friends by sharing the campaign link.
If you want more information, feel free to check out the website: www.vaccars.com

Hey everyone, my name is Lee. I have always had the desire to be a entrepreneur, so I am pursuing my dreams and started a lighter company. I have produced many different types of unique lighter products that fulfill just about any need you can think of. I saw a need that people had, I wanted to fix that need. So I came up with a solution, using electricity from an ion battery inside the lighter to get them hotter and more efficient. Not only do are these lighters hotter and more efficient but there are also ECO-friendly. Traditional lighters have a toxic gas called butane, which is bad for the environment. Sense my lighters use electricity there are no toxic gas particles being released. This putting an end to the frustration of having your flame burn out to quickly or burning yourself in the process all while doing my part in saving the environment.
My goal is $10,000. Why such a high goal you may ask? Well I am looking to expand. I would love to get a small store front and educate more about the benefits of plasma lighters.

The best part is the Perks you will get for helping me fund this project! Discounts on the newest item that hasn't even be hit my website yet! So you get the opportunity to have the first lighter before it's released.
All funds that are brought in will go directly towards business expansion. I am so excited about this opportunity and I hope you will be too!

The environment and our health. With rapid population growth and a multi billion dollar industry (tobacco) constantly polluting the air. I am hoping that switching over to butane free lighters will cut back on the toxic gasses being released. Not only does butane affect the environment but it also has negative affects on health, which is another big reason why I am starting the push to have electric lighters in all stores. Even though cigarettes are bad for you, inhaling butane over your lifetime can speed up the process. All in all this is to help others health and help the environment with a new yet efficient lighter.

Starting a new business is never easy and for me finances keep me limited. I work hard for everything I have and I know with the right support behind me I can make a huge impact on not only the environment but also for others around me.
The risk is failing with this campaign.
Challenges, well challenges will always arise when owning a business. It is all about how you handle those challenges.
I know not everyone is interested in lighters, but anything helps even if you can share my campaign with others who may be interested.
Thank you so much for everything because sometimes it takes people like you to make others dreams come true!

column8:
>

Bero is a big-sized character and smart lamp that can express a variety of colors with its application and sensor. Bero itself has no button to turn the light on or off. You can knock its body twice to turn the light on and off. It’s an original function that you cannot see in existing lamp products. Bero smart lamp uses RGB LED and links with the application through Bluetooth4.0 connection to realize hundreds of thousands of colors. So you can have Bero with a variety of diverse colors.

column2: >You don't have to look for the switch to turn Bero on or off without your smartphone and you only need to knock its body twice.
>You can knock Bero’s head or body twice to turn the light on or off. This is the difference with existing products with which you can touch specific areas to turn the light on or off.

column1: The application will be available for both iOS and Android.

column2: >Touch Bero on the main display of the application twice to turn the lamp on or off.

column1: Bero has RGB LED to offer experiences in a variety of colors. You can express diverse moods by changing colors with the application.
You can use application to turn Bero on or off at a specific time you want. So, you don’t need to fall asleep in the dark and wake up in the morning with noisy alarms any more.

column2: >Shake your smartphone to change Bero’s color to your smartphone movement.

column1: Use the brightness button on the application for fine adjustment of brightness to express diverse moods in the space.

Bero Mode is a function that shows 5 different lights of nature inside Bero. Click each button for different colors and the color automatically changes inside Bero accordingly. And touch Heartbeat button to feel Bero’s heartbeat in the light.

column2: >* Various functions based on the application are available for Big Bero only. *

column1: Bero likes people and, especially, loves to help them.

A stump of a big tree covered by white molds that seems to last for more than 1000 years is an entrance to the world of JINNIA and the world of huge spirits lies beneath the stump. Spirits of fire, water, earth, wind and light are living in the world and protect the forest and animals.

Bero is a spirit of light that flies between trees in the forest and shares its light energy with grass and trees under shades to help them growing.

In addition to Bero is very curious and goes outside the forest at night. It watches over sleepless children at the windows and then goes back to the forest when the sun is about to come up.

Bero is a character optimized for the lamp structure.Its body that emits light has a proper structure to shine every corner and it is also easy for users to turn the light on and off by knocking it twice.
Mini Bero is a lamp intended to express the beauty of simplicity with white color while Big Bero is for realizing the pleasure of variety with multiple colors.
We have applied touch-type activation by knocking Bero’s body twice rather than switch-type one to turn the lamp on so that Bero can communicate with users just like a living character.

column2: >* Turning the light on and off by knocking Bero twice is the unique function of Big Bero.*

column1: • Materials : Clean Plastic, White LED, RGB LED
• Power : AC Adapter (Offer compatible adaptors for backers)

Mini Bero will be based on LED modules for longer battery life.
And Mini Bero has a special function with which the lamp will automatically turn off 1 hour after you fall asleep while he is on.
As Mini Bero works with a battery, you can have it for outdoor activities such as camping, fishing or climbing.

Once the campaign ends, it will take about 2 months for us to produce the cast for Bero with funds you have supported and another 1 month for injection molding and testing. During these periods, we will also start to produce LED modules to be used in Smart Lamp Bero. After the production of the frames and modules is completed, we will perform final testing and start packaging. We will prepare to deliver your products to the addresses based on the result of our survey for supporters. We expect that all these processes will be completed and we will start delivery in October.
* Once the delivery starts, we will provide tracking numbers for all the supporters.*
Nyllili Studio is a character developer that aims to plan and produce products combining characters with IT. We has developed a character story called JINNIA World.

In the World of JINNIA, there are main characters including Bero, the spirit of light, Tuly, the spirit of wind, Kuma, the spirit of fire, Keto, the spirit of soil, and Vesi, the spirit of water. The smart lamp that we are offering in our kickstarter campaign is based on the spirit of light named Bero.

So......Unless you've been living on a small asteroid, somewhere in the Kuiper belt, you have pretty much heard a lot recently about Bitcoin, cyber currency, altcoins and blockchain! It all sounds so techie and complicated ...and this cybercoin mining business that uses the electrical power of a small country! Well....... Imagine a Cyber coin that is built on the world's fastest blockchain.    One that can be used for payment transactions to anyone who has the wallet... ...and...the best bit... Imagine a cyber coin that is fun to mine....and easy to mine..just by downloading a simple app onto your smart phone, putting on a good pair of walking shoes, opening the front door....turning on the app and having amazing fun searching and mining the virtual BitBob coins.....Fun, Exercise and Potential Profit!....and the only power used is your phone battery!
A Cyber Coin Treasure hunt via Augmented Reality
The BitBob is a cyber currency consisting of 1 billion cybercoins or tokens. ..created on the Waves blockchain.
What makes it special then?...... It is unique in the way it is mined...Everyone can mine BitBob..armed with the BitBob Go App downloaded onto their iphone or Android device.
How can that be? Mining uses heavy hardware resources..
BitBob is built on the the Waves blockchain platform. This means all the transaction recording is done by the Waves miners. BitBob is then free to be mined in a much more exciting and tech easy way!

REV+ Dual Electric Vehicle Home Charger, the first and only Dual Electric Vehicle Charger for the home, allows you to charge not one, but two electric vehicles at the same time while conveniently at home, for about the same cost of a single connector charger currently on the market. 

REV+ Dual Electric Vehicle Home Charger is designed by a team at Revitalize Charging Solutions, dedicated to helping EV drivers with cost-effective solutions with state of the art functionality.  

REV+ Dual Electric Vehicle Home Charger offers intelligent reporting and intuitive controls that EV drivers demand. REV+ is the only EV charging assistant for today's Electric Vehicle driver.  

In the near future, homes will have not one, but two electric vehicles.  REV+ Dual Electric Vehicle Home Charger provides you with the scalability to address your future charging needs.

Speed.  REV+ Dual Electric Vehicle Home Charger is capable of charging your electric car in less than 3 hours. Up to 10X faster than other chargers to keep you on the GO!​​

 

REV+ Dual Electric Vehicle Home Charger with its Universal SAE J1772 connector can charge most electric vehicles.  Charge two cars simultaneously with two independent connectors.  REV+ Dual Electric Vehicle Home Charger is capable of 12kWh at 50Amps
column2:
charging has never been easier and faster.  Patent pending technology made in the USA.

Mobile app integration is loaded with features to help save you money, time, and headaches.

column1: • Remote start and stop with the click of a button
• Energy reporting right from your mobile application
• Connect via Bluetooth, Wifi, and Web browser
• Receive notifications when you forget to plug in your vehicle or when a fault is received.
• Installation Type:  Hardwired or Plug. NEMA 3R Rating for Indoor or Outdoor Installation
• Connectivity:  WIFI, Bluetooth, Web Browser and Mobile Application
• Certification:  UL certification is pending.  Designed to UL2231 and UL2594

Designed with today and future Electric Vehicle drivers in mind.  We believe that the electric car charger is an extension of your electric vehicle purchase and you deserve the best in home charging experience possible.
column3:
showinfo=0"">

 

Can this be hardwired or plug?  The REV+ Dual Home Charger can be hardwired or use a NEMA 14-50 or 6-50 Plug.

What type of connector does the REV+ Dual Home Charger use?  REV+ Dual Home Charger use a universal SAE J1772 Connector.

What is the charge time of the REV+ Dual Home Charger?  3 hours or less at 50A – 12kWh.

Does the REV+ come with one or two connectors? 2

Can I use both connectors individually? Yes

How do I control the REV+ Dual Home Charger?  REV+ mobile application

Can the REV+ Dual Home Charger set custom charging schedules? YES

Do you have a support email?  YES.  Email us at info@revitalizechargingsolutions.com.

What are the voltage and amperage?  240V single phase – 50Amps

What is the required breaker size to operate at 50Amps?  60Amp breaker is required.

How does the REV+ Dual Home Charger communicate?  Bluetooth, WIFI, and Web Browser.

Can you set the REV+ to charge during Off Peak hours? YES.

Can you pull energy usage reports?  YES

What is the Warranty on REV+ Dual Home Charger? From shipment date, REV+ Dual Home Charger comes with a 3-Year warranty. 

What are your shipping methods?  FEDEX.

column2:
>

We are the staff of Broad Digital. We belong to one of the larger companies that develop today’s modern modular construction units. America’s struggle with COVID-19, racial tensions, and political and economic turmoil have moved us to action. We propose to raise $5 million to build a mixed-income affordable housing complex in New York City, using our unique construction and technology skills.

Homes will be move-in ready within just hours of shipping, with a cost per square foot far less than half that of traditional brick-and-mortar construction. The icing on the cake will be a large LED memorial stretching across the roof, dedicated to victims of COVID-19 as well as those medical, police, and other professionals in service of the country during its time of crisis.

Today, Americans are falling behind on mortgage and rent payments. The numbers have risen and many are alarmingly close to the edge. More than 300,000 people have fled New York City and up to 40 million Americans are facing eviction. This has not only to do with land speculation and the housing supply, but also with the high cost and risks of new construction.

Tomorrow’s cities in America, China, and all over the world are going to need to think differently about housing, affordability, and the way we run cities. We’ve always questioned the cost of housing construction and living costs. We believe that one way to reduce costs and risks is to develop efficient, consistent, durable construction modules that can be erected with much less effort, perhaps even easily relocated when the need arises. With the various risks reduced, people can live where and how they want to live, not forced to choose housing based primarily on the land value and income ratio.

With your help, our short-term goal for early 2021 is to build this 9-story, 18-apartment mixed-income development in the New York metro area. Each unit will be 1,453 square feet, providing comfortable two-bedroom apartments for dozens of New Yorkers. Total square footage will be about 29,063 square feet.

The long-term goal for Broad 5D is to give people more housing and relocation possibilities at a lower cost, so that they can reboot their careers and rebuild their hopes for the future. We believe our technology can be applied wherever people are seeking more sustainable housing and construction solutions.

 

Only two years old, Broad Digital is the young subsidiary of a much larger company. Broad Group Ltd. (broad.com), in operation since 1988, made its name constructing massive air purification systems for the world’s largest buildings and airports. Zhang Yue, our founder, won the coveted United Nations ""Champion of The Earth"" award in 2011 for his environmental leadership. In 2014, Fortune named him one of the World's Top 25 Eco-Innovators.

Our sister company, Broad Sustainable Building  (BSB), develops our innovative modular housing. There are a number of large-scale modular housing options, but none as fully developed or as rapid. We made WIRED and worldwide headlines when we built a 57-story modular office building in just 19 days. This past April, we built a fully compliant COVID hospital in Korea in three days. And it's just been announced that we are to help RCS Sport build a planned Playscraper ""tennis tower"" in Italy.

We are Broad Digital, building the high technology and imaginative vision behind Broad. Broad Digital is a team of 30 smart architects, designers, writers, video directors, marketers, IoT programmers, VR/AR developers, and support staff. We even have rocket scientists (really!): our own Jay Jiang went to Hainan Island in November to serve as announcer for the launch of China’s Chang’e moonshot.

 

In the proposed design by architect Len He, the entire structure is lifted by thin stainless steel columns, giving the appearance of floating aloft from a distance. We will also dock a large LED art display on the community rooftop. This is to create a memorial space for the lives we have lost because of COVID-19, as well as to convey respect and appreciation for the medical workers and other personnel dedicating their efforts to fighting COVID-19.

The underside of the roof is an LED matrix, while the upper side is a solar panel to supply the energy required by the LED. This forms an exhibition space and a common area for community activities and relaxation high above the city.
column5:
showinfo=0"">

Under the roof, of course, is a Broad 5D building, assembled with our state-of-the-art prefabricated building modules. All the structure and interior decoration are currently produced at our assembly plants in Hunan Province. Our unique automated assisted processes allow unprecedented production rates. At present, our facility has the capacity to produce one 646-square-foot building module every minute. These modules can be assembled and stacked much like Lego blocks, each unit able to be unfolded and move-in ready in just a couple of hours.

Our team will customize the program of LED display The current plan is to provide color indications of current air quality and other indicators (call it a ""mood roof""). On weekends, the roof will change to the form of a sea world, in memory of the heroes and victims of COVID-19. The design can be changed periodically, according to the season or community preference.
column7:
>Rendering of an air-quality indication design for the rooftop LED display.

Rendering of a sea-world design for heroes and victims of COVID-19.

BCore, the outer shell of Broad’s 5D modules, was inspired by aerospace hull technology. Lightweight stainless-steel panels are tied together by a network of tubular struts, sandwiching a thick layer of rockwool insulation. After nine years of exhaustive iteration, we have a product that is as strong as concrete, but much lighter, longer lasting, more insulative, and far more sustainable.

We have spent the last year fine-tuning 5D's manufacturing processes. We are now exercising our Yueyang assembly plant, stockpiling ready 5D housing modules at a rate of between 30 and 50 per day, although current full capacity is several times this speed. We are now breaking ground for four new domestic housing developments, and also setting up additional assembly lines. Finally, we have ambitious plans for sharing this technology worldwide, to realize even greater efficiencies.

These units come pre-equipped with owner-specified bath and kitchen fixtures, as well as other amenities and interior designs, even some start-up furniture if desired. What’s more, every 5D unit comes equipped with Broad’s air purification technology, the same as we have installed in the world’s largest airports and office towers.

Our parent company’s core skill is designing and building big things. We know that any large-scale project like this isn’t just a matter of shipping housing modules to some bare land and unfolding them. (We wish it were that easy!) Although we think we can do this better than competitors, this is one of the largest (and fastest) such projects planned for the U.S. There will be things to do before breaking ground. We will be partnering with a reputable affordable housing development company, who will help with acquiring and preparing the land, work with community partners, and assume management of the completed building.

We are soliciting contributions from the international community to fully develop this project. Contributions as little as $20 (see below) will be gratefully accepted. Even the smallest contribution will lead to your name being laser-engraved on the stainless-steel outside wall of the building, as well as having your name appear periodically on the roof LED display.

Note that if the campaign does not reach the goal of $5 million, the project will not proceed and all contributions will be returned. We will keep you posted on further developments and any concerns as they arise.

It sure would be nice to have the money. But we selected this unusual combination for some good reasons. First, we want to establish trust. We don’t want to spend a penny of your contributions unless and until an entire comprehensive project can be completed. Such a large goal will also push us forward in our fundraising efforts. We’re hard-working people, in at 8 a.m. and often staying late.

Finally, a large housing project is different than design of a new consumer product. We already have a fully funded and tested product. We have offices, we have staff. We are proud of the design’s rapid deployability, but this happens only after the land is acquired and other aspects are arranged. Land use is almost as complicated for one unit as it is for ten. Affordable housing projects that are too small tend to have higher risk. We might as well make this fairly big, because in this case the greater the project’s scale, the greater the efficiencies for the community.

Broad Digital will donate $180,000, enough for one 5D apartment for this project. 

In addition, when contributions reach $1 million, we will establish an affordable housing oversight committee (AHOC), to be managed by a board of nine stakeholder representatives:

column1: • a representative from a reputable affordable housing development company
• a (prospective or actual) tenant of the building
• a property owner in the building (or a second tenant)
• a neighbor of the development (after location is chosen)
• a representative from the city or township’s planning and development office
• a representative for the city or town council member for the chosen site
• an attorney specializing in housing law

The AHOC will be small enough to act quickly, but diverse enough to represent all interests with a stake in the development. Many projects are managed in a similar way, and we are already consulting the relevant experts.

One of the AHOC’s first jobs would be to scout a viable site for the project capable of supporting a a building footprint of 2,906 sq. ft.  and a total floor area of 29,063 sq. ft. It will take the first steps in ascertaining the banking and legal details of the project.

When the AHOC is formed, this will help spark momentum for our further fundraising efforts and will justify incrementally more detailed planning. The AHOC may also task itself with helping us push the fundraising goal. 

Broad Sustainable Building  (BSB), develops the innovative modular housing, the nickname is ""B5D"".  All the structure, MEP, strong &
column2: weak electricity, hard decoration of B5D are 95% prefabricated in the factory. Such an integrated module product have reduced the labor cost to a great extent and greatly shorten the construction cycle.
column5: >B5D Assembly Line
column18: >COVID hospital in Korea had been built in three days
column19:
> 

For years, affordable housing projects all over America have languished due to construction costs and delays. Today, things are even worse. Broad currently has perhaps the most complete and reliable solution for this and other development categories.

With your generous contribution, in one shot we can introduce this novel technology to America and also hit the ground contributing to solving the housing crisis. Engraving your name for posterity is only a small token for such a major gesture. If successful, we will roll out similar projects right away. And you'll have had a hand in it.

""This could be big,"" writes TreeHugger's Lloyd Alter, of Broad's sustainable 5D building technology. We sure hope so. This is only the beginning. Would you help us take this step?

Greetings!  We're here to show you our research for you to affordably get a near real-time warning of a wildfire in your area, or any area for that matter.  There's no doubt that the technology we're showing you is better than or equal to what's out there right now for immediately alerting neighborhoods, whole cities, fire fighters, and forest management professionals of a wildfire in near real-time, and thus almost certainly providing a better chance at saving lives, property, forests and grasslands.  The difference is, our system is inexpensive and can be deployed by anyone.  You could even cover all of Tongass National Forest, or as small as your city park, local forest, or prairie for a fraction of what those big systems cost.  Consider it a back-up to what's out there, or just another layer of security.

If you've ever lost everything you own to a fire, except literally the shirt on your back, as I and my family have, you know that you're thankful to be alive, but you feel the agony of remembering what you lost and cherished so much--your family pictures, the toys of your children, the house you and your spouse worked so hard to get, perhaps even your pet, and so on.  You wouldn't wish such a horrible fate on anyone, and in fact, just the opposite: you'd want to wish for them an early warning before a wildfire destroyed everything.

What we are asking for here is your help in continuing our efforts to develop this affordable wildfire detection technology--an inexpensive sensor that can be deployed in forests or grasslands.  Our current research has developed sensors which communicate with their neighbor sensors via radio signal in one big mesh network, with the data from all sensors going to a central Coordinator which sends data back via WiFi or cell phone SIM to a Web site and to YOU if a wildfire is near you.  Our plans are to extend the range of the sensors (currently 0.5 to 1.0 miles, or more, depending on terrain), finish development of the solar-powered Controller, develop satellite capabilities for even the deepest forests or jungles that are nowhere near cell phones or the Internet (e.g., the deep jungles of Borneo), continue development of infrared and sound detection, development of the database and graphing capabilities, neural network, machine learning, and other artificial intelligence techniques, as well as many other capabilities that will make Wildfire Watch the most comprehensive little, affordable wildfire detection system in the world.

Data recorded through time will develop trends and show when your area begins heating up sooner than expected and can allow you to prioritize and allocate resources to areas you think are more prone to the ignition and spread of a wildfire.

With Wildfire Watch sensors, you don't have to wait to hear about it from the evening news, a neighbor banging on your door, or God forbid, the horrible sound of a fire approaching your house.  The alert goes directly to our Web site, but also to your phone as a text, an email address, or even to your Apple Watch or Fitbit.

The colored icons are shown here on an example Real-Time Map page, which depicts an illustration of how a real fire in the eastern Everglades might look, with the user clicking on one of the red icons:

The data read-out shows that sensor #2006, detected a wildfire or 45.5 degrees Centigrade on December 12, 2018 at 7:08:52pm local time, or 12:08:52am GMT.  Again, this was not a real fire, but our sensors have been deployed in test situations and do in fact report exactly as shown in the automated texts and on our online map.

Our mesh sensor network works, but we need that extra push to manufacture more sensors, develop the back-end database to depict real-time graphs of the progress of temperatures, and add our next exciting line of communication:  satellite transmission from anywhere on the globe.
What We Need and What you Get

We have developed and tested our wildfire sensor prototype in the real world--in Colorado and in Florida.  It works!  What we need, though, is funding to continue the manufacturing of the thousands of these sensors that we know can help save lives and property, and to make sure we have the legal groundwork necessary to go to market.  We have the necessary patent applied for (Application Number 62698112), but we need to finalize that application with the Patent and Trademark Office by July, 2019
column2: and we need to have an attorney provide proper disclaimers and other proper documents for our new S Corporation, Wildfire Watch, Inc. (EIN 83-0721334).  What's required:

column1: $12,000 to begin manufacturing hundreds to thousands of the sensors
If we don't reach our goal of $20,000, we will still press forward and deliver on our perks, as promised, anyway--it will just take longer.
If we are so fortunate as to gain more than we are requesting, those funds will go to building more sensors and more advertising and thus saving more people, property, forests and grasslands.

Every sensor our contributors and users deploy helps to provide yet another early warning sentinel of a wildfire.  It may be a back-up to already existing wildfire monitoring technology, or a stand-alone wildfire monitoring network.  Maybe you don't have a spare $50K or $1M to deploy systems that are already out there.

The more fires that are detected and extinguished, the more people, property, forests and grasslands are saved.  Even if a system is in place where you live, Wildfire Watch adds a level of warning and security in quicker time than you may already have.  Talk to your City Council and see what they think!

A benefit you may not have thought of is also accrued:  the reduction of greenhouse gases that warm our planet, and which, in a vicious circle, make wildfires even more likely to start.  Not only are you helping to stop wildfires, you are also helping to reduce climate change!  Have you ever felt totally powerless to do anything about climate change?  That no longer is the case!  With every Wildfire Watch sensor you purchase, you are helping to reverse climate change.

Our goal is to provide you the earliest possible indication of a wildfire, so that your neighborhood can be protected as soon as possible.  Even if there are other detection methods available or currently operating, a Wildfire Watch Network in your neighborhood adds one more level of early warning and protection.

We are a small group with advisors--scientists, engineers, and entrepreneurs--who have studied environmental monitoring for many years, and who in one case has had experience with deploying many sensors in the field.  We know our stuff, and we guarantee you these sensors will work as deployed according to instructions.  However, there is no guarantee these sensors can save your life or your property
column2: rather, they offer an added layer of security and early warning to an oncoming wildfire.

column1: Although we can not make a guarantee of saving lives and property, we can certainly guarantee that our sensor technology works, and we have put two years into the development of this technology to reach those goals.
Maybe you can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:
Visit our Facebook Page and tell them about our campaign!
Tweet our campaign!  You can tweet to us at @wildfire_watch and tell others on Twitter.
Send folks in threatened areas to our Indiegogo Campaign site and to our home page at wildfirewatch.com.
Remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!

Greetings!  We're here to show you our research for you to affordably get a near real-time warning of a wildfire in your area, or any area for that matter.  There's no doubt that the technology we're showing you is better than or equal to what's out there right now for immediately alerting neighborhoods, whole cities, fire fighters, and forest management professionals of a wildfire in near real-time, and thus almost certainly providing a better chance at saving lives, property, forests and grasslands.  The difference is, our system is inexpensive and can be deployed by anyone.  You could even cover all of Tongass National Forest, or as small as your city park, local forest, or prairie for a fraction of what those big systems cost.  Consider it a back-up to what's out there, or just another layer of security.

If you've ever lost everything you own to a fire, except literally the shirt on your back, as I and my family have, you know that you're thankful to be alive, but you feel the agony of remembering what you lost and cherished so much--your family pictures, the toys of your children, the house you and your spouse worked so hard to get, perhaps even your pet, and so on.  You wouldn't wish such a horrible fate on anyone, and in fact, just the opposite: you'd want to wish for them an early warning before a wildfire destroyed everything.

What we are asking for here is your help in continuing our efforts to develop this affordable wildfire detection technology--an inexpensive sensor that can be deployed in forests or grasslands.  Our current research has developed sensors which communicate with their neighbor sensors via radio signal in one big mesh network, with the data from all sensors going to a central Coordinator which sends data back via WiFi or cell phone SIM to a Web site and to YOU if a wildfire is near you.  Our plans are to extend the range of the sensors (currently 0.5 to 1.0 miles, or more, depending on terrain), finish development of the solar-powered Controller, develop satellite capabilities for even the deepest forests or jungles that are nowhere near cell phones or the Internet (e.g., the deep jungles of Borneo), continue development of infrared and sound detection, development of the database and graphing capabilities, neural network, machine learning, and other artificial intelligence techniques, as well as many other capabilities that will make Wildfire Watch the most comprehensive little, affordable wildfire detection system in the world.

Data recorded through time will develop trends and show when your area begins heating up sooner than expected and can allow you to prioritize and allocate resources to areas you think are more prone to the ignition and spread of a wildfire.

With Wildfire Watch sensors, you don't have to wait to hear about it from the evening news, a neighbor banging on your door, or God forbid, the horrible sound of a fire approaching your house.  The alert goes directly to our Web site, but also to your phone as a text, an email address, or even to your Apple Watch or Fitbit.

Our mesh sensor network works, but we need that extra push to manufacture more sensors, develop the back-end database to depict real-time graphs of the progress of temperatures, and add our next exciting line of communication:  satellite transmission from anywhere on the globe.
What We Need and What you Get

CarbL

I am Paritosh Kr Rakesh, first year student of Applied Petroleum Engineering-Upstream from University of Petroleum and Energy Studies, Dehradun-India. I along with my other three team-mates:- Saket Kumar Shrivastava, Mayank Rakesh, Prabhash Kumar Sinha, designed a Portable Pollutant Eliminator to counter air-pollution caused by industrial exhaust gases. We started the R&
column2:
D work in the university laboratory itself. All the tests and chemical reactions were verified by our Proffessors themselves and we have all the verified results with their authorised signatures.We pitched our idea in Tech-stars global startup weekend which was sponsored by google and came out as runner-up. We named our startup as CarbL (slang for Carbon Elimination).We also gave presentation in front of angel investors, but they demanded a physical prototype. Hence we need funds for making the first working prototype. Contribute in making this project successful. 

The success of this project will be a success for the whole planet. Do come forward in making this a success.

 

","CarbLI am Paritosh Kr Rakesh, first year student of Applied Petroleum Engineering-Upstream from University of Petroleum and Energy Studies, Dehradun-India. I along with my other three team-mates:- Saket Kumar Shrivastava, Mayank Rakesh, Prabhash Kumar Sinha, designed a Portable Pollutant Eliminator to counter air-pollution caused by industrial exhaust gases. We started the R&D work in the university laboratory itself. All the tests and chemical reactions were verified by our Proffessors themselves and we have all the verified results with their authorised signatures.We pitched our idea in Tech-stars global startup weekend which was sponsored by google and came out as runner-up. We named our startup as CarbL (slang for Carbon Elimination).We also gave presentation in front of angel investors, but they demanded a physical prototype. Hence we need funds for making the first working prototype. Contribute in making this project successful. The success of this project will be a success for the whole planet. Do come forward in making this a success.",0.0,0,"1 Campaign

A-Zero is a powerful collaboration between artists, designers, and engineers from around the world. We’re all different, but with a single common goal - we all care for the environment! What does it really mean? As global plastic pollution reached unprecedented levels, we cannot just sit and passively observe the devastating changes caused by plastic.

A-Zero stands for “Zero plastic from A to Z”. There is a way to completely replace plastic bags and wraps: bio-degradable and compostable materials. A-Zero bags look like plastic by they aren't. They are reusable and recyclable but at the end they disintegrate into pure protein and do not pollute the environment. Needless to say that the environmental art on A-Zero bags is printed in organic inks. 

Our team strongly believes in being sustainable. We see this project as one step into the right direction, and each small step toward plastic-free eco-clean living counts!

The idea was inspired by learning about the recent advancements in developing consumer products derived from organic raw materials and their potential to reduce plastic consumption. We realized that many people may not know about these alternatives and the best way to help it thrive is to raise awareness. We see creative art as a common language that can unite people around the globe in mutual effort to clean our planet.
column26:
s=ceafe547db6be147b08a28c75e091875"" src=""""/>

Andy – co-creator:

“Each member of the team is passionate about conservation. Since we have members in different countries, we’re literally working day and night making A-Zero project a reality. We can’t sit and wait for governments to help us
column27:
we need to act, become more sustainable ourselves and demand cleaner living for our children!”

column2:
C (district heating and cooling) systems to convey heat energy over long distances via cost-effective flowlines installable with minimal surface disturbance.
