column10: >4th crowdfunding campaign with our most innovative power solutions. Our mission is to bring you solutions that lets you stay powered and connected anywhere.

column8: >We are so used to having power and connectivity in our lives, bringing our devices everywhere. But when we venture off-grid, power and connectivity can be quite unreliable. That's why we designed Omni Off-Grid, to help you prepare for any situation.

column3: >
>
>

column8: >We surveyed hundreds of users, feature by feature to balance what you need for your off-grid adventures and emergency situations.
>Our team has spent a lot of effort engineering a next-generation power station for today's digital adventurers. Powerful, without compromising mobility and versatility.
>Omni Off-Grid is equipped with all the power ports you need to charge all your devices. Each port is designed with the latest in fast charging technology.
>It's hard to predict what devices you will need in any given situation. That's why we designed the ultimate portable power solution
column9: so you can have peace of mind no matter what devices you use.

column8: >We designed the Omni Off-Grid to charge from as many options as possible so you'll never feel stranded. You can directly connect your solar panels, use our dedicated charger or even use your own USB-C charger!

>Whether you are a power user or just want peace of mind, you never need to worry about running out of power. You can easily hook up additional backup batteries for your own power solution, both for off-grid adventures or preparing for an emergency.

column9: >OMNI OFF-GRID extended battery has an impressive battery storage capability of up to

column8: >We integrated the latest in long range off-grid wireless technologies. Perfect for outdoor adventures, but also critical for emergency situations like blackouts or natural disasters. The Omni Connect Module comes with 4 Omni Connect devices and can be used <span style=""font-weight: 600
>A CONNECTIVITY SOLUTION THAT'S READY FOR ANY SITUATION

>Voice and text messages transmitted through Omni Connect use a new communication standard called LoRa. This allows you to send and receive messages using extraordinarily little power at very long range. You can read more about LoRa <a href=""https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/LoRa"" rel=""noopener nofollow"" style=""color: #246b9c
>Omni Connect doesn't require any 4g, wifi, or cloud
column9: it's your own private communication channel. Perfect for off-grid camping or emergencies when the grid is down.

column8: >EXPAND YOUR NETWORK'S REACH WITH OTHERS IN THE COMMUNITY
>For each Omni Connect device in use, the range of the community mesh expands. All devices operate on the same frequency, so everyone within range can act as relays for others.
>SECURELY COMMUNICATE WITH YOUR FAMILY AND FRIENDS
>Your smartphone handles the encryption and decryption using 128 bit AES and the devices it relays through can't decrypt the message.

>The Omnicharge mobile app provides an intuitive interface that allows you to interact with your Omni Off-Grid and Omni Connect. It also allows you to manage off-grid channels, track locations, and privately message your family and friends.

>NO CLOUD NETWORK NECESSARY
ALL DATA IS STORED ON YOUR SMARTPHONE

column9: >Since the beginning, our mission has been to bring power solutions that change how everyone interacts with their everyday devices. With the help and support of our backers, we've achieved big success in our past campaigns and have powered hundreds of thousands of professionals across the world.

>Thank you to the entire community for all the trust and patience you have given us over the years. We are excited to be back with the Omni Off-Grid, our 4th crowdfunding campaign and are excited to continue on our mission to power your journey.

>""...I have great respect for this company for turning out quality products. Additionally, the off-grid capability of this particular device has varied use cases ranging from recreational to supporting State/Federalagencies during critical moments and rapid disaster response.""

>""It was easy to back the Omni Off-Grid. I have 3 other Omni campaign products and use all of them reliably and keep them in my go-bag. I live in CA fire zones so having this quality equipment is vital, not just a nice to have.""
>""Omnicharge was designed and built to put all other portable battery banks to shame.""
> Will COVID affect the campaign?
column16: >So far COVID-19 has had zero impact on production. Our overseas production facility is working in full force. We don't foresee any delays due to the coronavirus.
column24: > Will the production models be exactly like the ones pictured?
column31: >No. We have a few tweaks to make and reserve the right to make modifications. We've already made some upgrades based on feedback from thousands of backers.
column46: >Yes! We use high-quality components and are in this for the long run. If you need any support at all you can reach our support team by email. All Omnicharge products are protected by a one year warranty.
column54: > How much does it weigh?
column61: >The Omni Off-Grid is both lighter and smaller than competition with similar capacity. In the current configuration, It weighs in at around 37lbs.
column69: > Can I take the Omni Off-Grid on a plane?
column76: >No. Under FAA regulations you are not allowed to take any battery exceeding 100Wh on a plane.
column84: > How frequently do I need to use or charge the device?
column91: >We recommend that you recharge the Omni Off-Grid at least once every six months. If user charges to 100%, unit can be placed in storage for 1 year in normal temperature environment.
column99: > Is there any water resistance?
column106: >Very light rain and other similar amounts of water won't affect the Omni, but be sure not to expose to heavy rain or water for safety reasons.

column9: > Will you also offer a 230V model?
column16: >Yes we will be supporting a 230V model with an international AC plug version of the Omni Off-Grid. Just select your perk, and you can choose the option you want shipped to you.
column24: > Is the solar charge controller mode MPPT or PWM?
column31: >We've incorporated an MPPT controller in both the Omni Off-Grid and Omni Extended Battery solar input ports.
column39: > Can I use a third party solar panel and what conditions need to be met?
column46: >Yes, you can. However, it must meet Open Circuit Voltage: 12-60V/Max.10A, Max.400W.
column54: > Can you recharge with Solar panel and the Wall Socket simultaneously?
column61: >Yes, you can, the total maximum input is 800W which recharges the Omni Off-Grid in 3 hours.
column69: > Does the Omni Off-Grid use a pure sine wave AC inverter?
column76: >Yes, all AC outlets on the Omni Off-Grid use pure sine wave inverters so you can safely power any equipment or appliance.
column84: > Can you charge and discharge the Omni Off-Grid simultaneously?
column91: >Yes, it supports pass through charging for both AC and DC loads. This means you charge the power station while simultaneously outputting power as well.
column99: > How fast can you charge it to 100%?
column106: >It takes about 3 hours to charge to 100% with 800W total input from solar + ac wall charging.
column114: > What is the surge power of the Omni Off-Grid?
column121: >It can reach up to 3000W surge.

column9: > How are the messages transmitted?
column16: >The messages and walkie talkie are transmitted through a new communication standard called LoRA. LoRA is a long range low power communication standard, that allows you to send and receive messages using extraordinarily little power at very long range. You can read more about LoRA <a href=""https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/LoRa"" rel=""noopener nofollow"" style=""color: #246b9c
column26: > What is the range of Omni Connect?
column33: >The range of Omni connect can vary greatly depending on the terrain you are operating in. If you are operating indoors in a big city, your range could be as low as 500m, but if you are in open terrain in the countryside you could get up to 3km for voice or up to 8km for text.
column41: > What LoRA frequency do you use?
column48: >We operate at sub gHz bandwidth around 800-900mHz.
column56: > How is my communication secured?
column63: >The encryption and decryption is handled on your smartphone using 128bit AES.
column71: > Can messages relay through people I don't know?
column78: >Yes, your encrypted message can be relayed via other omni connect users
column79: letting you expand your coverage through the Omni Community. The encryption and decryption is handled on your smartphone and cannot be decrypted by people it is relaying through.
column87: > Can a Omni connect device act as a relay if it's not paired with a smartphone?
column94: >Yes it can. The logic for transmitting a message is done on a hardware level, and the smartphone is only there to decrypt the message. This means that you can set up Omni Connect devices independently, and they can still act as relays.
column102: > How many times can a message be relayed?
column109: >Messages can be relayed up to 7 times.
column117: > Can I use the Omni Connect module independently?
column124: >Yes, the connect docking module has a separate USB-C charging port for use away from the Omni Off-Grid Power Station.
column132: > Can I use the Omni Connect Walkie Talkie independently?
column139: >Yes, each walkie-talkie can be used independently without the connect docking module. Each walkie-talkie comes with a USB-C charging port, and can be charged separately.

column16: >We expect to start shipping the first batches in the Summer of 2021. Shipping is first come first serve.
column24: > Will you ship to my country?
column31: >You can check what shipping countries are available by beginning the checkout process and inputting your shipping info. If your country is not available, please reach out to us at <a href=""mailto:support@omnicharge.co"" rel=""noopener nofollow"" style=""color: #246b9c
column41: > What is the shipping method?
column48: >Products will be shipped by sea to most countries in Europe and the US. Outside of this, orders will be shipped via air.
column63: >You can check the most updated shipping rate for your country by beginning the checkout process and inputting your shipping info. The shipping cost includes freight from our FACTORY all the way to local delivery in your home country.
column71: > Who is responsible for any additional taxes, duties or VAT?
column78: >For most countries VAT is included in the shipping costs. For countries like Norway and Switzerland, VAT and customs will need to be paid upon receipt. Countries that we can cover the customs clearance BUT DO NOT COVER TAX: Australia, New Zealand, South Korea, Singapore. Countries that we CANNOT COVER THE CUSTOMS CLEARANCE AND TAX: Norway and Switzerland.
column93: >Indiegogo currently accepts payments from direct credit/debit cards, Apple Pay, and Google Pay. If you'd like a payment option that is not currently supported (such as PayPal), please get in touch with us directly via <a href=""mailto:support@omnicharge.co"" rel=""noopener nofollow"" style=""color: #246b9c
column110: >Please refer to IndieGoGo's policy <a href=""https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles/526876-Refunds-Can-I-get-my-money-back-"" rel=""noopener nofollow"" style=""color: #246b9c
column112: target=""_blank"">HERE. We'll put the funds from Indiegogo directly into producing your order, and delivering each order is important for this project to work.

column1: We are back for our 4th crowdfunding campaign with our most innovative power solutions. Our mission is to bring you solutions that lets you stay powered and connected anywhere.

We are so used to having power and connectivity in our lives, bringing our devices everywhere. But when we venture off-grid, power and connectivity can be quite unreliable. That's why we designed Omni Off-Grid, to help you prepare for any situation.
We surveyed hundreds of users, feature by feature to balance what you need for your off-grid adventures and emergency situations.
Our team has spent a lot of effort engineering a next-generation power station for today's digital adventurers. Powerful, without compromising mobility and versatility.
CREATING THE MOST VERSATILE POWER SOLUTION
Omni Off-Grid is equipped with all the power ports you need to charge all your devices. Each port is designed with the latest in fast charging technology.
POWERFUL ENOUGH FOR ALL YOUR DEVICES
It's hard to predict what devices you will need in any given situation. That's why we designed the ultimate portable power solution
column2: so you can have peace of mind no matter what devices you use.

column1: We designed the Omni Off-Grid to charge from as many options as possible so you'll never feel stranded. You can directly connect your solar panels, use our dedicated charger or even use your own USB-C charger!

Whether you are a power user or just want peace of mind, you never need to worry about running out of power. You can easily hook up additional backup batteries for your own power solution, both for off-grid adventures or preparing for an emergency.
The OMNI OFF-GRID extended battery has an impressive battery storage capability of up to 1 year.
CAN EVEN POWER YOUR OFF-GRID COMMS

We integrated the latest in long range off-grid wireless technologies. Perfect for outdoor adventures, but also critical for emergency situations like blackouts or natural disasters. The Omni Connect Module comes with 4 Omni Connect devices and can be used INDEPENDENTLY from the Omni Off-Grid Station.
A CONNECTIVITY SOLUTION THAT'S READY FOR ANY SITUATION

Voice and text messages transmitted through Omni Connect use a new communication standard called LoRa. This allows you to send and receive messages using extraordinarily little power at very long range. You can read more about LoRa HERE.
Omni Connect doesn't require any 4g, wifi, or cloud
column2: it's your own private communication channel. Perfect for off-grid camping or emergencies when the grid is down.

column1: EXPAND YOUR NETWORK'S REACH WITH OTHERS IN THE COMMUNITY
For each Omni Connect device in use, the range of the community mesh expands. All devices operate on the same frequency, so everyone within range can act as relays for others.
SECURELY COMMUNICATE WITH YOUR FAMILY AND FRIENDS
Your smartphone handles the encryption and decryption using 128 bit AES and the devices it relays through can't decrypt the message.
CONTROL EVERYTHING THROUGH OUR MOBILE APP

The Omnicharge mobile app provides an intuitive interface that allows you to interact with your Omni Off-Grid and Omni Connect. It also allows you to manage off-grid channels, track locations, and privately message your family and friends.
NO CLOUD NETWORK NECESSARYALL DATA IS STORED ON YOUR SMARTPHONE

Since the beginning, our mission has been to bring power solutions that change how everyone interacts with their everyday devices. With the help and support of our backers, we've achieved big success in our past campaigns and have powered hundreds of thousands of professionals across the world.

Thank you to the entire community for all the trust and patience you have given us over the years. We are excited to be back with the Omni Off-Grid, our 4th crowdfunding campaign and are excited to continue on our mission to power your journey.

...I have great respect for this company for turning out quality products. Additionally, the off-grid capability of this particular device has varied use cases ranging from recreational to supporting State/Federalagencies during critical moments and rapid disaster response.""

It was easy to back the Omni Off-Grid. I have 3 other Omni campaign products and use all of them reliably and keep them in my go-bag. I live in CA fire zones so having this quality equipment is vital, not just a nice to have.""
Omnicharge was designed and built to put all other portable battery banks to shame.""

Will COVID affect the campaign? So far COVID-19 has had zero impact on production. Our overseas production facility is working in full force. We don't foresee any delays due to the coronavirus. Will the production models be exactly like the ones pictured? No. We have a few tweaks to make and reserve the right to make modifications. We've already made some upgrades based on feedback from thousands of backers. Is there a warranty? Yes! We use high-quality components and are in this for the long run. If you need any support at all you can reach our support team by email. All Omnicharge products are protected by a one year warranty. How much does it weigh? The Omni Off-Grid is both lighter and smaller than competition with similar capacity. In the current configuration, It weighs in at around 37lbs. Can I take the Omni Off-Grid on a plane? No. Under FAA regulations you are not allowed to take any battery exceeding 100Wh on a plane. How frequently do I need to use or charge the device? We recommend that you recharge the Omni Off-Grid at least once every six months. If user charges to 100%, unit can be placed in storage for 1 year in normal temperature environment. Is there any water resistance? Very light rain and other similar amounts of water won't affect the Omni, but be sure not to expose to heavy rain or water for safety reasons.Technical

Will you also offer a 230V model? Yes we will be supporting a 230V model with an international AC plug version of the Omni Off-Grid. Just select your perk, and you can choose the option you want shipped to you. Is the solar charge controller mode MPPT or PWM? We've incorporated an MPPT controller in both the Omni Off-Grid and Omni Extended Battery solar input ports. Can I use a third party solar panel and what conditions need to be met? Yes, you can. However, it must meet Open Circuit Voltage: 12-60V/Max.10A, Max.400W. Can you recharge with Solar panel and the Wall Socket simultaneously? Yes, you can, the total maximum input is 800W which recharges the Omni Off-Grid in 3 hours. Does the Omni Off-Grid use a pure sine wave AC inverter? Yes, all AC outlets on the Omni Off-Grid use pure sine wave inverters so you can safely power any equipment or appliance. Can you charge and discharge the Omni Off-Grid simultaneously? Yes, it supports pass through charging for both AC and DC loads. This means you charge the power station while simultaneously outputting power as well. How fast can you charge it to 100%? It takes about 3 hours to charge to 100% with 800W total input from solar + ac wall charging. What is the surge power of the Omni Off-Grid? It can reach up to 3000W surge. Is the DC 12v regulated? Yes, it is.Omni Connect

How are the messages transmitted? The messages and walkie talkie are transmitted through a new communication standard called LoRA. LoRA is a long range low power communication standard, that allows you to send and receive messages using extraordinarily little power at very long range. You can read more about LoRA HERE. What is the range of Omni Connect? The range of Omni connect can vary greatly depending on the terrain you are operating in. If you are operating indoors in a big city, your range could be as low as 500m, but if you are in open terrain in the countryside you could get up to 3km for voice or up to 8km for text. What LoRA frequency do you use? We operate at sub gHz bandwidth around 800-900mHz. How is my communication secured? The encryption and decryption is handled on your smartphone using 128bit AES. Can messages relay through people I don't know? Yes, your encrypted message can be relayed via other omni connect users
column2: letting you expand your coverage through the Omni Community. The encryption and decryption is handled on your smartphone and cannot be decrypted by people it is relaying through. Can a Omni connect device act as a relay if it's not paired with a smartphone? Yes it can. The logic for transmitting a message is done on a hardware level, and the smartphone is only there to decrypt the message. This means that you can set up Omni Connect devices independently, and they can still act as relays. How many times can a message be relayed? Messages can be relayed up to 7 times. Can I use the Omni Connect module independently? Yes, the connect docking module has a separate USB-C charging port for use away from the Omni Off-Grid Power Station. Can I use the Omni Connect Walkie Talkie independently? Yes, each walkie-talkie can be used independently without the connect docking module. Each walkie-talkie comes with a USB-C charging port, and can be charged separately.Payments & Shipping

column1: When does it ship? We expect to start shipping the first batches in the Summer of 2021. Shipping is first come first serve. Will you ship to my country? You can check what shipping countries are available by beginning the checkout process and inputting your shipping info. If your country is not available, please reach out to us at support@omnicharge.co. What is the shipping method? Products will be shipped by sea to most countries in Europe and the US. Outside of this, orders will be shipped via air. How Much is Shipping? You can check the most updated shipping rate for your country by beginning the checkout process and inputting your shipping info. The shipping cost includes freight from our FACTORY all the way to local delivery in your home country. Who is responsible for any additional taxes, duties or VAT? For most countries VAT is included in the shipping costs. For countries like Norway and Switzerland, VAT and customs will need to be paid upon receipt. Countries that we can cover the customs clearance BUT DO NOT COVER TAX: Australia, New Zealand, South Korea, Singapore. Countries that we CANNOT COVER THE CUSTOMS CLEARANCE AND TAX: Norway and Switzerland. How can I pay? Indiegogo currently accepts payments from direct credit/debit cards, Apple Pay, and Google Pay. If you'd like a payment option that is not currently supported (such as PayPal), please get in touch with us directly via support@omnicharge.co. What's the refund policy? Please refer to IndieGoGo's policy HERE. We'll put the funds from Indiegogo directly into producing your order, and delivering each order is important for this project to work.",52.0,1,"4 Campaigns

column1: • Get tips to lower your CO2 footprint
• Get warned about risks or before disaster strikes

column2:
> 

PowerX Heat can find and optimize the hot water for all of these appliances and elements:

 

PowerX Heat is a DIY, quick, plug-and-play solution to help you get informed and make positive changes when it comes to your gas or electric water heater. Unlike the other sensors, you don’t have to control anything — install PowerX Heat and it saves you money automatically.

 

PowerX Heat will:

column1: • Check your water heater for maintenance needs
• Collect info on how much heated water each appliance in your home uses
• Learn the preferred water temperature of your home and run the heater more efficiently
• Use artificial intelligence to optimize the water heater
• Provide a comparison to your neighbor’s water heater usage

column2:
> 

 

PowerX Water can find and optimize the water usage for all of these appliances and elements:

 

PowerX Water is also a DIY, quick, full plug-and-play installation that attaches to your main water pipe. It does not require plumbing experience, maintenance or a lubricant to couple ultrasound sensors with the pipe — attach to the pipe and you’re done.

 

No technical parts need to be in or near the water so that it won't break or malfunction. PowerX Water works with all common residential pipe sizes (0.75-1.5 inches) and pipe materials (PVC, copper, steel). This is revolutionary for ultrasound water meters.

 

PowerX Water will:

column1: • Identify and monitor most water outlets to show how much different outlets use
• Provide automatic water leak detection in the entire home

column2:
> 

PowerX Electricity will find all of these devices and monitor usage once installed into your Electric panel:

 

PowerX Electricity easily attaches to your electrical panel. It can be installed DIY in less than 30 minutes but should be installed by an electrician. Because PowerX uses LoRa technology to send data, there is no need to drill a hole in the circuit breaker box for an antenna and no need to buy a wireless repeater.

 

PowerX Electricity will:

column1: • Detect appliances and break-out usage by appliance
• Alert you when you’re paying for your neighbor’s utility bill

column2:
> 

PowerX Hub connects all of your PowerX devices into one Energy Suite. Featuring WiFi, LAN and LoRa connectivity, the PowerX Hub can send and receive data up to one mile (if there are no walls). So, there’s no problem if your sensors are in the basement and there is no internet. The PowerX Hub connects the PowerX Sensors to the internet for you. 

The PowerX Hub is also plug-and-play, USB-powered and compatible with Google Home and Alexa. 

 

Please note that PowerX may not be compatible with some homes in Europe. Please message us with further questions.
column3:
> 

As one of the first crowdfunding marketing agencies, Enventys Partners has brought more than 750 crowdfunding projects to life through lead generation, campaign page creation, public relations, email marketing, Facebook Advertising, campaign management and more.
column4:
> 

 

The PowerX mission is to combat climate change through software and hardware. Founder and CEO, Manuel Schönfeld found a way to help save CO2 and help make a dent with climate change without asking people to change their behavior or suffer from a decrease in comfort.

Now, the PowerX team is turning to Kickstarter and Indiegogo to launch their flagship line of PowerX sensors, PowerX Heat, PowerX Water and PowerX Electricity, to help people make a difference, right at home.
column6:
showinfo=0"">

We can’t thank you enough for checking out our project and helping us make PowerX Energy Suite a reality.

We know not everyone will be able to support us with a pledge, so even if you can’t give a dollar or pre-order a PowerX Energy Suite, if you’re a supporter of PowerX Energy Suite, you can help us spread the word on Twitter, Facebook, Reddit, Instagram and anywhere else you can think of!

 

Risks and Challenges 

There are always certain risks that can arise at any moment during a project like this. That being said, we’re confident in our ability to produce, and have taken all the necessary measures. We have a highly qualified team and have partnered with leading manufacturing and fulfillment companies around the world. We just need your help to bring everything to fruition. Don’t worry, we’re completely prepared to bring PowerX Energy Suite to your home, and we have the manpower to make it happen, but if anything comes up along the way, you’ll be the first to know.

ICEGONE is a thawing plate that can defrost frozen food 8x faster than room temperature, getting your meats from frozen to cooking-ready in just 10~20 minutes. It requires no electricity and helps all portions of food to thaw quickly and safely, helping you cook meat better, faster.
column3:
showinfo=0"">

 

 

While the microwave or warm water smash vital flavors and vitamins of your food, ICEGONE is able to keep all the original flavors and freshness of your food with a natural defrosting process.

 

ICEGONE could defrost food quickly within minutes. Compared to other brands in the market, the thawing speed of ICEGONE is even faster owing to its premium aluminum material and deep draining channel.

 

 

Depending on the thickness of the food, you may need 10-30 minutes to melt down the ice. It is perfect for defrosting steak, fish, chicken breast, burger patties, pork chops, and more.

 

 

 

Got a luxurious surf and turf to prepare? Need to deal with a really large piece of meat? Why not try 2x ICEGONE together? Rest two pieces on separate ICEGONE, or place the entire chunk on 2x ICEGONE put together, and have them fast defrosted simultaneously. So you can cut your cooking time in half.

 

 

When using conventional defrosting methods,  the food being defrosted has been processed during the defrosting process before you actually start cooking, which potentially be harmful to your health. 

 

 

ICEGONE has the unique ability to maintain the original flavor and texture of the meat while defrosting at extraordinary speeds. 

 

 

Crafted of super efficient aluminum alloy, ICEGONE is able to warm and defrost your meat quickly and evenly. 

 

 

In addition, along with heat fins below and internal thermal liquid, it allows for more airflow and speeds up the heat exchange between the frozen food and the temperature of the room.

 

 

 

 

Except for melting down the ice, ICEGONE also features an excellent ability of drawing away heat. The heat of the food will be absorbed by the aluminum material in a short time to cool down your fresh food out of the oven.

 

ICEGONE is made of premium aluminum with a non-stick surface. It is effortless to use and easy to clean. 

 

 

The material used for ICEGONE doesn’t contain any toxic chemicals, which means it’s dishwasher safe. 

 

 

Measuring 13.6”x8.5”x0.4’’ and weighing at 34oz, ICEGONE is fairly slim and flat, so you can easily find a spot for it in your cabinet or dish drying rack.

 

 

Unitrength enhances people’s lives through thoughtful design and brilliant innovation. We want to empower people’s potential to do things more impressively or easily than they’d thought possible in their own kitchen. We utilize advanced materials and components from industries to create unique, never-before-seen kitchenware solutions.

>Geizeer is patented and manufactured in Italy

column1: Geizeer was born from the necessity to make our work environment more comfortable, at a cost of 1 cent per day.

It is not always possible nor healthy to use air conditioners on a daily basis. The high energy consumption makes it a comfortable accessory but an excessive use can cause discomfort, such as headache, stiff neck, back pain and respiratory problems. And that goes for the use of fans: by mobilizing the air, you can feel a sense of coolness but, in the meantime, you are stimulating sweat and increasing the risk of dehydration.

column3:
> 

Working, studying, sleeping, watching TV or enjoying a meal can be difficult during the hot sunny days as a consequence.​ Hence the idea of Geizeer, a  personal eco- friendly ice cooling with refrigerant mixtures, which consumes less than 1 cent per day!

column2:
> 

Geizeer is made of wood, a perfect thermal insulator. Externally it is composed of two wooden shells and metal finishing frames. Internally it contains a rechargeable battery, a micro USB port with PCBs, a DC brushless fan, an ice pack and a black insulating pads to protect the wooden structure.

column4: '>The two halves of the  cube, the upper one and the bottom, form a cube when you overlap them, graced by a metal frame. On two of the four wooden legs there are electrical contacts that allow the operation of the fan. The lower half has an isolated space for a rechargeable battery and a PCB with micro USB port. Above this space, the cooling elements has to be entered. In the upper half   a brushless fan is enclosed . The fan draws hot air from the upper grid which forces a loss within the cube. After a few seconds in contact with the ice pack, the cool air is pushed out 360 ° from the cracks that divide in half Geizeer.
column7: '> Geizeer comes from micro-USB to USB cable.

column12: >Once we had the idea of ​​starting a Geizeer, the design process began by developing the study of form, an essential step to refine this design in a short time. The first drawings were made on paper, and then transformed into three-dimensional models using CAD programs.

column8: >the first prototypes
column11: >, a 3D printer FDM (Fused Deposition Modeling) was used. This allows you to have, in a short time, various forms of different sizes, giving us the opportunity to do the efficiency test. From here we have selected and worked on the most functional form, refining the design.

column2: >
column8: >the second phase
column11: > of prototyping a CNC pantograph was used to obtain the prototypes as similar as possible for a display speech of the product, conceived to make the most of the efficiency and functioning with wood test.

column17: >, Geizeer was finished and colored by the expert hands of Italian craftsmen.

column3: > In the last phase, the electrical and decorative components have been mounted.

column1: Geizeer's use is very simple. You just have to enter the cooling elements, previously frozen in the freezer, into bottom of the cube. And then, overlap the upper half of the cube on the bottom by aligning the two dots of each half.
In that position, the contacts come together, the electrical circuit is closed, and the fan works. To turn it off, you just have to raise the upper half and rotate it.
That’s right. There are no ignition keys!

column4: >We have studied this method of ignition to make Geizeer as safe as possible, even in the presence of children or animals.
>In fact, the fan will run only if the cube is closed !

column1: The fan draws hot air from the upper grid which forces a loss within the cube.
After a few seconds in contact with the ice pack, the cool air is pushed out 360 ° from the cracks that divide in half Geizeer.

column2: >The ice pack is also equipped with a concave space where you can insert perfume that will make environment fragrant.

column5: >The small size of the Geizeer makes it portable and can be used in any environment.
column10:
>

The corners are rounded, the electrical components are concealed in the specific spaces , the metal frames attach perfectly to the wood and the ice pack acts as a cone-shaped diffuser in order to make the escape of air easier, increasing the flow and range. In this way, it prevents an overheating of indoor air, due to the mechanical rotation of the blades.

column1: Using Geizeer for 24 hours, the power consuption will be about 1 cent. The cooling element, previously frozen, is sealed and it contains a mixture of gels. It has a duration of about 4 hours before melting and it can be reused.

column8: >The electrical components of Geizeer are retractable into the wood and the ignition is given by the contact of 4 metal feet that, depending on the placement of the two halves of the cube, turn on or off the circuit. The Li-Po battery lasts around 3 to 5 hours, depending on the selected speed level of the fan, and it is charged via micro-USB cable.

column2: >
column5: >Geizeer provides for a micro-USB cable with a logo that turns red when battery is charging, and it turns blu when battery is fully charged.

column1: The cold air is pushed out at 360 ° from the slots which divide in half the cube to a diameter of about 1.20m. This system allows the refreshment of the entire area around Geizeer, unlike other unidirectional ventilation systems (for example some people sitting around a table). The brushless DC fan is powered at 12V and it has a life span of over 160,000 hours.

column2:
> 

The wood has exceptional thermal characteristics, in fact, is a microscopic material that absorbs moisture easily, in addition to being a perfect thermal insulator.

column5: '>Given its low conductivity and thermal capacity, the inside of Geizeer will stay cold and isolated from the external environment heat. It allows a good energy saving and longer life of an ice pack.

column4:
>

 

Geizeer is available with 2 different grids , designed by parametric equations: Linear and Parametric. (the difference is only in the design)

column11: > Geizeer is available in different colors: Natural

In a case of cancellation we will refund your pledge. Again, there may be additional duties, fees or taxes raised by the authorities in your country. Please, take care of them by yourself when will receive the shipment.

column1: Geizeer is patented and manufactured in Italy
Geizeer was born from the necessity to make our work environment more comfortable, at a cost of 1 cent per day.

It is not always possible nor healthy to use air conditioners on a daily basis. The high energy consumption makes it a comfortable accessory but an excessive use can cause discomfort, such as headache, stiff neck, back pain and respiratory problems. And that goes for the use of fans: by mobilizing the air, you can feel a sense of coolness but, in the meantime, you are stimulating sweat and increasing the risk of dehydration.

Working, studying, sleeping, watching TV or enjoying a meal can be difficult during the hot sunny days as a consequence.​ Hence the idea of Geizeer, a  personal eco- friendly ice cooling with refrigerant mixtures, which consumes less than 1 cent per day!

Geizeer is made of wood, a perfect thermal insulator. Externally it is composed of two wooden shells and metal finishing frames. Internally it contains a rechargeable battery, a micro USB port with PCBs, a DC brushless fan, an ice pack and a black insulating pads to protect the wooden structure.

The two halves of the  cube, the upper one and the bottom, form a cube when you overlap them, graced by a metal frame. On two of the four wooden legs there are electrical contacts that allow the operation of the fan. The lower half has an isolated space for a rechargeable battery and a PCB with micro USB port. Above this space, the cooling elements has to be entered. In the upper half   a brushless fan is enclosed . The fan draws hot air from the upper grid which forces a loss within the cube. After a few seconds in contact with the ice pack, the cool air is pushed out 360 ° from the cracks that divide in half Geizeer. Geizeer comes from micro-USB to USB cable.

Once we had the idea of ​​starting a Geizeer, the design process began by developing the study of form, an essential step to refine this design in a short time. The first drawings were made on paper, and then transformed into three-dimensional models using CAD programs.

For the first prototypes, a 3D printer FDM (Fused Deposition Modeling) was used. This allows you to have, in a short time, various forms of different sizes, giving us the opportunity to do the efficiency test. From here we have selected and worked on the most functional form, refining the design.

During the second phase of prototyping a CNC pantograph was used to obtain the prototypes as similar as possible for a display speech of the product, conceived to make the most of the efficiency and functioning with wood test.
In the third phase, Geizeer was finished and colored by the expert hands of Italian craftsmen.
In the last phase, the electrical and decorative components have been mounted.

Geizeer's use is very simple. You just have to enter the cooling elements, previously frozen in the freezer, into bottom of the cube. And then, overlap the upper half of the cube on the bottom by aligning the two dots of each half.
In that position, the contacts come together, the electrical circuit is closed, and the fan works. To turn it off, you just have to raise the upper half and rotate it.
That’s right. There are no ignition keys!
We have studied this method of ignition to make Geizeer as safe as possible, even in the presence of children or animals.
In fact, the fan will run only if the cube is closed !
The fan draws hot air from the upper grid which forces a loss within the cube.
After a few seconds in contact with the ice pack, the cool air is pushed out 360 ° from the cracks that divide in half Geizeer.
The ice pack is also equipped with a concave space where you can insert perfume that will make environment fragrant.

The small size of the Geizeer makes it portable and can be used in any environment.The corners are rounded, the electrical components are concealed in the specific spaces , the metal frames attach perfectly to the wood and the ice pack acts as a cone-shaped diffuser in order to make the escape of air easier, increasing the flow and range. In this way, it prevents an overheating of indoor air, due to the mechanical rotation of the blades.

Using Geizeer for 24 hours, the power consuption will be about 1 cent. The cooling element, previously frozen, is sealed and it contains a mixture of gels. It has a duration of about 4 hours before melting and it can be reused.

The electrical components of Geizeer are retractable into the wood and the ignition is given by the contact of 4 metal feet that, depending on the placement of the two halves of the cube, turn on or off the circuit. The Li-Po battery lasts around 3 to 5 hours, depending on the selected speed level of the fan, and it is charged via micro-USB cable.
Geizeer provides for a micro-USB cable with a logo that turns red when battery is charging, and it turns blu when battery is fully charged.

The cold air is pushed out at 360 ° from the slots which divide in half the cube to a diameter of about 1.20m. This system allows the refreshment of the entire area around Geizeer, unlike other unidirectional ventilation systems (for example some people sitting around a table). The brushless DC fan is powered at 12V and it has a life span of over 160,000 hours.
The wood has exceptional thermal characteristics, in fact, is a microscopic material that absorbs moisture easily, in addition to being a perfect thermal insulator.
Given its low conductivity and thermal capacity, the inside of Geizeer will stay cold and isolated from the external environment heat. It allows a good energy saving and longer life of an ice pack.
Geizeer is available with 2 different grids , designed by parametric equations: Linear and Parametric. (the difference is only in the design)
Geizeer is available in different colors: Natural and Lacquer.
When you select a Perk, please, remember that the customers duties, if provided, are at the expense of the addressee.

Please be aware : we cannot control or eliminate duties, Customs fees and shipping cost to your country. Please note that shipping to any country outside the United States, Canada, and the EU may be delayed or cancelled depending on the feasibility of local import regulations. In a case of cancellation we will refund your pledge. Again, there may be additional duties, fees or taxes raised by the authorities in your country. Please, take care of them by yourself when will receive the shipment.
Thank you so much for having a look at our project!!!

During the design phase we came in contact with suppliers to obtain quotes and production time.Parties requesting more time for production are the mold for the ice pack and the wooden shells.We will start the production of the mold as soon as the goal is exceeded so as to fall in line with delivery.For wood production we are already in contact with several work centers that provide us with a production lot more than the number of pieces for the achievement of the goal.If the campaign far exceeds our expectations we will move to look for other suppliers. The challenge of the project is to receive a quantity of orders higher than expected, but we are taking precautions by contacting multiple vendors.",52.0,2,"7 Campaigns

Saving the world, one houseplant at a time!

We’re not all blessed with green fingers. That dying basil...wilted shrub...we feel you. No plant lover should cry over one-too-many failed green projects, but no plant should suffer either! How then? We tackle the root cause.

What's killing your plant? 
We did some digging and found the Top 3 criminals wanted for plant killing.

Don’t you worry, we’ve designed the perfect plant crime-fighter: Plant Hero.

Plant Hero is a cruelty-and-fuss free method of growing potted beauties. This designed-registered planter comes with features to tackle the top 3 plant killers. Plus, we've equipped it with extra features that'll add more 'Eureka!' to your gardening experience.
column3:
'>Super-charge your gardening experience with the perfect fusion of science, nature, simplicity and just sheer fun!

 

Yes, it's self-watering. When it comes to watering your plant, feel free to forget for a week or even a month! Plant Hero does the job for you.

How? Water is held in the tank by atmospheric pressure. It will gradually seep out onto the receded tray, and then reabsorbed by your plant through a special ceramic medium.

Your one job is to refill the water tank whenever it gets low. A full tank lasts for about a month or more, depending on the temperature and humidity of the environment (psst, that’s only 12 refills a year).

How much or how little to water? Plant Hero eliminates the guesswork by mimicking Mother Nature. Your plant decides when and how much to drink by absorbing water naturally from bottom-up.

Benefits? It creates a consistent water cycle that keeps your plant gorgeous &
column4:
healthy - Mother Nature knows best.

It's not soil. We're using a special type of ceramic medium that has excellent properties for hydration. It is also pH neutral, disease resistant, AND pest resistant - yup, no worms!

How does it help? This ceramic medium has the ability to hold water and nutrients like your plant's life depends on it - #ItDoes.

So, no need to panic if you forgot to refill the water tank (again). This medium will remain moist for an extra 1 to 2 weeks, keeping your plant well-hydrated!

Vit-A, B or C? Nutrient deficiency is one of the top three plant killers. But, It's not vit-A, B or C, it’s vit-P, N and K (Phosphorus, Nitrogen, and Potassium) that your plant craves!

How then? We created a multi-vitamin pill that contains a special mix of P, N and K nutrients, as well as probiotic microbes. This will keep your plant strong and healthy.

No messy wires, no plugs. We built Plant Hero to run on zero electricity. Every essential process is powered by nature. No need to worry about the voltage or the international adapter.

Benefit? Zero electricity means its kind on your utility bill and the environment. Plus, you can place it wherever - there are no wires.

Build, Decorate, Done. You know that zen feeling when decorating your pot and arranging your plants? What about the pain of watering them and accidentally knocking over the decor?

How then? With Plant Hero, you'll only experience the fun in building and decorating your pot. All other duties are taken care of.

Important Note: All prices indicated do not include shipping. The shipping cost indicated in the reward tiers are just estimates. The exact shipping fees will be finalized during the fulfilment stage. This allows us to better estimate the shipping cost based on the number of sets that will be shipped to each destination. We are doing this to avoid over-charging you for shipping!

Please also note that the Plant Hero set doesn't come with any plant. 

 

 

     

What happens when an avid inventor meets a bio-scientist? Numerous failed experiments, countless nights, endless cups of coffee...it doesn't end.
Multiply this with persistence and 1.5 years, and we'll have Plant Hero!

column1: Product development is always risky due to challenges such as finding reliable manufacturers, perfecting prototypes as well as fulfiling production costs.

However, we are confident that we have the expertise, experience and passion to bring Plant Hero to you. Roderick is an avid inventor and has successfully launched several products, while Kris who runs In Vitro, has a strong background in manufacturing and logistics.
At present, we have manufactured a working prototype and product mould. While there may be minor changes to the design and features, we are confident in our ability to produce Plant Hero.

column2: >Occa Solar Light comes with a detachable metal stand and a comfortable headband to allow you to have light in any situation. Convert your Occa from a posable lamp to a portable light, for reading, pitching your tent or simply walking your dog in the dark.
>Occa’s high efficiency PV solar panel gives you up to 15 hours of light from a single charge. There’s backup USB-C charging too, so you’ll never be left in the dark - even on the cloudiest of days.

>We pledge that for every Occa Solar light purchased, we will donate one of our award-winning SM100 solar lights. When you buy a light, you’re directly helping give people without access to electricity in Kenya and South Africa a solar light to read, study and learn safely after dark.
>
column4: >It’s not just about making life easier for our fellow humans. We also aim to make a difference for other species.
column5: >Our solar lights are used to help with conservation and the 24-hour protection of native, and endangered animals.
column23: >Choose between cool and warm light settings.
column52: >The conveniently small and sleek shape makes Occa the perfect travel buddy and a backpack must-have.
column63: >Help the planet by reducing waste and toxic chemicals from disposable batteries.
column64: >Inbuilt solar PV panel means your light comes straight from the sun - not expensive, disposable batteries. Charge Occa over and over again and never pay to power your light!
column68: >Our product is designed to be truly sustainable, with modular features that can be replaced so it won’t end up in landfill after a season.
column78: >By changing the way people study, work, and play, we can fight climate change together with sustainable lights that work for people and the planet.
column83: >We want to bring everyone, everywhere - access to clean, modern energy by connecting people to the sun. We deliver end-to-end, scalable solar solutions that save money and combat climate change.
column88: >We work in communities with limited access to electricity, empowering them to eliminate carbon emissions and helping them save money by alleviating the cost of kerosene fuel.
column94: >Qhubeka is a charity that helps people with little access to transportation in Africa. Their bicycles improve access to schools, clinics and jobs, and make it easier and quicker to carry goods, like water and food. As the recipients of our solar lights, Qhubeka can make traveling by bicycle safer and brighter.
column99: >HODI works to champion justice and development in the Horn of Africa through advocacy, education, peace building and sustainable livelihoods. Our lights will be distributed to the young women and girls they work with. This will give them access to a lightweight, portable solar light for studying, reading and traveling safely without having to rely on kerosene fuel or pay for expensive batteries.
column104: >Get Ahead Project Schools are low-fee, independent schools situated in Komani and Whittlesea, Eastern Cape, South Africa, providing quality education to black African youth, from local rural townships. Our solar lights will be donated to students to ensure that they have safe, solar lighting for studying when electricity fails, due to lack of reliable and consistent service provision.

Every year, 12 billion pads are sent to North American landfills, taking up to 800 years to completely biodegrade.
column2: >Most disposable menstrual pads, along with other waste, take hundreds of years to completely biodegrade. click the picture to find out more.
column3:
> 

The problem with reusable menstrual pads or period cups is that they can be messy or uncomfortable, so they’re just not the right fit for everyone. That’s why we felt we needed to create a better solution. Menstrual pads that are both convenient and disposable, while also being earth-friendly. 

 

 

 

Ruth pads are so convenient to use that you won’t even notice a difference in your period care routine. Being eco-friendly never felt so easy.

 

 

Our pads are biodegradable, 93% bio-based, and made without harmful plastic that traditional pads are made of. Traditional pads can take up to 800 years to break down! That's a long time!

 

 

 

 

Want to be sustainable but tired of washing your menstrual cup or period underwear? We’ve got you covered. Other sustainable menstrual product options often require washing and can take some time to get used to. Sometimes, we just don’t have the time to take care of reusable products or they can feel uncomfortable.

 

 

 

 

We ran multiple tests to make sure our pads are highly absorbent with a leakproof layer and starch-based bioplastic backing.

 

 

For the days when you’ve got a lot on your plate, Ruth is here for you. Ruth pads make convenient period care guilt-free. Unlike other disposable pads that are made from harmful plastic, Ruth pads are made from natural materials that are better for the environment.
column4:
>You can be sustainable even when you’re on the go.

 

 

These pads are so soft and absorbent that you won’t even notice you’re wearing a pad. And guess what? We had 70 beta-testers try them and here's what they said:

 

 

 

Our pads are made with 93% bio-based material. These materials include bamboo fibre, kenaf fibre, wood pulp,  and starch based film.

 

We are revolutionizing sustainable period care by starting straight from the raw materials. Our two key ingredients are kenaf fibre, and starch-based bioplastic.

 

 

 

Getting access to menstrual products can be tough, and it can be even harder to find products that are both comfortable and sustainable. Help us fight against period poverty. If you purchase the 'Donator Activator', ‘Superstar Supporter’, or ‘Social Supporter’ tier, you can help us donate hundreds of pads to the people who need it most.

 

At Ruth, we want to see sustainable menstrual products made accessible. We are partnering with shelters and organizations across Canada to help reduce period poverty nationally.
column5: >Pads from the Donator Activator, Social Supporter, and Superstar Supporter perks will be donated to these shelters. Click the picture to find out more.
column7:
> 

 

Sick of the stigma surrounding menstruation? We are too. Let’s start talking about menstruation, and about accessible period products for everyone. Ruth is dedicated to reducing the stigma around menstruation by encouraging conversation &
column8: education about period poverty, menstrual health, and sustainable period care.
column9: >We are committed to holding a safe and inclusive space for people to talk about their period experience, share about menstrual health, and work towards ending period poverty together.
column10:
> 

 

We understand your period care needs because we menstruate too. Our mission is to increase access to convenient menstrual products that aren't harmful to the environment.

 

Ruth co-founders Nicole and Anka met at the University of Alberta in 2018 through Enactus - a student group focused on social entrepreneurship. They led a project aimed at tackling menstrual waste and worked to create sustainable menstrual products from the lab bench. Nearly three years of prototyping led them to launch their company, Ruth, in January 2021.

 

See the about section on our website to learn more about the co-founders' story.
column11: >Co-Founders: Nicole Sanchez and Anka Chan
column12:
> 

Our team is comprised of wonderful people working incredibly hard to accomplish the vision of accessible and sustainable menstrual care.
column13: >Business Team: Delia Cormier, Jeanelle Affonso, Mehraban Honardar, Tory Tews, Manuela Diaz, Christian Sanchez Ortiz
column15:
>Product Team: Cara Xingyu Fan, Tahsin Al Mannan

 

 

 

See our press features.

 

 

 

We need your help to manufacture our first pads and to help with the rollout of our online store. 

Funds from the campaign will be spent on:

 

Inventory: Making our pads so we can get them to your hands!

Fulfillment/Shipping: Shipping is super expensive, so we want to make sure we have funds to cover this.

Marketing: To broaden our audience and get more people to support us, we need to make sure we have a marketing budget. The more menstruators we reach, the more communities we can help to end period poverty!

Fees &
column16:
Taxes: Processing payments comes with fees and any funding amount received is taxable.

 

 

 

 

 

It’s easy as 1, 2, 3!

Step 1: Click the “back this project” button above

Step 2: Select your reward*

Step 3: Submit your payment info and back our campaign

*Please ensure you're picking the reward tier that best suits what you want! Pay attention to the included items so we can ship you the right reward.

 

After our crowdfunding campaign is successfully funded, you can purchase Ruth sustainable pads from our online store!

 

 

 

Instagram: http://instagram.com/getruth.ca

Facebook: http://facebook.com/getruth.ca

Introducing the EcoGarden

The EcoGarden is a combination of a smart miniature greenhouse and a self-cleaning aquarium. One intelligent ecosystem that is capable of growing a variety of fresh herbs and veggies all year round, without any prior knowledge.

We strive to making growing fun and easy, and accessible for everyone. The EcoGarden was created so you can monitor and control it remotely, and follow the whole growing process, from seed to harvest, right from the palm of your hand.

Become immersed in the growing process, and enjoy growing in a lively and 
stress-reducing environment. Enhance your lifestyle with a living ecosystem and bring the marvels of nature into your home!

Eat better and live healthier, with the EcoGarden.

 

 

The unique growing method is known as ‘Aquaponics’. It is an ancient growing technique which uses the fish waste as the nutrient source for the plants, while the plants naturally filters the water which is recirculated back to the fish. A natural and effective way of cleaning your aquarium, creating the ultimate self-sustaining and resource efficient ecosystem where plants and fish live in symbiosis. It requires no soil or chemical fertilizers, and it’s totally free from pesticides.

You feed the fish, the fish feed the plants, and the plants feed you!

Never think twice about watering your plants or feeding your fish, the EcoGarden does it for you! With its integrated sensors and innovative technology, it acts on its own, or reacts to your instructions. Check the temperature, feed your fish, or simply notify it that you’re going abroad for a few days! You’re always just one click away.

Our vision is to help create a better and more sustainable world for future generations. We want to empower people to grow smarter and more locally, while reconnecting them with nature and enhancing their lifestyle. This idea of doing good and contributing for the better lead to the creation of the EcoGarden.

 

 

As the population grows and more people are moving into cities, we are becoming more distanced from nature and its life-giving benefits.

It’s hard to emphasize the importance and how much good nature does for our well-being. Study after study shows the significant benefits reconnecting with nature has on both our mental and physical health. People who are more connected with nature are happier, feel better and have more meaning in their lives. Caring for a living thing also gives us a purpose and is rewarding.

 

In order to reconnect people with nature and empowering them to grow smarter, we combined technology and nature in a seamless way. Bringing nature to you.

 

 

In times of crowded urban living, busy schedules and work stress, perhaps an aquarium can contribute with an oasis of calm and relaxation. Take a break from your daily tasks and pause for a moment. 

When young people are exposed to the beauty of nature and its life-enhancing benefits, they will want to enjoy it and save it - now and in the future. This creates awareness and a willingness for preservation. It also creates a mindset and a respect for the world’s already scarce resources.

Whether you are a tech savvy, interior lover, indoor grower, or simply want to bring life to your surroundings, the EcoGarden is for you! 

Our mission is to make growing fun and accessible for everyone, and improve people's’ way of life. And it all starts with setting it up! :D

 

No green thumb or toolbox required. The EcoGarden is designed so anyone can use it. Just a few simple steps and you’re all set! User-friendly and minimal maintenance is what we strive for!

 

Smart LED Grow light
Armed with a light sensor, the EcoGarden will automatically adjust the light intensity based on the measured ambient light to optimize plant growth and energy efficiency.

 

Automatic Feeder 
Struggling to find the right amount food for your fish? Or do you have to rely on your neighbors to take care of your fish when you’re away on vacation?

With the automatic feeder, you can schedule it to feed whenever you want.

 

Interact with your ecosystem on a whole new level! Command it to feed your fish, ask for the temperature or simply tell it to turn off the light. Now That’s smart!  

 

The dedicated mobile Ecobloom app (available for iOS and Android) allows you to monitor important values of your ecosystem. The EcoGarden connects to your Wi-Fi, so you are able to manage it from everywhere. Control your growlight, feed the fish, or just check how your fish or plants are doing, right from the palm of your hand. 

 

 

By utilizing nature’s biological filtration power, combined with extra sponges and a water pump, the water gets cleaner than any other standard aquarium, reducing the maintenance significantly! 

Occasional water changes help balance the ecosystem and allow for a more beneficial environment for the fish. We recommend a water change of approximately 20% twice a month, which will take you no more than 5 minutes for each occasion! And thanks to the many filters in the EcoGarden, a 15 minute cleaning session is enough to do once a month! Simple as that!

And don’t worry, the app will let you know when it’s time to do so!

 

The fish waste is naturally broken down from ammonia to nitrate (organic plant fertilizers) by beneficial microbes, supplying the plants with the nutrients they need. This recirculating process is up to 95% more water efficient than conventional farming.

A natural and sustainable way of producing food!

 

Place your EcoGarden in the living room, hallway or kitchen, its minimalistic and unique Scandinavian appearance makes it stand out anywhere.

Even in cafes or at the office, the EcoGarden contributes with its beautiful design and creates a lively impression. Grow fresh herbs for the best dishes, cocktails, smoothies and more.

 

The EcoGarden can store up to 24 L of water, which is sufficient for many types of fish and other aquatic animals. Depending on your preference, the number of fish will vary. We recommend 1 Betta fish, but if you prefer to have a few fish, we suggest keeping 2-4 Zebra Danios or Male Fancy Guppies as an alternate pet choice. You can also put snails, shrimps, crabs, and a lot of other fish in there. The general rule to remember is the 1"" of fish per gallon rule (2.54 cm of fish per 3.78 L of water)!

For tropical fish it’s highly recommended to also include a heater which will keep the water nice and warm for the (slightly spoiled) good-looking tropical fish!

Too much to remember? Well, good thing the app will guide you and recommend the amount that is right for you! And you can simply pick up your fish at the local pet store, where you’ll also be able to get more suggestions on the type of fish based on the recommendations. Choose between a variety of beautiful water creatures and watch them thrive in the ecosystem.

 

 

Grow up to 6 plants, all year round. Or place any herbs that you purchase directly in the system to keep them fresh for a long time. Grow whenever you want, wherever you are.

 

 

 

 

 

We believe in the power of combining technology with nature as way of empowering people and enhancing their way of living, while providing them with the tools to help contribute to solving some of today’s global challenges. Educating people about sustainable farming, and showing that growing your own food can be fun and easy. That is, and always will be, our mission.

Hamza (co-founder) pitching Ecobloom's vision

 

Many generations of prototypes and almost 2 years of testing lead to our final product design. Created for optimal ease of use and enjoyment. Tested, co-created and validated with consumers. 

The very first prototype, back in 2016

 

We love to apply hands-on and agile development approaches to come up with the best design solutions.

3D printing components for the prototypes

 

With great support from our partners, we are able to rapidly develop the EcoGarden and bring it to our growers successfully.

column2: >Click here for press material

column1:
Levia is a unique design product! It’s a desk lamp that uses the magnetic levitation system, a
method by which one object is suspended on another, thanks to a magnetic field which can combat the gravitational pull effect.
It allows the levitation of an LED filament lamp with a very high energy efficiency.
Levia’s advanced technology, combined with its amazing design, will blow you away!

The Levia desk lamp is the result of the excellent Italian craftsmanship. The base is made of genuine Carrara or Black Marquina, which is cut by cnc and hand-finished for a polished and beautiful look.

column2: >Everything at an affordable price to everyone!

column1: Levia’s been cared to the last detail.

The stem’s length allows the LED filament bulb to levitate at a height of about 20 cm from the ground and outside the space of the marble base: the effect is a perfect balance between the shapes and the levitation distance.

The centre of gravity is completely unbalanced, because of the metal stem’s extension outwards with the levitation system and the floating bulb at the end. However, it’s perfectly counterbalanced by the marble base.
The marble base has also an anti-slip and anti-scratch rubberized support, to avoid scratches and protect the support surfaces.
The sensitive button allows you to switch off the LED filaments with a single touch, by keeping the light bulb in levitation at the same time.
The fabric wire makes what has always been considered a disturbing element, an integral part of the design.
The meticulous attention to detail, the stem's colors and the different types of marble give Levia a high-level design, suitable to any kind of environment and furniture.
The metal stem gives structure strength and support.
The base is made of genuine Carrara marble or black Marquina marble.
• Carrara marble is a high quality type of white or blue-grey marble,  quarried in the city of Carrara located in Tuscany, Italy.
• Black Marquinia marble  is a high quality, black stone marble extracted from the region of Markina, Basque Country in the North of Spain.
Every single piece is cut by cnc and then hand-finished, according to the age-old tradition of Italian craftsmanship, a process that makes the product unique and inimitable.

column2: >With an integrated anti-fall system and very high energy efficiency.

column1: Levia is managed by 3 electronic boards: one placed in the marble base, one in the levitation system and one in the light bulb. The levitation of the light bulb is very effective and extremely stable, thanks to a bi-directional and automatic management of the device. It makes its use simple, preventing any destabilization at the same time.

column2: >We asked passers-by to try to levitate the light bulb to prove the ease of its use. This is the result!

column1: Levia also has an anti-fall system that forces the light bulb to attach itself to the upper part in the event of a blackout, accidental shocks or interruption of the current flow.

The bulb has no internal batteries and it turns on via electromagnetic induction. The bulb is warm light. Unlike the cold light, this warm light is often associated with positive feeling and the human mind perceives it as soft and enveloping. Furthermore, it allows less eye strain and it greatly improves the sleep quality.

Levia has a consumption of about 3 watts, equal to about 2 cents a day, and the LED light has a lifecycle of about 50000 working hours . So, if you used it for 8 hours a day for 365 days, the life span would be around 17 years.
You just have to bring the bulb near the upper part-from the bottom up- until you feel a magnetic force and the led filaments turn on simultaneously. And now you can let the light bulb float.
As mentioned above, the light bulb has no batteries and it turns on via electromagnetic induction!
If you want to switch off just the led filaments, you just have to touch the sensitive button on the marble base: in this way the bulb will continue to float.
The bulb will attach itself to the upper part instead of falling and breaking in the event of interruption of the current flow, thanks to the anti-fall system.
Basic Version - Black or White metal stem and Carrara or Black Marquinia marble base.
Special Versione - Brass-lacquered metal stem and Carrara or Black Marquinia marble base.
Deluxe Version - Gold-plated copper stem and Portoro marble base.
The Levia Deluxe Portoro version has a real gold-plated copper stem and a Portoro marble base.

• The gold-plated copper stem emphasizes the golden veins of the marble. The golden touch button fits perfectly to the base. The advanced technology, combined with the highest quality materials, makes Levia Deluxe Portoro something totally new and never seen before: it becomes a high-class design object, with a very high value.
• Portoro is a very precious variety of dark brilliant black marble with golden veins. Portoro marble can be found only in the province of La Spezia in Liguria, Italy.
We would like to give you the opportunity to pledge the Deluxe Portoro version, at an exclusive price, when we reach € 250,000 goal.
Please, help us to unlock the Deluxe and Special editions by sharing our project with your friends.
In accordance with the production times, we expect to ship your perks between the month of April and May 2019 at least.
All the perks will be shipped by DHL - Express Tracked Courier.
Please, remember that Customs Clearance costs, if any, shall be borne by the addressee.

Each State, according to its own taxation, applies its fees to the imported goods. We are not able to eliminate or control Customs and Customs Clearance costs of your countries, and we cannot  declare a lower value than that of your donation.

In the event that, at your choice, you decide not to pay Customs Clearance for the product once it arrived in your state, the package will be abandoned at Customs point and we will not issue any refund.

Thanks to our experience gained with our first ""Geizeer"" product, our Team, with the support of DHL Express Courier, will help you to solve any problems about shipment, delivery and / or Customs Clearance as quickly as possible.

We would like to point out that we were able to deliver all the units with only a few weeks delay during our first Geizeer-campaign, despite the unexpected difficulties in our first large scale production.

Our company was born in 2016, when our project, Geizeer - eco-friendly ice cooling, was launched on the international market where it got an immediate success.

From now on, our goal has been to work in order to improve our professional training and skills.  Our headquarters is in Italy, homeland of the craft, where expert craftsmen work every day, with love and dedication, to realize our products. 0,"

The first campaign was launched in 2016 and was a stepping-stone to the global market.

Thanks to the support of our customers, we managed to improve Geizeer over the years, making it truly unique in its design and technology.


 

 

We all have a freezer that is daily energy consuming, isn’t it? The concept behind Geizeer is that we don’t want waste this energy but, instead, we use it to take a break from the heat and give refreshment. 

 

Geizeer is a cube-shaped desk cooler and perfume diffuser, eco friendly and fruit of high Italian handcraft.

The customized ice-pack allows air output to 360 degrees and a powerful air diffusion. 

It is a low-consumption and USB rechargeable device. That is the reason why you can use Geizeer all day long and in any location.

Geizeer is button free and it turns on due to magnetic contacts. When the two halves are not in contact with each other, the fan stops. This security system makes Geizeer safe also for children and animals.

""Picture by our Customer""

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Each item is CNC machined from a solid block of wood, before being hand-finished and colored. Each Geizeer is a unique piece with unique wood grains. 

The entire process is carried out respecting the centuries-old Italian handicraft tradition.

The electronic board has been re-engineered with state-of-the-art components. The outcome is less heat loss, less energy consumption and longer duration.


 

The integrated electronic board prevents the battery from breakdown in the event of short-circuit and overload. Moreover, this system guarantees over 600 charging cycles.

The red/blue LED on the USB cable shows the power status of Geizeer.

Red light charging / blue light full battery. Easy!

Furthermore, you can use the cable to charge any other device with mini-USB port and to transfer data between devices.

 

The fan is developed and produced by Enermax, world leader in PC components production.

The blades and this technology, both patented, significantly reduce noise and electricity consumption. And besides, it increases air-flow efficiency and the life of the product up to 100.000 hours of usage.

 

Choose the speed you like with one touch: Ultra Silent Mode (1,000 RPM) / Silent Mode (1,500 RPM) / Performance Mode (1,800 RPM).

 

The fan is customized according to our needs and fits perfectly into the wood. Its light grey colour looks good in any model and coloration of Geizeer.


 

No more glue that hinders the current flow. Just strong magnets to give a steady grip between the two halves of Geizeer.

Align the two dots and let the magnets do their job!

Geizeer air freshener is made of paper from pulp 3mm thick. Its shape is designed for “zero waste”.

Each circle can be taken off from the whole card at various time for a better preservation of the fragrance. 

As the circles run out, use the air freshener card wherever you like! 

Put one removable circle on the proper room on the top of the ice pack.

As the circles run out, add a little string and use it in your car. 

Push where indicated to create a hook on the air freshener. Use it wherever you like, also in your wardrobe! 


 

The mat in neoprene thermally isolates the wood from the ice pack, protecting Geizeer.

Pull the mat tab to easily lift up the ice pack. 

- OLD PACKAGING

 - NEW PACKAGING  

Our customized packaging is impact resistant and fully recyclable. It is realized in cellulose fibre to eliminate plastic.

It can contain one Geizeer and up to three ice packs. Designed to deliver Geizeer safely all over the world. 

 

 

Besides our purpose of eliminating any plastic in the packaging, we work hard to reduce paper waste.

You can choose between printed and online user manual. 

Instructions and support videos are already available on our website and downloadable here LINK 

Since 2016 we give to our customers a green present. 

 By purchasing Geizeer you will receive a personal code with which plant a tree and follow its growth! 


 

 

 

 

Thanks to its small size, Geizeer is a portable device that can be used in any environment, from home to office. 


 

 The grid is designed to optimize the air intake without overloading the fan and it is available in two versions: linear and parametric. 

The difference between the two grids is purely design and there is no variation in terms of performance.



 

Battery life depends on fan speed:

– 5 hours / Ultra Silent Mode (1,000 RPM)

– 4 hours / Silent Mode (1,500 RPM)

– 3 hours / Performance Mode (1,800 RPM)

Geizeer works even while in “charge” mode.

 

The ice pack thaws in around 2 hours at a temperature of 27C°. It is recommended to use it for around 2 years and then replace it with a new one.

Geizeer is available in different colours to perfectly suit to any décor.  



 

Each Geizeer Kit includes 1 ice pack + 2 free ice packs (3 ice packs in total)

The extraordinary bamboo processing and the uniqueness of its layers make Special Geizeer Bamboo exclusive and suitable for all kinds of environment.

 

 

You can view Geizeer in your house . Hurry up...It's free! 

 

The minimal design makes Geizeer a versatile piece of furniture, suitable for any location.

- To give guests refreshment during celebrations

- In everyday life 

- For an extra pleasant service

- As we do 

- As an alternative to air conditioning 

 

- For its uniqueness 

 

 

Shipping will begin October  2019. 

All pledges will be sent through DHL Express and with a trucking number.

We remind you that any customs clearance costs are borne by the recipient.

According to its own taxation system, each country applies taxes on import goods. Customs clearance does not depend on us and we absolutely cannot declare a lower value. 

Thanks to the experience gained over the years, our Customer Service, together with DHL Express, will help you to solve any delivery and customs problems as early as possible.



 

Thank you for your support!

Risks &
column2:
Challenges

Since 2016 we have produced and shipped more than 9000 Geizeer all over the world. 
For this new updated version of Geizeer, the new components are completed or under production. 
Our suppliers are ready to produce, assemble and ship Geizeer. Therefore, we believe we could stay on schedule regarding delivery time, as mentioned in the campaign. 
In case of a far greater volume of orders than what we expect, we will plan several shipping tranches according to the order number. 
In addition, we will keep you constantly updated on this campaign progress. 
We guarantee that you will receive the product you pay for. We will honour the pledge, as we always did over the past years with other crowdfunding campaigns and as we are doing now with Levia. 
We have been working hard and we are glad for always being appreciated by our customers. And so, we hope you enjoy Geizeer because there is no greater joy for us than having satisfied customers.

","The first campaign was launched in 2016 and was a stepping-stone to the global market.Thanks to the support of our customers, we managed to improve Geizeer over the years, making it truly unique in its design and technology.  We all have a freezer that is daily energy consuming, isn’t it? The concept behind Geizeer is that we don’t want waste this energy but, instead, we use it to take a break from the heat and give refreshment.  Geizeer is a cube-shaped desk cooler and perfume diffuser, eco friendly and fruit of high Italian handcraft.The customized ice-pack allows air output to 360 degrees and a powerful air diffusion. It is a low-consumption and USB rechargeable device. That is the reason why you can use Geizeer all day long and in any location.Geizeer is button free and it turns on due to magnetic contacts. When the two halves are not in contact with each other, the fan stops. This security system makes Geizeer safe also for children and animals.""Picture by our Customer""----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Each item is CNC machined from a solid block of wood, before being hand-finished and colored.
