The outcome is less heat loss, less energy consumption and longer duration. The integrated electronic board prevents the battery from breakdown in the event of short-circuit and overload. Moreover, this system guarantees over 600 charging cycles.The red/blue LED on the USB cable shows the power status of Geizeer.Red light charging / blue light full battery. column1:
0,"

 

Air is actively pulled through the top of the unit, removing dust and large particulate matter before passing through the biologically active root zone. Beneficial organisms within the root zone capture and permanently destroy airborne toxins and chemicals that we would otherwise be breathing. Naturally purified air is then released through the front of the unit.

Beyond air purification, Respira adds additional humidity, evaporative cooling, and a direct connection to nature to improve the comfort of your home. Respira is also IOT enabled, allowing you to connect the system to your home network and monitor plant health and air quality from wherever you are.



 

 



 

 

 

1. Choose Your Pledge Option

 

2. Choose Your Unit Colour

 

3. Choose Your Plant Palette

*For those who purchase a unit with plants included. If you want to purchase a unit with accessories and the Pet-Friendly palette, select the perk ""1 Respira - Pet-Friendly"".

 

4. Choose Your Add-Ons

*Only available for options that do not already include the accessory package

 

Guaranteed Delivery

Backing our project is a  guaranteed purchase. This means that if you order a Respira on this platform, you will get the Respira unit, guaranteed. Don't just take our word for it, check out what our community has already said...

 

 For five years we've been selling, designing, and building commercial living walls across North America. When the pandemic hit, business began to slow down, offices were no longer in use, and we had to re-adjust our strategy. We shifted our focus to residential spaces - the spaces people were now spending every moment of their day. Through the challenge that 2020 presented, we were able to break through into a new market and innovate a residential air-purifying smart garden. 

 

 

 

 

 

Long-Lasting Design:

The system is forward compatible and intended to last a lifetime. It allows for both software and hardware updates, eliminating the need to replace the entire unit. The bamboo tray is FSD Certified meaning that it has been sustainably sourced for our system.

Reusability &
column2:
Recyclability:

Respira has a reusable pre-filter. Every year, 12,000 tonnes of disposable air filters end up in a landfill. Every Respira unit sold results in fewer disposable air filters ending up in these landfills.

 

 

Respira leverages the knowledge and research of biofiltration and metabolic processes. Previous research has shown that it is possible to reduce volatile organic compound (VOC) levels using biofiltration (Darlington et al. 2001).

Building off of that, we further identified that the root zone of the plants provided a significant contribution to the active reduction of VOC's through metabolic processes of microorganisms in the root systems. As such, Respira was designed to optimize root zone exposure to indoor air and allow for the natural biological processes to break down contaminants and purify the air.

We have partnered with a team of researchers at Ryerson University in Toronto, Canada to study the Respira system and provide a third-party analysis on the effectiveness and specifics of how Respira works. Preliminary results identified in the initial trial run that within 24 hours, there was a reduction in the combined benzene and toluene levels of ~97%. For benzene the effect occurred within 24 hours in a freshly planted system and 9 hours with an acclimatized system. For toluene they were 9 hours and 6 hours respectively.

 

 

The study at Ryerson is still in its preliminary stages, but what has been identified thus far is that the preliminary results of Respira's ability to remove VOC contaminates are in line with previous research.

 

 

We promise that should any unexpected issues arise, we will handle them with clear communication, transparency, and care.

With more than 10 years of combined experience in living wall sales and design, we have successfully delivered many large commercial projects. This includes work with clients such as Mattamy Homes, Canadian Wildlife Federation, London International Airport, and Niagara College. In addition, our design team has over 12 years of experience in designing and manufacturing consumer packaged goods. As a result, we understand the risks and challenges of the production process and project management over a long-term period. For this reason, we perform rigorous testing of all products before launching them to market. 

As with any new product, unexpected issues may arise and if they do, we will always deal with them with our customer's satisfaction as a top priority. In short, you should be confident that we will deliver what we say we will. 
 
Supply Chain:
We are very proud of our supply chain and are confident that we can deliver a product of the highest quality. We've worked to develop strong relationships with our vendors and suppliers to ensure that we have a reliable supply chain and are able to deliver a quality product now, and as we grow. We promise to put our energies and focus on ensuring our customer's satisfaction, product quality, and meeting deadlines.  

The current global situation and its impact on suppliers and manufacturers could affect our ability to deliver within our projected time frame. If such issues should arise, we will provide clear communication of any updates and/or changes to the expected delivery dates.

We currently have agreements in place with our suppliers. Our product moulds and equipment have been purchased and we are ready to begin manufacturing inventory. The final step is to determine how much inventory we will produce, which will be largely decided by our Kickstarter community. 

Logistics:
At this time, we are only able to ship this product to Canada, European Union, Norway, Switzerland, United Kingdom, and the United States. We will be handling all North American shipping on our end, and we are extremely grateful to be partnered with Planting Power for our European distribution. If you are not located in one of the previously mentioned countries, we ask you to still back our project and reach out to us as we will be looking for where to expand next based on demand.

column1:
0,"

Introducing MICRO: Grow Superfoods on Autopilot

It fits anywhere and grows food for you while you do nothing. Simply add your favorite seeds and enjoy healthier meals while MICRO does all the work.

Did you know microgreens have up to 50x more nutrients than other full-grown vegetables? This fact combined with its delicious flavors makes it perfect for at-home meals.          

But, growing them can be a big commitment, from properly watering them and fighting against mold…          

Now, MICRO takes care of all the dirty work, helping you enjoy nutritious micro-greens for tasty meals that impress your loved ones.

 

Imagine all the unused space you could use to grow nutritious &
column2: tasty superfoods at home, on autopilot.
column3: >Four Micros in a cupboard
column4:
>

Read story about CEO >
column5:
Creating the Perfect Environment

 

MICRO’s contained environment gives it the perfect temperature and humidity to grow healthier microgreens, all while reducing the chance of fungi, mold, and other issues without the use of harsh chemicals.

Growing microgreens isn't always easy...

 

Micro is the perfect self contained growing environment.
column6:
>Three Agriolabs Micro's stacked on top of each other on a kitchen counter.

Now, Anyone Can Enjoy Effortless Superfoods At Home

 

Do you enjoy healthier eating but not the cost associated with it? Imagine being able to pay close to nothing to grow fresh superfoods in the comfort of your home, all with zero effort! You can add homegrown basil onto your next baked pizza or fresh, aromatic mint for your loved one’s chicken dinner.         

Growing micro-greens doesn’t have to be difficult… With MICRO, you can choose to grow healthy superfoods at home without the hassle of maintaining a home garden.

This device grows nutritious delicious microgreens, You can stack them, and it only requires water once a week.

 

Easier Than Ever.

Meet Dirt-Free Growing. Meet Seedpad.
column7:
>Prototype Seedpads un-covered

 

Sustainable

Sourced from Alberta, Canada, Our Seedpads come with perfectly organized seeds held in place by an organic, rice-based glue. Once you run out, you can get more from our online store, or never run out by subscribing to one of our plans (starting at the cost of Netflix) that works for you. 

Or... if you're feeling really adventurous, feel free to experiment with your own growing mediums and seeds, we can't guarantee they'll be as awesome and effortless as using Seedpads though!

 

Why Hemp Fibre?

It is the perfect foundation for microgreens because of its ability to store water and create a healthier, more breathable environment for plant roots. It’s also great at preventing mold and makes it easy for you to harvest your plants without making a mess.

 

Perfectly Placed Seeds.

Our hemp fiber Seedpads are pre-seeded for your benefit. Uneven seeding can cause clumping, which can lead to mold and other headaches.  With our Seedpads, you will always get the best yield.

 

Wanna use your own seeds? No problem.

Our blank hemp fibre Seedpads perfect for the growing enthusiast who’s eager to grow to their heart's content. Simply add your own seeds and watch the magic unfold!

As blank Seedpads don't have the built in black cover layer, we recommend covering and adding weight to your seeds while they're in the sprouting stage for stronger &
column8:
healthier greens.

 

How does it work?

3 Simple Steps...
column10:
showinfo=0"">

 

 

How Is It Powered? 

Micro and all of Agriolabs' future modular products will use the Powerplate.

The Powerplate and MICRO magnetically snap together, easily transferring power. Each Powerplate can power up to two Micros when used with any USB Charger and up to four micros can work their best when using the Agriolabs high power 3 Amp charger.         

Want to power more? Stack another Powerplate on top of your fourth micro and keep growing!

 

 

 

 

Harvesting Your Food Made Easy

Simply take your Seedpad and cut the Microgreens with scissors or a knife. 

No need to wash as there is no dirt and no chemicals used, just add your microgreens straight into your meal. Whatever you don't harvest can be left on the Seedpad to continue growing for up to 14 days*, ready for the next time you want to add something special to your meal.

*leaving it longer may result in overgrowth/suffocation which can lead to premature decay.

 

 

What Will You Grow With Your Micro?

The possibilities are endless...

 

It’s The Small Things That Matter.
column11:
lapse of two people going about their days while micro grows in the background"" class=""lazy"" data-src=""https://edu.studiono7.ca/files/short-timelapse-with-text.gif"" src="""" title=""No Time? No problem.""/>

MICRO is your personal gardener and does all the caretaking for you so you can spend more time living. All you need to do is pour water once when starting a seedpad, or once per week until harvest.

Micro’s controlled environment prevents bugs, rodents, and other pests from easily getting inside and harming your crops. Built for humans, the magnetic drawer keeps even the smartest fluffy companions out.

Say goodbye to invasive and unwanted lighting. The enclosed design makes even the largest collections of Micro's easy on your eyes.

Our Custom, In-house LED Design

Engineered for maximum food growth.  

We've tested dozens of light patterns with different diffusive and reflective materials. We’ve even looked at different curvatures to come up with the evenest lighting we can get in a compact space. Our LED system guarantees that all your microgreens will grow to a beautifully uniform height for maximum yield.

Why Pink Light?  

There's a good reason you'll find pink lights in many indoor commercial farms, and Micro is no different. Using LED's that target the specific wavelengths of light where plants need it most allows us to be more effective with the lighting as well as use less power.

The Power of Modular Design

Every Micro has zero holes that you have to plug something into. Instead, they magnetically snap together, securely transmitting power to each other. 

All this is possible because of the Power plate which is the base of your stackable garden. But wait... The power plates are stackable too! Magnetically snap on another one and make your garden taller.

The Story Behind Agriolabs and the Micro

column1:
S T R E T C H   GOALS

Stretch goals are reward tiers that become available for purchase or are automatically applied to applicable rewards.

 

Included Performance USB Chargers - Applied to all Micros| Unlocks at $13,000

With the Agriolabs Performance USB charger, you can ensure that your Micros, up to a quad stack will always be performing at its best without any dimming or loss of power. All perk tiers including Micros will automatically have these added to their rewards when we surpass $13k!

 

Seedpad Include Labels - All Tiers Containing Seedpads | Unlocks at $20,000

Keep track of whats in each micro, especially if you have stacks of them. We make these labels in house, just like everything else. Take label off the Seedpad and place in the holder on the front of the Micro. A glossy surface allows you to write your grow start date on the empty space.

 

Dishwasher Safe Water Drawer &
column2:
Removable Drawer Fronts - All Micros | Unlocks at $30,000

Wanna keep an eye on your microgreens as they grow? Simply remove the front of the drawer after the microgreens have sprouted (doing this before may result in poor sprouting due to lower humidity). 

While the drawer water reservoir isn't that hard to clean with a sponge and some soap,  we'll make it extra easy by making it dishwasher safe. Just throw it on the top rack of your dishwasher and wash as normal! Easy peasy. 

 

Truly Wireless Powerplate - CAD$35 | Unlocks at $50,000

The Powerplate requires constant power via a USB-C Cable... Or does it? With the Wireless Powerplate, the Powerplate itself can be the power source for your Micro's. Simply charge it up, stack your Micro(s) on top, and it'll last you long enough to grow a delicious bed of microgreens. This add-on will allow you to have true freedom. Want to grow microgreens under your sink? Behind your toilet? On the top shelf of a secret closet? We won't judge, go wild, enjoy that absolute freedom.

We have some plans and drawings but haven't done all the calculations to finalize this design yet, but we'll make it happen if you make us!

 

Want to see more stretch goals? We're open to ideas. Chat With Us

 

Let's Go Hyperlocal... Wait, What Does That Mean?

Traditional agriculture is one of the leading causes of carbon emissions worldwide. Growing “hyper-local” means your food doesn’t have to travel thousands of miles to reach you and cuts out unnecessary middlemen all while delivering you healthier, more affordable food. This is our first step to making hyper-local the new normal.

Did you know the average North American throws out about $2000 of food a year?

A majority of that food waste is organic content which produces methane gas, which is 25x more damaging than carbon dioxide.

Hyper-locally grown food reduces the demand for less sustainably grown produce, as well as tasting better and staying fresh much longer, reducing the amount of organic waste going to the landfill.

 

Beautiful, Sustainable Design

 

ADDITIVE MANUFACTURING  

Is a term for when you add material when creating something instead of taking away material like subtractive manufacturing.         

The most commonly known form of additive manufacturing is 3D printing, which is used in most components of our products with a special high-quality, high-strength version of the bio-polymer called polylactic acid (PLA).

 

SUSTAINABLE TO THE CORE  

Your contribution to less global waste doesn’t just start at your first harvest. With additive manufacturing and high quality, compostable bioplastics, it begins the moment you invest in an Agriolabs product.
 

HOW DOES IT WORK?  

Like nature, 3D Printing builds layer by layer, until the finished product is done. This efficient process allows us to use our material to its greatest extent and minimize waste which is good for the environment and our pockets

 

THE CHALLENGE.  

Time. 3D printing takes a long time compared to more traditional forms of additive manufacturing like injection molding. However, with our print farm growing and constant advances in technology, we are slowly reaching up to the speeds of traditional manufacturing processes. We strive to have the best surface finish on all 3D printed parts, whether that means post-processing or working with our material supply partners &
column3:
polymer engineers to source innovative materials to further improve the visual and structural quality.

 

The Humans Behind Agriolabs

Bragging isn't really our style, but we aren't lying when we say we've got the most amazing team ever. Agriolabs was made to tackle big problems by leveraging awesome technology and out of the box thinking. Everyone in the team is a natural problem solver in their own way and we all share the same mission to do good, sustainably. We start with the MICRO as our first step in our mission to get more people eating what they grow, reducing their waste output and carbon footprint. 

What we'll do with your support:

You've decided to support us with your hard earned money, you can bet that we'll use it wisely. From creating jobs, helping reduce food waste, or building vertical farms in the oceans, know that you're supporting a innovative startup that is willing to take massive action.

 

 

Risks and challenges

 

Why are seedpads Canada only?

Our seedpads contain organic seeds embedded in hemp fibre mats and covered. This means that most departments of agriculture will NOT allow them to be imported as they are unable to identify the seeds easily, as well as the possibility of certain species being invasive, and other reasons.

At this time we are only offering our Canadian backers seedpads, and empty Seedpads with extra tools for international backers  in order to keep fulfillment running as smoothly as possible. We are actively making progress with getting Seedpads into the USA at the moment.

 

Fulfillment time &
column4:
process:

We're looking at being able to fulfill most units within the next 4-6 months of the Indiegogo campaign completing.

We'll be fulfilling units of earlier backers first, so if you backed our project on the last day, that's still fantastic and you'll still receive your reward, but it may take slightly longer than some other backers.

With the pandemic still going strong, please understand that there may be delays in the global shipping system, some countries may receive their rewards as soon as 1-2 weeks after shipping while other may experience delays of 3-6 weeks or more depending on where you live.

Backers's rewards will be organized and processed through our online store system, so you will receive details (such as tracking #'s if available) regarding your package and shipment by email or text from our site.

The more we raise the quicker fulfillment will be.

Surpassing the goal by large amounts will allow us to bring more processes in house instead of sourcing them internationally. Allowing us to:

- Bring bio-plastic resins in house where they will be processed, extruded, and used in manufacturing all under the same roof.

- Get more, higher quality printers and exponentially increase production.

- Create some jobs! We'll likely be hiring someone to help automate the assembly line, someone to manage our print farm, and another position as well.

- Get some awesome universal robots to help our staff do all the heavy lifting &
column5:
repetitive processes quicker and safer.

 

Final Notes:

2020 has been an extremely unpredictable year so far, and we have no idea what to expect with our fulfillment window extending into 2021. No matter what happens though, you had our backs and we'll have yours. Expect frequent updates and reports from our founding team. Our goal is to be as transparent and authentic with our backers as possible.

 

Our Environmental Commitments

 

Long-lasting design

The Micro has a extremely durable build. You probably won't be dropping your garden a lot, but if you do, it'll survive the fall. The Micro is easy to clean with some soap, water, and a sponge. Allowing you to use and re-use it year after year.

 

Reusability and recyclability

With a durable build of over 85% biodegradable &
column6:
compostable material, the micro will last as long as you will. However, if for some reason it ends up in a landfill, the Micro will decompose in as little as 5 years, compared to some plastics that take decades to decompose.

 

Sustainable materials

The main material used in the creation of the Micro is derived from Vegetable starches, usually corn and sugar cane. It is renewable, sustainable, and helps use by-product from other industries that would have ended up in the landfill.

 

Environmentally friendly factories

We're a vertically integrated startup. We understand that it makes it a lot more difficult but it allows us to control every step of the process. From the sourcing of north american made Bio-polymers to manufacturing &
column7:
packing our own products. This ensures that we operate ethically and remain environmentally friendly. Our manufacturing facilities are also optimized to reduce waste as much as possible, and recycle waste product to be reused wherever we can. All in house.

 

Sustainable Distribution

All our products are packaged in recyclable/compost-able material. We ensure the contents of the package are safe while minimizing material required. Boxes contain at least 10% recycled paper.

 

Something else

The very nature of our product is carbon negative. The more you use it, the better it gets. Growing plants not only feeds you, but feeds into our sustainability mission.

","Introducing MICRO: Grow Superfoods on AutopilotIt fits anywhere and grows food for you while you do nothing. Simply add your favorite seeds and enjoy healthier meals while MICRO does all the work.Did you know microgreens have up to 50x more nutrients than other full-grown vegetables? This fact combined with its delicious flavors makes it perfect for at-home meals.          But, growing them can be a big commitment, from properly watering them and fighting against mold…          Now, MICRO takes care of all the dirty work, helping you enjoy nutritious micro-greens for tasty meals that impress your loved ones. Imagine all the unused space you could use to grow nutritious & tasty superfoods at home, on autopilot. Four Micros in a cupboardRead story about CEO >  Creating the Perfect Environment MICRO’s contained environment gives it the perfect temperature and humidity to grow healthier microgreens, all while reducing the chance of fungi, mold, and other issues without the use of harsh chemicals.Growing microgreens isn't always easy... Micro is the perfect self contained growing environment.Three Agriolabs Micro's stacked on top of each other on a kitchen counter.Now, Anyone Can Enjoy Effortless Superfoods At Home Do you enjoy healthier eating but not the cost associated with it? Imagine being able to pay close to nothing to grow fresh superfoods in the comfort of your home, all with zero effort! You can add homegrown basil onto your next baked pizza or fresh, aromatic mint for your loved one’s chicken dinner.         Growing micro-greens doesn’t have to be difficult… With MICRO, you can choose to grow healthy superfoods at home without the hassle of maintaining a home garden.This device grows nutritious delicious microgreens, You can stack them, and it only requires water once a week. Easier Than Ever. Meet Dirt-Free Growing. Meet Seedpad.Prototype Seedpads un-covered SustainableSourced from Alberta, Canada, Our Seedpads come with perfectly organized seeds held in place by an organic, rice-based glue. Once you run out, you can get more from our online store, or never run out by subscribing to one of our plans (starting at the cost of Netflix) that works for you. Or... if you're feeling really adventurous, feel free to experiment with your own growing mediums and seeds, we can't guarantee they'll be as awesome and effortless as using Seedpads though! Why Hemp Fibre?It is the perfect foundation for microgreens because of its ability to store water and create a healthier, more breathable environment for plant roots. It’s also great at preventing mold and makes it easy for you to harvest your plants without making a mess. Perfectly Placed Seeds.Our hemp fiber Seedpads are pre-seeded for your benefit. Uneven seeding can cause clumping, which can lead to mold and other headaches.  With our Seedpads, you will always get the best yield. Wanna use your own seeds? No problem.Our blank hemp fibre Seedpads perfect for the growing enthusiast who’s eager to grow to their heart's content. Simply add your own seeds and watch the magic unfold!As blank Seedpads don't have the built in black cover layer, we recommend covering and adding weight to your seeds while they're in the sprouting stage for stronger & healthier greens. How does it work?3 Simple Steps...  How Is It Powered? Micro and all of Agriolabs' future modular products will use the Powerplate.The Powerplate and MICRO magnetically snap together, easily transferring power. Each Powerplate can power up to two Micros when used with any USB Charger and up to four micros can work their best when using the Agriolabs high power 3 Amp charger.         Want to power more? Stack another Powerplate on top of your fourth micro and keep growing!    Harvesting Your Food Made EasySimply take your Seedpad and cut the Microgreens with scissors or a knife. No need to wash as there is no dirt and no chemicals used, just add your microgreens straight into your meal. Whatever you don't harvest can be left on the Seedpad to continue growing for up to 14 days*, ready for the next time you want to add something special to your meal.*leaving it longer may result in overgrowth/suffocation which can lead to premature decay.  What Will You Grow With Your Micro?The possibilities are endless... It’s The Small Things That Matter. MICRO is your personal gardener and does all the caretaking for you so you can spend more time living. All you need to do is pour water once when starting a seedpad, or once per week until harvest.Micro’s controlled environment prevents bugs, rodents, and other pests from easily getting inside and harming your crops. Built for humans, the magnetic drawer keeps even the smartest fluffy companions out.Say goodbye to invasive and unwanted lighting. The enclosed design makes even the largest collections of Micro's easy on your eyes.Our Custom, In-house LED DesignEngineered for maximum food growth.  We've tested dozens of light patterns with different diffusive and reflective materials. We’ve even looked at different curvatures to come up with the evenest lighting we can get in a compact space. Our LED system guarantees that all your microgreens will grow to a beautifully uniform height for maximum yield.Why Pink Light?  There's a good reason you'll find pink lights in many indoor commercial farms, and Micro is no different. Using LED's that target the specific wavelengths of light where plants need it most allows us to be more effective with the lighting as well as use less power.The Power of Modular DesignEvery Micro has zero holes that you have to plug something into. Instead, they magnetically snap together, securely transmitting power to each other. All this is possible because of the Power plate which is the base of your stackable garden. But wait... The power plates are stackable too! Magnetically snap on another one and make your garden taller.The Story Behind Agriolabs and the Micro

column1: S T R E T C H   GOALSStretch goals are reward tiers that become available for purchase or are automatically applied to applicable rewards. Included Performance USB Chargers - Applied to all Micros| Unlocks at $13,000With the Agriolabs Performance USB charger, you can ensure that your Micros, up to a quad stack will always be performing at its best without any dimming or loss of power. All perk tiers including Micros will automatically have these added to their rewards when we surpass $13k! Seedpad Include Labels - All Tiers Containing Seedpads | Unlocks at $20,000Keep track of whats in each micro, especially if you have stacks of them. We make these labels in house, just like everything else. Take label off the Seedpad and place in the holder on the front of the Micro. A glossy surface allows you to write your grow start date on the empty space. Dishwasher Safe Water Drawer & Removable Drawer Fronts - All Micros | Unlocks at $30,000Wanna keep an eye on your microgreens as they grow? Simply remove the front of the drawer after the microgreens have sprouted (doing this before may result in poor sprouting due to lower humidity). While the drawer water reservoir isn't that hard to clean with a sponge and some soap,  we'll make it extra easy by making it dishwasher safe. Just throw it on the top rack of your dishwasher and wash as normal! Easy peasy.  Truly Wireless Powerplate - CAD$35 | Unlocks at $50,000The Powerplate requires constant power via a USB-C Cable... Or does it? With the Wireless Powerplate, the Powerplate itself can be the power source for your Micro's. Simply charge it up, stack your Micro(s) on top, and it'll last you long enough to grow a delicious bed of microgreens. This add-on will allow you to have true freedom. Want to grow microgreens under your sink? Behind your toilet? On the top shelf of a secret closet? We won't judge, go wild, enjoy that absolute freedom.We have some plans and drawings but haven't done all the calculations to finalize this design yet, but we'll make it happen if you make us! Want to see more stretch goals? We're open to ideas. Chat With Us Let's Go Hyperlocal... Wait, What Does That Mean?Traditional agriculture is one of the leading causes of carbon emissions worldwide. Growing “hyper-local” means your food doesn’t have to travel thousands of miles to reach you and cuts out unnecessary middlemen all while delivering you healthier, more affordable food. This is our first step to making hyper-local the new normal.Did you know the average North American throws out about $2000 of food a year?A majority of that food waste is organic content which produces methane gas, which is 25x more damaging than carbon dioxide.Hyper-locally grown food reduces the demand for less sustainably grown produce, as well as tasting better and staying fresh much longer, reducing the amount of organic waste going to the landfill. Beautiful, Sustainable Design ADDITIVE MANUFACTURING  Is a term for when you add material when creating something instead of taking away material like subtractive manufacturing.         The most commonly known form of additive manufacturing is 3D printing, which is used in most components of our products with a special high-quality, high-strength version of the bio-polymer called polylactic acid (PLA). SUSTAINABLE TO THE CORE  Your contribution to less global waste doesn’t just start at your first harvest. With additive manufacturing and high quality, compostable bioplastics, it begins the moment you invest in an Agriolabs product. HOW DOES IT WORK?  Like nature, 3D Printing builds layer by layer, until the finished product is done. This efficient process allows us to use our material to its greatest extent and minimize waste which is good for the environment and our pockets THE CHALLENGE.  Time. 3D printing takes a long time compared to more traditional forms of additive manufacturing like injection molding. However, with our print farm growing and constant advances in technology, we are slowly reaching up to the speeds of traditional manufacturing processes. We strive to have the best surface finish on all 3D printed parts, whether that means post-processing or working with our material supply partners & polymer engineers to source innovative materials to further improve the visual and structural quality. The Humans Behind AgriolabsBragging isn't really our style, but we aren't lying when we say we've got the most amazing team ever. Agriolabs was made to tackle big problems by leveraging awesome technology and out of the box thinking. Everyone in the team is a natural problem solver in their own way and we all share the same mission to do good, sustainably. From creating jobs, helping reduce food waste, or building vertical farms in the oceans, know that you're supporting a innovative startup that is willing to take massive action.  Risks and challenges Why are seedpads Canada only?Our seedpads contain organic seeds embedded in hemp fibre mats and covered. column3:
>Flint Charge is the hassle-free way to power up your phone and other gadgets! Designed with modularity in mind, its sleek and powerful features materialize your dream of snap-on wireless charging.

 

 

       

 

Carry as little as you require – or as much as you need. 

You can choose between minimalism or having an extra back up with Flint Charge’s modular design. You can text, call, and surf the net seamlessly with up to more than a day’s worth of battery life from a single source.

column1:
0% Wires. 50% Technology. 100% Effortless. 

Our Powersnaps are designed to be as thin as possible, so you can get charging done with the effortless, wire-free option. An optional magnetic tab will also be included, for adhering inside or on your phone case, which in turn allows the Powersnaps to magnetically attach to your mobile device. Simple and intuitive instructions for the best placement for the magnetic tabs will be provided. Check compatibility here.

 

             

Say goodbye to messy wires and bulky casings.

Flint Charge is life simplified, aesthetically. No cables required and your phone's batteries will be restored back to life in no time thanks to our fast wireless charging technology.          

 

 

Power your devices. Power your friends. Power for all.

Charge up to 4 of yours and your friend’s devices simultaneously while charging the powerbank itself without safety or heat concerns. *Powersnaps are not restricted to mobile phones only, which means all QI enabled devices (including your AirPods/GalaxyBuds) can be charged!

Have you ever wanted to have an easily movable source of clean power that can meet even the most demanding of devices and appliances?
Something so powerful it could power your fridge if the power went out for a whole day? But light enough to bring in a backpack to the beach or Sunday picnic?
Enjoy your very own MegaPower UPS +Solar power storage system for emergencies, outdoor entertainment and fun!!
Multipurpose Product - Take it anywhere and use it where ever you need power
Emergency Use - Never be caught without power again
Car Use - Boost your battery safe and easy
Home Use - Blackouts, garden, backyard or anywhere around the home
Office Use - UPS back up power solution
• Outdoor Use: Picnics, beach, parks or anywhere, bring your electronics with you and enjoy charging, cooling or even a full projection theater with surround sound on the beach!
• 1399 Watt/hours or a whopping 378,108 mAH of battery capacity
• 932 Watt/hours or 251,891 mAH of battery capacity

There are 2 types of inverters available on the market. Pure sine wave inverters provide the same type of electrical signal generated by your power company. This is what most electronics are built to work with. The other type is ""modified sine wave"" inverters. They are cheaper, but the cost is many electronic devices will not work optimally with them. This is the reason we've chosen to go with pure sine wave for all of our MegaPower battery storage products. Only optimal output and performance for all your power needs.
Plug your +Solar panel directly into the MegaPower UPS to get free power during the day. Whats better than FREE and GREEN Power during the day and night?
You may just need to pick up a few of these units for your house and office. MegaPower UPS+ is also an uninterruptible power supply.
Step 1: Connect your main power supply directly to the MegaPower UPS+ AC Input
Step 2: Plug-in your sensitive office or electrical equipment through MegaPower UPS+.
Congratulations! You've now completed the installation for your automatic backup power system.

If there is a blackout, within 5 MILLISECONDS Megapower UPS+ will automatically switch on and continue to power everything connected to it. Your data, WiFi, unfinished work and equipment will all be left safe and available.
Similar to UPS function, this allows you to charge MegaPower UPS +Solar while continuing to use it at the same time. With multiple ways of charging from:
• Solar or wind charging (160W Portable = 6-7 hours) (330W Dual Glass 3-4 hours)
Super fast charging times compared to typical lead acid batteries found in battery storage units today. Other advantages over acid lead batteries:

Much greater DOD (Depth of Discharge) meaning how much of the battery you can safely use. 50% is the DOD for Lead Acid, while Lithium batteries found in MegaPower UPS+ can have a 100% DOD. We however recommend a maximum of 90% Discharge with 80% or less being optimal for extended battery life and increased power over time
Recharges 2X as fast as Lead Acid batteries

Longer life typically Lead Acid batteries need to be replaced every year or two. Our high quality Lithium batteries can last 5+ years with many companies providing 10 year warranties on their battery life.
Our #1 Concern. We have many built-in safety features that give you and your family peace of mind.
2 year performance warranty for MegaPower UPS+ 1000W
3 year performance warranty for MegaPower UPS+ 1400W
3 year performance warranty for +Solar portable panels
25 year performance warranty for +Solar dual glass panel
Depending on your Country. Be sure to choose the right option when checking out.      (We will confirm with you before shipping again)
Most products on the market today require 3 separate pieces of equipment for Solar + Storage Systems:
With MegaPower UPS +Solar Storage all you need to do is plug in your solar panels and GO!

column1: We are offering our newly completed 5000W/hour MegaPower UPS+ off-grid battery storage here for the first time.

While emergencies, outdoor fun and adventure call for a portable solution like our MegaPower 1000W/hour and 1400W/hour, many people are looking to go green in a bigger way. With 5000W/hours that can be extended up to 20,000W/hours+ of battery storage by simply daisy chaining 2 or more units together.
That's days or weeks of back up power!
Buy one first, then add more power over time easily.
Combine your 5000W - 20,000W/hour solar storage with +Solar Dual Glass panels and experience true energy independence 100% environmentally friendly and sustainable.

For your added peace of mind, we've added a 5 year warranty for Megapower 5000W UPS+ and 25 years life warranty for +Solar Dual Glass panels. Now you can add a full solar solution to your home or office at the most affordable price ever.
Check out our Daisy Chain perks for whole house specials.
Bgreenie Make The Earth Green Again is a brand that seeks to empower people around the earth to make better decisions about the environment.
• Financial Inclusion - Through the creation of local businesses and jobs
• Environmental Protection - Through the use of new technologies that are environmentally friendly and effective.
• Waste Transformation - Through effective management of organic and non-organic waste

• Green Power Development - Through the effective use of the sun and wind with MegaPower technologies to provide clean power day and night for people, families and businesses to grow in a way that positively impacts communities and the environment.
Conscious Fest 2019 Hong Kong - Green is the New Black Event:
MegaPower powers a Bgreenie business presentation at Residence G 5 Star hotel in Shenzhen, China.

An old Indigenous saying tells us that we don't inherit our Mother Earth from our parents, in fact we borrow our Mother Earth from our children. Let's make the next generation proud of our stewardship!
Share our campaign and websites everywhere, talk about us and let people know what we are doing!
Remember to use the built-in Indiegogo share tools to make sharing easy.

Every time someone uses your link to back us, you will be listed as the referrer! (Special referrer perks and surprises coming soon, so start sharing as soon as you've completed your contribution to be automatically entered into our referral program!)

People are on the Move

People are on the move. Some make seasonal migrations to feed themselves and their animals. Some are forced from their homes due to natural disasters or war. Others make their living traveling into dangerous territories. Others explore the harshest wilderness to invigorate their lives.

Our studies, commencing five years ago, determined that people require tough, weatherproof, lightweight, and wearable tools
column2:
tools that can clean accessible surface water and continuously energize life-saving gear, like water pumps, area lighting, heat sources, and communications equipment.

Our Mission is to provide access to clean water, air and power, to those in need, due to war, migration, natural disaster, or pollution.

Now, we need your help.

About Us

(Left to Right) Sean Anderson, Co-Founder
column4:
Ricky Livingston, Co-Founder

Presently there are 7 Jaguar team members. Members have worked for IBM, HP, Xerox, the United States Air Force among other organizations. We are a small, self-funded team of scientists, engineers, and manufacturing experts founded upon the belief that our time is best spent building gear that enables personal refuge and exploration within extremely harsh environments. 

Our team members primarily reside in Southern California. We design about 80% of our product components. About 80% of those components are fabricated in the United States. Presently we assemble all our gear in Southern California. In the future, we hope to fabricate parts and assemble systems throughout the United States.

We have been conducting research and development for five years while working full and part time (at other companies) while paying for our own materials, fabrication, and testing. We all want to commit ourselves fulltime to manufacturing our gear and doing fieldwork to gain the knowledge required to evolve our solutions, and to develop new ones.

We have now have reached a point where our personal resources are no longer adequate to scale our manufacturing and bring our product designs to market.

Please provide your assistance, via a donation or via a purchase so we can bring our gear to those who need it now and who will need it in the future.

Note: We shot and edited our videos ourselves but hired spokes peoples to deliver some of our key ideas because none us are presentation professionals. Thank you for your understanding.

Packs with proprietary battery encasements lock you into working with a single battery-pack supplier and into waiting hours to maintain and replenish your access to power on the go. SlingIt puts YOU in control. SlingIt provides 12 steady volts (and up to 10 amps) of power. Just swap out drained rechargeable batteries with your own re-charged batteries.

SlingIt shipments begin by Thanksgiving.

7 Reasons to Own a SlingIt

1) SlingIt's Power is replenished quickly without a wall socket. It runs on standard-size, rechargeable batteries. Just swap out drained batteries with charged batteries.

SlingIt is powered by standard-sized, 8 or 10 amp, rechargeable, lithium-ion, 18650 batteries. Many battery manufacturers consistently produce high-quality 18650 cells, including Panasonic, Samsung, Sanyo, and Tenergy. You find them all over the world in electric cars, electric bikes, power tools, flashlights, and battery packs. Keep spare, charged batteries on-hand. When batteries are drained, simply swap them out with recharged batteries and keep using your SlingIt. 

SlingIt operates using six batteries. Six batteries and two battery smart-chargers are provided with each SlingIt purchase. 

(View more in our video gallery)
(View more in our video gallery)

column1: (View more in our video gallery)
• Six 3500 mAh batteries energized a WOW 2160 lumen LED work light for over 3 hours.
• Six 3500 mAh batteries recharged a lower capacity internal mobile phone battery 7x (from 0% to 100%).
• Six 3500 mAh batteries energized 1 of the water pumps we intend to deploy in our CleanIt water filtration system for over 5 hours.
Not bad for less than 12 ounces of battery weight.

2) Keep track of your battery performance using readily available smart chargers.

Easily load six batteries at a time into SlingIt. When drained, swap out batteries with fresh batteries and keep using your SlingIt. Charging individual batteries is much more efficient than charging a big battery pack. Recharge your 18650 batteries via smart chargers
column2:
you never need to charge SlingIt! Smart chargers identify degraded or failing batteries, remove them from your battery inventory to preserve peak SlingIt performance.

Two smart chargers are supplied with each SlingIt purchase.

column1: (View more in our video gallery)

3) SlingIt is impact-resistant and has no fragile displays or external switches.

SlingIt doesn’t look like like typical power packs, because it’s built to survive and remain functional through whatever rough or rugged conditions are served up during your journeys.

SlingIt's internal, shock-absorbing battery suspension system is housed within a protective, 2.75"" diameter, 6061-T6 aluminum cylinder with 1/4"" thick, primed, coated and waxed walls. SlingIt has no external switches or displays susceptible to breakage.
(View more in our video gallery)

4) SlingIt is lightweight and wearable.

The SlingIt power system is lightweight and is designed to be worn like a pack or a cross-body “sling” bag. SlingIt is carried in a custom, padded, dual layer, heavy canvas cylindrical bag, surrounded by 10 rows of MOLLE loops.

MOLLE stands for “Modular Lightweight Load-Carrying Equipment”
column2: it is a common standard used by manufactures who design interconnecting packs and pouches. By weaving straps attached to MOLLE-compatible accessories through the bag's loops, you can construct your own pack solution. The bags loop arrays are used to attach the bag's shoulder straps and enable you to adjust how your pack straddles your back.

column1: (View more in our video gallery)
• Overall weight of SlingIt (including its canvas carry bag): 12 pounds
• Diameter of power system's battery assembly: 2.5 inches
• Outer diameter of the aluminum cylindrical battery assembly encasement: 2.75 inches
• Diameter of power system’s protective end caps: 4.0 inches
• Inner diameter of the cylindrical, canvas carry bag: 4.0 inches
• Outer (uncompressed/uncinched) diameter of the (uncompressed / uncinched) carry bag: 5.25 inches
(View more in our video gallery)

5) SlingIt is weather-resistant.

SlingIt has a single, standard size, 12 volt socket. The single socket is weather-resistant, as end caps protect the system from contamination. SlingIt has no delicate, leak prone, displays or switches, which can be contaminated by water and soils. Applying a thin layer of non-conductive dielectric grease, to the battery assembly's disk shaped seals provides extra protection. SlingIt's bag is treated for water and stain resistance. 

(View more in our video gallery)

6) SlingIt is a long life device made from premium materials.

SlingIt is designed to have a long life and is primarily made from:

Its simple design makes SlingIt easy to clean, maintain, and, eventually, recycle.

7) Jaguar sustainably builds its products in the USA.

Jaguar team members have directed manufacturing efforts for 30+ years. We understand when automation is required and when a human touch is preferable.

We begin the process of building your system upon your purchase. To eliminate wasteful excess inventory, and to ensure product/component improvements are incorporated into our product as soon as possible, Jaguar products are assembled on-demand (upon order). Hardware components, designed by the team, are fabricated in small batches. We transport scrap copper, aluminum, and polyethylene pieces to recyclers.

Cost reduction, via overseas manufacturing, would necessitate mass manufacturing, which is wasteful and slows the deployment of incremental improvements to product components. I.e. Lower cost mass manufacturing necessitates the sales of large inventories prior to the deployment of design improvements.
• Jaguar Wearable Technologies is located in U.S.
• The team's hardware products are designed and assembled by hand in the U.S.
• Hardware components, designed by the team, are fabricated in the U.S.

Every system is tested after assembly and every part used to build each system is cataloged to improve service whenever you need support.

(View more in our video gallery)

We are responsible for SlingIt’s materials and manufacturing. We will repair or replace your SlingIt’s components due to materials or manufacturing flaws up to one year from date of purchase, so long as you use your SlingIt in accordance with SlingIt’s instructions for use. We are not responsible for damage resulting from misuse.
We give you the freedom to select your own 18650 batteries. It is up to you to use the batteries safely and responsibly.

JAGUAR WEARABLE TECHNOLOGIES DOES NOT MANUFACTURE, INTEGRATE, DISTRIBUTE, OR RE-SELL BATTERIES. WE DO NOT PROVIDE BATTERY WARRANTIES. WE ARE NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR BATTERY PERFORMANCE OR THE USE/MISUSE OF BATTERIES BY THE END-USER.
Where to Buy Batteries for your SlingIt

You can buy 18650 batteries online from online retailers. Good places to start include: liionwholesale.com, power.tenergy.com, IMRbatteries, and 18650batterystore.com. These sites include detailed battery specifications and safety information. Some dealers offer “bulk” discounts.
• When it comes to storing and using rechargeable Lithium Ion batteries, here are some notes you need to review carefully.
• SlingIt supports “button-top” batteries exclusively. Button top style batteries are like the C or D cell batteries you commonly use in flashlights.
• Always use 5, 8, or 10 amp batteries in your SlingIt. Never insert a battery claiming to support greater than 10 amps into your SlingIt.

• Power your SlingIt using “protected” 18650 batteries. Each protected battery has its own small circular circuit board installed in its tip. Protection circuits are installed by battery component integrators and dealers. This protection circuit protects the battery from overcharge, or over-discharge.
• Always use standard-length, 65mm-67mm, 18650 batteries. Protected, button-top batteries add about 2mm to the overall length of an 18650 battery.

<li>Always install 6 batteries made by the same company, and which have the same capacity and amperage specifications into your SlingIt. You may have an inventory of batteries built by different companies, with different capacities, and which support different amperages
column2: so make certain you keep your batteries sorted so you only have 1 type of battery installed at any one time.

column1: • Always follow the battery manufacturer’s/battery distributor’s directions for safety and handling.

column2: but can be found among dealers with a bit of effort. Short supplies have led to higher battery prices. If you can’t find the highest capacity name brand batteries you desire we recommend you purchase lower capacity name brand batteries and resist the temptation of purchasing off-brand batteries which may provide inconsistent safety, performance, and longevity.

Battery Pack Marketing Teams Confound Us with Capacity Claims…..But they’re just doing their jobs.

A letter from Jaguar Wearable Technologies Founders

Dear Reader,

Sales teams commonly conflate “sets of numbers” with product value. Higher mileage numbers are good. Fewer calories is good. A higher price tag on a restaurant menu must mean it’s tastier. We all know sales teams can be loose with the truth.

Battery pack pitch teams are no different than those selling cars or diet food. They use a confounding assortment of numbers, inserted among long strings of mysterious words to convince us the product they’re pitching is preferable to a competitive product. If you’ve been shopping for a battery pack you’ve likely seen lots of numbers associated with terms like volts, amps, milliampere hours, watt hours, etc. Some numbers you recognize because you’ve put them to use. You understand that devices you operate require a certain number of volts / amps, but many other numbers, however, are difficult to relate to practical experiences.

This brief letter intends to provide you with some practical battery pack capacity information, which we hope you can put to good use so you make the best decision “for you.”

Recharging time is just as important as pack capacity

You likely know the range your car / truck will travel via a single tank of fuel. It’s important because the range reflects the cost of traveling a specific distance. It’s important because you may be concerned about the availability of fuel along a long stretch of isolated road. What’s less important is the amount of time you will spend pumping fuel into your vehicle
column2:
because pumps refill your tank in a small handful of minutes. Only if there is a shortage of refueling stations and fuel pumps could “refueling time” become an issue.

Unlike refilling your car’s gas tank, the practical use of rechargeable batteries has a lot to do with recharge times.

Some of us who use combustion engine cars may consider owning an electric car, dependent upon rechargeable battery technology, if we lived very predictable lives that accommodated multiple hours of recharge time. If we typically traveled distances daily (to and from home) less than the range supported by a single “charge,” and we could always fully recharge our car’s batteries over night, electric vehicles might have some cool perks we would enjoy.

Once drained, most high capacity (so-called) portable battery packs require between 8 - 24 hours to fully recharge, via a typical home’s power outlet, thus leashing the pack to that outlet for 8 to 24 hours.

If you must own a typical plug-in, rechargeable battery pack, we advise that you (1) do your best to predict how many “contiguous hours you are willing to forfeit your pack’s availability,” in order to completely recharge your pack after each usage period
column3:
and then (2) purchase only the amount of pack capacity that you can fully recharge within that number of hours. For example, if you can commit to plugging in your pack each night for 8 hours, purchase a pack that can be fully recharged in 8 hours. If you need more (drainage) capacity, buy additional packs instead of purchasing a higher capacity pack. If you drain 2 packs, you can charge each pack for 8 hours via their own outlet.

Do you sense a “pattern” here? If you cannot predict the availability of recharging resources, or you cannot predict how long you can forfeit a pack’s availability (to recharge it), a single plug-in rechargeable battery pack is not a practical power source, no matter what’s its capacity.

Redundancy is often more valuable than pack capacity

Batteries degrade as they are drained and recharged. Individual batteries, even those of the same model, made by the same company, degrade at different rates. Most packs contain groups of batteries (referred to a “series”), which are wired and or spot welded together, and thus, interdependent. Just a single degraded battery in a series can degrade the other batteries ability to drain and to recharge. Over time, pack capacity degrades.

Here is a simple example (just for comparison) of how things can go wrong when charging groups (series) of batteries. Imagine you have a row of 6 identical bath tubs side by side. You install big cylinders, horizontally, connecting tub 1 to tub 2, tub 3 to 4, 4 to 5 and 5 to 6. The cylinders (connecting the tubs) are at the same height from the floor. You fill up tub 1 and when tub 1’s water level reaches the cylinder, water flows into tub 2. When the water level in tub 2 reaches the cylinder connecting it to tub 3, tub 3 fills up to the same level as tubs 1 and 2. Eventually, all the tubs end up with the same water level. Now, empty the tubs and drill a big hole in side wall of tub 3 (bigger than the the internal diameter of the cylinders) below the height of the cylinder connecting tub 3 to tub 4. Refill the tubs, via tub 1. As a result of the hole in tub 3
column4:
tubs 4, 5 and 6 never refill.

To mask this problem, pack makers install multiple groups of batteries (which run in parallel) and try keep the groups’ charges in balance, but masking the problem doesn’t halt degradation, that’s why most reputable battery and battery pack makers publish the estimated number of recharge cycles their battery or pack can endure, prior to 20% its (capacity) degradation (under ideal conditions).

Masking the problem becomes more and more complex as a greater quantity of battery groups are managed by a pack’s battery management system.

The Jaguar team believes their truth in the saying: “don’t put all your eggs in one basket” however, we believe that the solution is to NOT interconnect more and more batteries in a single pack. If you need capacity and must own a “plug-in” pack, you’re are better off owning and operating multiple packs.

If you’re open to learning about SlingIt, our team’s solution to the “plug-in pack” dilemma, please read-on.

18650 battery and SlingIt capacity

Standard size 18650, 8 and 10 amp, rechargeable batteries typically advertise capacities between 2500 and 3500 milliamp hours (mAh). You load six of the same 18650 batteries into a SlingIt to generate 12 volts and up to 10 amps of power. When the system can’t deliver 12 volts via the power provided by the batteries, SlingIt shuts down the power to its 12 volt socket. When the power shuts down, swap out the drained batteries with charged batteries. Insert the drained batteries into smart chargers (of the same make and model) and they will tell you if any of the individual batteries are degraded. Replace any number of degraded batteries with good batteries. The degradation problems are resolved, not masked.

Why are we willing to let you quickly replace drained batteries with charged batteries rather then taking the pack off line to accommodate hours of (pack plug-in pack) recharging? Why do we enable you to detect and replace degraded batteries? Because, it’s not our job to sell batteries, whether or not those batteries are packed into packs. It’s not our job to sell you multiple packs, to overcome recharge times and degraded batteries.

We consider it our job to enable you to build a battery and smart charger inventory which best meets your needs.

We consider it our job to ensure you have safe access to power almost any where and almost any time.

During our SlingIt application tests:

column1: • Six 3500 mAh batteries energized a WOW 2160 lumen LED work light for over 3 hours.
• Six 3500 mAh batteries recharged a lower capacity internal mobile phone battery 7x (from 0% to 100%).
• Six 3500 mAh batteries energized 1 of the water pumps we intend to deploy in our CleanIt water filtration system for over 5 hours.

Not bad for less than 12 ounces of battery weight.

CleanIt will be dimensionally compatible with SlingIt. CleanIt can be powered by SlingIt or another 12 volt, 10 amp DC power source and standard socket.
CleanIt will sell for $1099.00. You will be able to pre-order CleanIt in mid December and units will begin shipping in January.
Jaguar Wearable Technologies’ Limited Product Warranty

We are responsible for SlingIt’s materials and manufacturing. We will repair or replace your SlingIt’s components due to materials or manufacturing flaws up to one year from date of purchase, so long as you use your SlingIt in accordance with SlingIt’s instructions for use. We are not responsible for damage resulting from misuse.
We give you the freedom to select your own 18650 batteries. It is up to you to use the batteries safely and responsibly.

JAGUAR WEARABLE TECHNOLOGIES DOES NOT MANUFACTURE, INTEGRATE, DISTRIBUTE, OR RE-SELL BATTERIES. WE DO NOT PROVIDE BATTERY WARRANTIES. WE ARE NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR BATTERY PERFORMANCE OR THE USE/MISUSE OF BATTERIES BY THE END-USER.
Where to Buy Batteries for your SlingIt

You can buy 18650 batteries online from online retailers. Good places to start include: liionwholesale.com, power.tenergy.com, IMRbatteries, and 18650batterystore.com. These sites include detailed battery specifications and safety information. Some dealers offer “bulk” discounts.
When it comes to storing and using rechargeable Lithium Ion batteries, here are some notes you need to review carefully.
SlingIt supports “button-top” batteries exclusively. Button top style batteries are like the C or D cell batteries you commonly use in flashlights.
Always use 5, 8, or 10 amp batteries in your SlingIt. Never insert a battery claiming to support greater than 10 amps into your SlingIt.

Power your SlingIt using “protected” 18650 batteries. Each protected battery has its own small circular circuit board installed in its tip. Protection circuits are installed by battery component integrators and dealers. This protection circuit protects the battery from overcharge, or over-discharge.
Always use standard-length, 65mm-67mm, 18650 batteries. Protected, button-top batteries add about 2mm to the overall length of an 18650 battery.

Always install 6 batteries made by the same company, and which have the same capacity and amperage specifications into your SlingIt. You may have an inventory of batteries built by different companies, with different capacities, and which support different amperages
column2: so make certain you keep your batteries sorted so you only have 1 type of battery installed at any one time.

column1: Always follow the battery manufacturer’s/battery distributor’s directions for safety and handling.
Protected 18650 batteries from major US distributors:
Protected, 10 amp, Button-Top Sanyo from IMR BatteriesREAD THIS: IMR Batteries Warning
Protected, 8 amp, Button-Top Samsung from 18650 Battery StoreREAD THIS: 18650 Battery Store Warnings
Protected, 10 amp, Button-Top Orbtronics from OrbtronicsREAD THIS: Orbtronics Battery Warnings
Protected, 10 amp, Button-Top LG MJ1 from Liion WholesaleREAD THIS: Liion Wholesale Battery Warnings (scroll to “BATTERY WARNINGS” toward the bottom of the page)
READ THIS: University of Washington: Li-Ion Battery Safety (PDF file)
Lithium-Ion battery ingredients and circuits are contained in metal cylinders wrapped in plastic skins. Never install a battery with a damaged skin into your SlingIt.
Use 18650 batteries components made by reputable companies like Sanyo, Panasonic, Samsung and Tenergy
column2: known for consistently delivering safe, high-performance products.

column1: Use smart chargers to safely recharge your batteries, identify degraded batteries and to identify faulty and failing batteries.
SlingIt was brought to market, in part, to minimize battery waste streams. Please safely dispose of batteries and all e-waste responsibly.
Please Note:  During COVID lock downs, and now, following the (recent) end of lock downs, the highest capacity, protected, button top, name brand, 18650 batteries have been in short supply
column2: but can be found among dealers with a bit of effort. Short supplies have led to higher battery prices. If you can’t find the highest capacity name brand batteries you desire we recommend you purchase lower capacity name brand batteries and resist the temptation of purchasing off-brand batteries which may provide inconsistent safety, performance, and longevity.

column2: treated for water and stain resistance.

As a free gift we provide:
Six 18650 batteries: You must read our Critical Usage and Safety Page

Charger’s, converter’s, and batteries’ brands may differ based on availability.Battery Pack Marketing Teams Confound Us with Capacity Claims…..But they’re just doing their jobs.A letter from Jaguar Wearable Technologies FoundersDear Reader,Sales teams commonly conflate “sets of numbers” with product value. Higher mileage numbers are good. Fewer calories is good. A higher price tag on a restaurant menu must mean it’s tastier. We all know sales teams can be loose with the truth.Battery pack pitch teams are no different than those selling cars or diet food. They use a confounding assortment of numbers, inserted among long strings of mysterious words to convince us the product they’re pitching is preferable to a competitive product. If you’ve been shopping for a battery pack you’ve likely seen lots of numbers associated with terms like volts, amps, milliampere hours, watt hours, etc. Some numbers you recognize because you’ve put them to use. You understand that devices you operate require a certain number of volts / amps, but many other numbers, however, are difficult to relate to practical experiences.This brief letter intends to provide you with some practical battery pack capacity information, which we hope you can put to good use so you make the best decision “for you.”Recharging time is just as important as pack capacityYou likely know the range your car / truck will travel via a single tank of fuel. It’s important because the range reflects the cost of traveling a specific distance. It’s important because you may be concerned about the availability of fuel along a long stretch of isolated road. What’s less important is the amount of time you will spend pumping fuel into your vehicle
column2: because pumps refill your tank in a small handful of minutes. Only if there is a shortage of refueling stations and fuel pumps could “refueling time” become an issue.Unlike refilling your car’s gas tank, the practical use of rechargeable batteries has a lot to do with recharge times.Some of us who use combustion engine cars may consider owning an electric car, dependent upon rechargeable battery technology, if we lived very predictable lives that accommodated multiple hours of recharge time. If we typically traveled distances daily (to and from home) less than the range supported by a single “charge,” and we could always fully recharge our car’s batteries over night, electric vehicles might have some cool perks we would enjoy.Once drained, most high capacity (so-called) portable battery packs require between 8 - 24 hours to fully recharge, via a typical home’s power outlet, thus leashing the pack to that outlet for 8 to 24 hours.If you must own a typical plug-in, rechargeable battery pack, we advise that you (1) do your best to predict how many “contiguous hours you are willing to forfeit your pack’s availability,” in order to completely recharge your pack after each usage period
column3: and then (2) purchase only the amount of pack capacity that you can fully recharge within that number of hours. For example, if you can commit to plugging in your pack each night for 8 hours, purchase a pack that can be fully recharged in 8 hours. If you need more (drainage) capacity, buy additional packs instead of purchasing a higher capacity pack. If you drain 2 packs, you can charge each pack for 8 hours via their own outlet.Do you sense a “pattern” here? If you cannot predict the availability of recharging resources, or you cannot predict how long you can forfeit a pack’s availability (to recharge it), a single plug-in rechargeable battery pack is not a practical power source, no matter what’s its capacity.Redundancy is often more valuable than pack capacityBatteries degrade as they are drained and recharged. Individual batteries, even those of the same model, made by the same company, degrade at different rates. Most packs contain groups of batteries (referred to a “series”), which are wired and or spot welded together, and thus, interdependent. Just a single degraded battery in a series can degrade the other batteries ability to drain and to recharge. Over time, pack capacity degrades.Here is a simple example (just for comparison) of how things can go wrong when charging groups (series) of batteries. Imagine you have a row of 6 identical bath tubs side by side. You install big cylinders, horizontally, connecting tub 1 to tub 2, tub 3 to 4, 4 to 5 and 5 to 6. The cylinders (connecting the tubs) are at the same height from the floor. You fill up tub 1 and when tub 1’s water level reaches the cylinder, water flows into tub 2. When the water level in tub 2 reaches the cylinder connecting it to tub 3, tub 3 fills up to the same level as tubs 1 and 2. Eventually, all the tubs end up with the same water level. Now, empty the tubs and drill a big hole in side wall of tub 3 (bigger than the the internal diameter of the cylinders) below the height of the cylinder connecting tub 3 to tub 4. Refill the tubs, via tub 1. As a result of the hole in tub 3
column4: tubs 4, 5 and 6 never refill.To mask this problem, pack makers install multiple groups of batteries (which run in parallel) and try keep the groups’ charges in balance, but masking the problem doesn’t halt degradation, that’s why most reputable battery and battery pack makers publish the estimated number of recharge cycles their battery or pack can endure, prior to 20% its (capacity) degradation (under ideal conditions).Masking the problem becomes more and more complex as a greater quantity of battery groups are managed by a pack’s battery management system.The Jaguar team believes their truth in the saying: “don’t put all your eggs in one basket” however, we believe that the solution is to NOT interconnect more and more batteries in a single pack. If you need capacity and must own a “plug-in” pack, you’re are better off owning and operating multiple packs.If you’re open to learning about SlingIt, our team’s solution to the “plug-in pack” dilemma, please read-on.18650 battery and SlingIt capacityStandard size 18650, 8 and 10 amp, rechargeable batteries typically advertise capacities between 2500 and 3500 milliamp hours (mAh). You load six of the same 18650 batteries into a SlingIt to generate 12 volts and up to 10 amps of power. When the system can’t deliver 12 volts via the power provided by the batteries, SlingIt shuts down the power to its 12 volt socket. When the power shuts down, swap out the drained batteries with charged batteries. Insert the drained batteries into smart chargers (of the same make and model) and they will tell you if any of the individual batteries are degraded. Replace any number of degraded batteries with good batteries. The degradation problems are resolved, not masked.Why are we willing to let you quickly replace drained batteries with charged batteries rather then taking the pack off line to accommodate hours of (pack plug-in pack) recharging? Why do we enable you to detect and replace degraded batteries? Because, it’s not our job to sell batteries, whether or not those batteries are packed into packs. It’s not our job to sell you multiple packs, to overcome recharge times and degraded batteries.We consider it our job to enable you to build a battery and smart charger inventory which best meets your needs.We consider it our job to ensure you have safe access to power almost any where and almost any time.During our SlingIt application tests:

column1: Six 3500 mAh batteries energized a WOW 2160 lumen LED work light for over 3 hours.
Six 3500 mAh batteries recharged a lower capacity internal mobile phone battery 7x (from 0% to 100%).
Six 3500 mAh batteries energized 1 of the water pumps we intend to deploy in our CleanIt water filtration system for over 5 hours.
Not bad for less than 12 ounces of battery weight.",2.0,10,"1 Campaign
