Since, I've invested all my available funds into the development of the technology, I am reaching out to my family, friends, and the public for help in raising funds.  I know it’s a lot to ask but every little bit helps.  We currently, have submitted for grants as well, but most have a long waiting period..  A minimum of $300,000 would help the shortfall, but $500,000 would provide a safety net. Anyone interested in becoming a major shareholder can email me directly.

This Beta 2 will be a full 3 layer system and upon completion and operation, it will be able to become certified, allowing us to go to market. Our system is consistent with the current market price for small wind turbines, and we are already reserving units for 2022 with an estimate of $5.5 million in sales.
This system is not like any wind turbine currently on the market and has the potential of changing the industry. Please consider contributing to help reduce our carbon footprint.

The modular wind turbine system can be customized without changing fabrication techniques. This allows the system to enter the end-user location where medium and large conventional turbine towers cannot gain access. Think of manufacturers and businesses having a means to reduce their carbon footprint.
This system uses the Bernoulli Principle to accelerate and groom the wind, the energy output is cubed, which also allows us to produce more energy in less square footage than a conventional system.
Two equations are vital in understanding and constructing wind turbine generators:
(1) The power output of a wind generator is proportional to the area swept by the rotor - double the sweep area and the power output will also double. (Formula for prop-on-pole)

(2) The power output of a wind generator is proportional to the cube of the wind speed - double the wind speed and the power output will increase by a factor of eight (2 x 2 x 2). By accelerating the wind speed we cube our energy output, which allows us to produce more energy in less square footage than a conventional system. This is how the MWTS works.

Our biggest risk is not funding our operational budget in time for construction. Our team is working every avenue to raise funds but with many new innovations and startups, it's tough.  Once the unit is up and sales are contracted, financing is available.  We are fully insured.
If five dollars is too much please send this to as many friends and family that you know that could possibly help.
0,"
column2:
>

Day in, day out, your shower never changes. It gets the job done, and you’ve never given it a second thought. But what if it could evolve? What if your shower became an elevated experience that cleansed you faster, more efficiently and with cleaner water?

Don’t stop there – let’s say it also used 75% less water.

This is Cirrus, an innovative new shower system that introduces water-atomizing CloudMaker technology to bring you luxurious sensations, water savings, 13x more thermal efficiency and 10x more surface area coverage.
column3:
>

By turning your shower into a pressurized mist, Cirrus envelops your entire body in a cocoon of warmth. With a deluge of atomized water increasing surface area coverage 10-fold, every inch of your hair and skin is cleansed faster and more efficiently – while using drastically less water than a standard showerhead.

For the average household this 75% water reduction translates to over 15,000 Gallons of water saved per year. Not only does this mean that Cirrus pays for itself in less than 2 years – but the reduction of a Cirrus household’s environmental impact on water reserves is massive.

To push this industry innovation further, we built easily replaceable NanoFIlters into the Cirrus Core. These filters contain 3 layers of mineralized stones to filter impurities, reduce chlorine, and balance pH levels for a truly pure shower experience.

For complete invigoration, relaxation and well-being, choose from our aromatherapy NanoFilter blends infused with organic essential oils.

The best part? Cirrus is universal to any bathroom. Installation takes seconds – no tools, no complex directions, no hassle.

Cirrus is here to revolutionize your shower.
column5:
>

Be embraced by the misty deluge of Cirrus CloudMaker technology the moment you enter your shower. Every inch of skin is engulfed by water, warming tired achy muscles and drenching hair in seconds.

When shower time becomes an all-new hydrotherapeutic experience, you won’t want to leave. And with such incredible water efficiency, you don’t have to. Cirrus takes away the guilt (and cost) of long, steamy showers by reducing water consumption by a massive 75%.
column6:
>

A Cirrus shower will invigorate your mind, freshen your body and sharpen your senses to tackle the day head. And at nighttime, it will soothingly warm and relax every muscle in your body for a sleep that’s deep and healing
column7:
>

Take a look at the difference between Cirrus and a typical showerhead…
column8:
>

 The nozzle of a standard showerhead shoots a jet stream of water – the majority of which is wasted down the drain. With Cirrus, water is pushed through the CloudMaker nozzle, which disperses every particle into a fine, pressurized mist.
column9:
>

With this dispersion, every droplet of water is fully optimized. The result? A showerhead that covers 10x more surface area while being 13x more thermally efficient than the standard model.
column15:
>

Just as important as water usage, there’s another factor that goes into the high cost of your shower: Heat. In a standard shower, only a mere 3% of the thermal energy used to heat your water is actually transferred to your body and the surrounding air. Where does the rest of that 97% go? Straight down the drain (along with your money). 

With Cirrus, the water is dispersed into millions of tiny droplets rather than a single stream. With a larger amount of individual droplets yielding a larger water surface area, more heat is efficiently transferred to the air as the droplets fall.

This means that Cirrus transfers 13 times more thermal energy from your warm water to both you and the air around you, decreasing the amount of heat required to shower.

The water dispersion and thermal efficiency of the Cirrus showerhead saves you money on your water bill and your heating bill.
column16:
>

Foamy shampoo and body lather doesn’t stand a chance. Defying all expectations, Cirrus is capable of rinsing soapy hair and skin more efficiently than a regular showerhead. Despite using 75% less water, the fully optimized mist covers every inch of your body, permeates every strand of hair and flushes away soap with ease.
column18:
>

The ultimate shower experience wouldn’t be complete without pure, filtered water. Since Cirrus is all about revolutionizing the way you shower, it was obvious that we needed a new, innovative filtration system.
column20:
>

 

The Cirrus water-purifying NanoFilters contain 3 layers of mineralized stones that work to transform your tap water.

• Tourmaline stones balance pH levels

• Far-Infrared stones filter water impurities such as chlorine, dirt and bacteria

• Germanium stones give a natural spring water effect for softer, cleaner, more hydrated skin
column21:
> 

Unwanted particles in your tap water may be the culprit for dry skin and damaged hair. As water flows through the fine pores of the mineralized stones, these large excess particles are filtered out. This simple yet effective method of filtration mimics the process of nature and fresh free-flowing springs, leaving your shower water pure. The result? Softer, cleaner skin and a longer lifetime for your showerhead.
column22:
>

Our NanoFilter pods are simple and easy to replace. You’ll know exactly when their time is up thanks to an indicator located directly on the cartridge, which shows it’s remaining lifetime. On average, each NanoFilter will last between 2 to 3 months based on a household of 4.

The Cirrus Core and NanoFilters are designed to function separately from the Cirrus showerhead. This means you can use the Core in conjunction with any standard showerhead in your home for a cleaner, more pure shower.

On the other hand, if you don’t want to use the Core for water filtration or aromatherapy but still want the luxurious experience and water savings of Cirrus, you can opt to use the Cirrus showerhead on its own.
column23:
>

Essential oils gleaned from various plants have been used for thousands of years in cultures around the world to relieve everything from headache to depression. Now, you can bring the curative properties of aromatherapy into your shower.  

It’s like having a spa in your own home. Not only does the Cirrus core contain water-purifying NanoFilters – it can also house one of our curated essential oil blends to invigorate your mind and body.

Equipped with the same water-filtering technology as their non-aromatic cousins, water flows through the purifying stones and disperses the scent of therapeutic oils throughout your shower. These organic essential oils are colorless and soap-free, meaning they won’t color your water or perfume your body. Each single-use aromatherapy cartridge lasts for approximately 8 minutes of blissful showertime.
column24:
>

Step into a warm cocoon of water and let the aromatic mist envelop you. Do you desire a sharp, exciting blend that energizes you and focuses your mind for the day ahead? Or a relaxing mixture of calming scents and muscle-soothing oils for a deep and luxurious sleep?

Choose from our range of 6 essential oil infusers, expertly blended by aromatherapists of France.

• Calming (Lavender and Bergamot): Stress relief, healing, relaxation, pain relief, sleep aid

• Desire (Orange and Cinnamon): Energy boost, immune system, digestion

• Forest (Lime and Cedar): Stress relief, cold symptom relief, relaxation

• Sunshine (Lime and Mint): Focus, energy boost, invigoration, immune system

• PureShape (Lavender and Geranium): Relaxation, mood stabilization, stress relief, sleep aid

• Passion (Geranium and Red Fruits): Relaxation, mood stabilization, immune system
column26:
>

 Cirrus will revolutionize the way you shower – and look good doing it, too.

Beautiful French design combines functionality with sleek, modern curves that illicit a futuristic feeling. The crisp white bottom and shining chrome top made of quality polycarbonate will add a high-concept aesthetic to any bathroom.

Installation couldn’t be easier, either.

Fixed by magnets, the showerhead support latches on to any shower wall in seconds and the ergonomic wand slides in effortlessly. When not in use, the wand fixes to the wall support at a 45-degree angle, magnetically held in place.

column1: Cirrus was designed with the user in mind. Installation is universal, adaptable to any bathroom without the need for renovations or design changes. Setup is tool-free, straightforward and foolproof.
column7: >
column10:
>

Our vision for the future is a world where technology brings forth new innovations that not only increase the quality of life for everyday people, but also create sustainable tomorrows for their children.

By creating a shower system that cuts down on thousands of gallons of water consumed by American households every year – while giving them an experience of elevated luxury – we hope to do our small part in this mission.

So who are we? We’re production and delivery experts, with over 10 years of experience in the industry. Our team is no stranger to the successful management of production and distribution. We orchestrate the complex logistics of the manufacturing world for breakfast. Part of our team is strategically located in Hong Kong in order to closely monitor the product development process and supervise quality control.  

The idea for the Cirrus shower system was first conceptualized in 2011, and since then, founder Pierre Regnault has been working diligently to turn this vision into a reality. Years of strategic planning, designing, and building (mixed in with some sweat and tears) have all led to this very moment.
column11:
>

From the bottom of our hearts, we’d like to thank our friends, family, and supporters such as yourself for helping us get to this point.

We couldn’t have done it without you all!

Your feedback, support and advice continue to inspire us everyday to make Cirrus a better product.

Special thanks go out to
column12: Sophie Regnault, Fabien Nauroy, Arnault Brac, Christophe Letelier, Philippe Arnaud, Antoine Markarian, Pierre-Henry Coppéré, and Philippe Deconinck.

column1: Want to write about CIRRUS ? Download our press pack!
Questions or concerns? Feel free to email us at press@cirrus-shower.com",51.0,0,"1 Campaign

column2:
>Create a spa-like atmosphere in any bathroom

You may have experienced the difference a heated towel rack made when staying in hotels. But, don’t you want that same luxury at home? Introducing Ranvoo, a minimalist yet high-performing towel warmer that not only turns your bath routine into a spa experience but also serves a ton of practical everyday uses.​
column3:
>Ranvoo dries your bath towel perfectly

Ranvoo quickly dries and sanitizes your towels while keeping them easily accessible, creating a warm, healthy and comforting end to every bath or shower. It transcends seasons and locales to reduce damp and mildew on your towels and in a surrounding space. Besides towels, Ranvoo can be used to dry and disinfect delicate clothing, such as swimming suits, underwear, socks, pajamas, bath towel and much more.

Unlike other electric or hydronic towel warmers that require a plumber or an electrician to install it, you can, all by yourself, firmly mount Ranvoo to the wall through the adhesive on its back, completely tool-free and drill-free. As a result, your entire family will enjoy the comfort, style and function provided by Ranvoo.
column4: >A combination of hot air- and infrared-assisted drying method
column6:
>Ranvoo dries a towel in a mere 2 hours, 33% faster than other towel dryers.

We conducted an experiment on the drying effect of Ranvoo in comparison to two other brands in the same condition. Three identical towels, wetted with the same amount of water on the same spot, were respectively hung on three different towel warmers which were turned on at the same time to start heating. The weight of each towel was recorded every 10 minutes until they were fully dried.Ranvoo uses carbon fiber as the electrical heating element​
column9: >Infrared radiation of Ranvoo is immediate as soon as it is switched on.
column10:
>The temperature reaches over 140°F right after switching on the machine

The carbon fiber tube generates invisible far infrared rays that spread in a wide range across the towel, which also heat up the air moved by two centrifugal blowers on either end of the rack to a long distance. As a result of the combined drying efforts, the towel can be dehydrated far quicker by Ranvoo than other towel warmers.
column11: >Monthly electricity cost in different states for using Ranvoo for 2 hours each day
column13: >Ranvoo towel warmer removes humidity from your life
column15: >Ranvoo’s infrared radiation enables higher heating rates with lower energy consumption.
column17: >Ranvoo’s dual heating technology takes a wide lead in terms of cost-effective efficiency and comfort.

column1: • Ranvoo’s radiant heating, made more widely and evenly by the blowing hot air, does not heat the surrounding air, only those surfaces that the radiation hits, thus being more efficient.
• As for other traditional towel warmers, mainly hydronic or electric, most of the heat is dissipated into the surrounding air instead of the surfaces of the towels.

Fancy a fresh and warm towel but scared off by the high electricity bill? With Ranvoo, the maximum cost is only $2 per month. By applying carbon fiber heating coils and the smart drying mechanism, the energy efficiency is improved to its greatest extent to save money and the environment.
column2: >Dual disinfection effect of both hot air and UVC for the ultimate hygiene
column3: >Diseases caused by bacteria and fungus of a damp towel
column4:
>Ranvoo provides all-round protection for the health of your kids

Bacteria on a damp towel are the culprit of bad smells and many annoying illnesses. The hot air blown and the ultraviolet radiated from the rack to the towel reduce 99% of the mold and fungus. Controlled by an intelligent sensor, the ultraviolet emitter will only turn on when covered by a towel to avoid superfluous exposure of UVC.
column5: >Compact size makes Ranvoo a perfect fit for anywhere in your bathroom
column6: >High capacity for accommodating underwear, socks, pajamas and much moreConbination of 2 Ranvoo towel racks for large capacity and multiple functions
column7: >Minimalist discreet design perfectly blends into any home decor
column8: >Big obtrusive design matches poorly to your bathroom and takes a lot of space
column9: >Measuring about 5 inches high and 20 inches wide, its sleek, minimalist profile works well in any modern bathroom. Ranvoo is designed to heat two sizable towels at once but can hold more when used to hang-dry clothing with its included C-shaped hooks.Intuitive touch screen makes control a breeze.
column10: >The intelligent touch screen allows you to set drying modes (Auto/Drying/Sterilizing) and time (1hour/2hour/3hour) according to different occasions and needs. Make your choice and enjoy the ease and convenience brought by Ranvoo.Easy to operate for satisfying your various requirements
column11:
>

In addition to the all-around safety features, Ranvoo is equipped with a sensor closely monitoring the temperature and triggering it to shut down when overheated. With Ranvoo, your safety is guaranteed.

Cast from a single block of premium aluminum, Ranvoo is immune to corrosion and rust, setting a bar of rigidity and durability for all towel warmers. The polished white stoving varnish makes it fashionable and compatible with any modern home decor.
column12: >Premium aluminum ensures long term usage
column15:
>Waterproof and stainless for a reliable, enduring use in bathroom

The IPX4 waterproof rating makes sure that the water or mist will not seep through to ruin the device and cause any hidden safety hazards. Ranvoo removes the dampness from your bathroom to ensure safe uses in a humid environment.​
column16: >Easy installation without damaging the wall
column17:
>

Without any troublesome drilling, you can attach the towel rack to your wall effortlessly. Follow the manual to complete the installation in minutes and start your great journey with Ranvoo immediately.

 

 

 

 

 

The bathrooms in many houses are small and damp, which causes the towels in the bathrooms to stay in a damp state for a long time, which is easy to breed bacteria and produce odors. Electric towel rack can solve this problem. However, traditional products have a very large volume and weight. It takes up a lot of space to install it in the bathroom, which is difficult to use. We think that the most reasonable design of the electric towel rack should have the same volume and convenience as a standard towel rack. We have adopted an unprecedented ""carbon fiber tube + fan + ultraviolet + infrared sensor""- an innovative technical solution that has reached the smallest volume on the market and does not take up young people's bathroom space. Its power is only 130W, and it only takes two hours to dry towels, while the power of other products is at least 200W and the drying time is as long as 3 to 4 hours. Each time it is used, it can save at least 0.34 kWh of electricity compared to other products.

Our R&
column18:
D team has done more than 50 air duct simulations, produced more than 30 prototypes, and verified 8 different solutions. Finally, 15 months later, we were able to launch our products on Kickstarter. 

 

Hot air blowing from the top of the rack for rapid drying

The constant temperature of 131-149°F (55-65℃) during the drying process

Intelligent sensor to avoid superfluous exposure of UVC

Follow the manual to complete the installation in minutes and start your great journey with Ranvoo immediately.     The bathrooms in many houses are small and damp, which causes the towels in the bathrooms to stay in a damp state for a long time, which is easy to breed bacteria and produce odors. Electric towel rack can solve this problem. However, traditional products have a very large volume and weight. It takes up a lot of space to install it in the bathroom, which is difficult to use. We think that the most reasonable design of the electric towel rack should have the same volume and convenience as a standard towel rack. We have adopted an unprecedented ""carbon fiber tube + fan + ultraviolet + infrared sensor""- an innovative technical solution that has reached the smallest volume on the market and does not take up young people's bathroom space. Its power is only 130W, and it only takes two hours to dry towels, while the power of other products is at least 200W and the drying time is as long as 3 to 4 hours. Each time it is used, it can save at least 0.34 kWh of electricity compared to other products.Our R&D team has done more than 50 air duct simulations, produced more than 30 prototypes, and verified 8 different solutions. Finally, 15 months later, we were able to launch our products on Kickstarter.  Hot air blowing from the top of the rack for rapid dryingThe constant temperature of 131-149°F (55-65℃) during the drying processIntelligent sensor to avoid superfluous exposure of UVC",47.0,3,"1 Campaign

column1: We are Team ESTEEM from Heriot-Watt University, a student team participating in the world’s largest design and construction competition, the Solar Decathlon Middle East (SDME). Our aim is to build an innovative house of the future powered solely with solar energy.

We are the only UK entry with an additional 18 worldwide universities also taking part. Our innovative house is powered solely with solar energy and is structurally made from locally grown Scottish timber panels (a UK first), alongside other ground breaking technologies including AI integration and intelligent cooling solutions. The competition will run in conjunction with Expo2021 in Dubai, an event with an estimated 15-25 million visitors, showcasing cutting-edge new technologies and designs from across the globe.

Our home is made from Cross Laminated Timber (CLT) panels, made for the first time EVER in a Scottish factory using Scottish timber! We hope to justify the extended implementation of CLT construction throughout the UK, while promoting local industry and reducing carbon emissions from timber transportation.

The prefabricated home will be shipped from Edinburgh and assembled in Dubai in November 2021. Our home focuses on intelligent selection of natural, recyclable materials enhanced by smart technology to reduce energy use.

The core team has over 100 student members, who are divided into a number of sub-teams, each taking responsibility for the development of a particular aspect of the project. This includes renewable energy systems, architecture, construction, sponsorship, social media and and services design among several others. Team members meet collectively on a weekly basis to share progress, discuss challenges and agree next steps.

To deliver the house to Dubai to take part in the competition we are reliant on support from industry partners, academia and the public. Below are the cost centres for which the team urgently needs funding to complete the project:
• Cost of Green eco-friendly, natural renewable Hemp insulation - £5k.
• Cost of landscaping and green walling solutions - £5k.
All additional funding will be utilised to subsidise the transportation costs of shipping the house and students to Dubai to take part in the competition!

The project challenges all those involved to work dynamically with consideration of sustainability and the future. Furthermore, the project involves significant industrial outreach, allowing students to network and showcase their abilities to develop relationships into the future – all skills Heriot-Watt encourages and endorses.

The student founders of Team ESTEEM have been working on this project since March 2019. Our name evokes a global sense of pride and ambition in what we are trying to achieve with our participation in the SDME.

With the COVID pandemic delaying the Solar Decathlon by a year and restricting all access to the university, it has been very tough working on the project for the past year. Delays in manufacturing and material delivery has slowed our production but the team continued to push through and we are now in the process of manufacturing our CLT panels and beams! We will begin construction of our house on campus in Edinburgh, with shipment to Dubai taking place later in the summer.

We appreciate any size of donation you can offer, but there are other ways you can help too! Following our social media channels helps boost awareness of our profile across the globe, so tell a friend you're helping our team!
We would like to say thank you for reading our proposal, and we hope you will continue to follow our journey to Dubai and beyond!
To keep up to date with our progress, be sure to connect via:
We are proud to be sponsored by the companies that believe in our vision and determination to make a difference!

The RE:GEN Bike by Energym is the world's first smart fitness bike that converts your workout into clean, usable energy.  The electrical power you create while working out gets stored in a portable battery that can power your devices - called The Ohm. One workout on this patent-pending bike can harness enough energy to power your home office for a day!
column3:
/>

You can ride the RE:GEN on your own, or tap into the Energym app where you can track your workouts and access virtual classes, personalised workouts, and the online rider community. Plus, the RE:GEN partners with Sweatcoin so you can turn your pedal power into purchasing power with exclusive discounts on a range of brands!

column2: >100 of Gymshark’s staff sprinted for 1 minute on the RE:GEN which, lit up their 15ft Christmas tree for over 2 weeks.

column1: Consistency is one of the main struggles most people have with working out. It’s easy to become a victim of 'seasonal fitness',  'New Year, New Me', or 'Summer Body' and then revert to your old habits once the initial hype has ended.

The RE:GEN gives you fitness incentives like no other workout program. The Energym app empowers you to reach your fitness goals effortlessly with classes and personalised workouts. Sweatcoins reward you for exercising, and the bike captures the power you have created, helping you to directly positively impact your carbon footprint without completely changing how you live.

Plus the bike is right at home! You never have to drive to the gym to get your workout in.

Everytime you ride your RE:GEN, your Sweatcoin Wallet in the Energym app tracks how many sweatcoins you earn from your workout. You can spend your sweatcoins in the Energym Marketplace within the Energym App to redeem exclusive rewards and discounts on digital subscriptions, exercise gear, and much more!

We all know working out has amazing benefits, but until now, it’s been a waste of energy.

Before the RE:GEN, a lot of the energy exerted during exercise would be wasted as heat. You’d expend hundreds of hours exercising every year and get nothing tangible in return. With the RE:GEN, you can harness your own power and use it to charge your devices throughout the day.
column2:
/>

The Ohm stores the clean energy you generate during each workout so you can use it to charge your phone, laptop, toothbrush, and more!
column3:
/>

The Ohm battery is the size of a water bottle and holds up to 100Wh of clean energy.
column4:
/>

The LED lights transform into a live power meter that displays your Functional Threshold Power (FTP) while you ride. It has 500 watts of potential power with 2 built-in USB ports.

For additional charging ports, you can add on a snap-on power extender that lets you charge up to 5 devices simultaneously​! The extender adds 3 USB-C outlets and 1 USB-A outlet, and you can use the USB-A outlet on the Ohm. We're also currently working on an AC inverter adapter you can connect to the Ohm to power appliances in the future, along with the ability to use it with your eBike.

 You can also add on a smaller battery unit called the Mini Ohm, for on-the-go power!
column5:
/> 

 

The RE:GEN measures Functional Threshold Power (FTP) which is the highest average power you can maintain for an hour measured in watts.

Both the battery and app display a real-time visual power meter as you exercise. The battery’s LED display glows in a range of colours, according to what 'power zone' you’re in.
column6:
/>

This is custom to you and also changes as you get fitter over time!

Your Workout Summary records data from every workout so you can see Active Minutes, Calories Burned, and Energy Generated!

 

Have fun getting in shape with multiple games to choose from. We have a live battle mode and racing game that enables users to race around a track, throw resistance ‘shells’ and earn boosts, similar to Mario Kart. These “resistance shells” will affect other players’ resistance remotely!
column7:
/>

The sleek, matte black bike is only L 46.5”x W 20.5” x H 42”, more than 10 inches smaller than Peloton and 25 inches shorter than NordicTrack yet it still fits you perfectly. Put it in your office, bedroom or home gym without rearranging your entire home.

Get in Shape at Home

With RE:GEN in your home, you can get in the best shape of your life. You have no excuses. There’s no time wasted driving to the gym or missing your class, you can fit your workout in any time you’re at the house for 30 minutes.

Generate Your Own Power During an Outage

When there’s a storm or outage, you don’t have to worry. The RE:GEN makes you energy independent with the ability to power your essential devices just by riding. We’re also working on an A/C adapter so you’ll be able to power appliances with your Ohm Battery soon!

Save Money on Power &
column8:
Purchases

You save money on your power bill by powering your devices with electricity generated from your workouts. You'll also save money on products you’d purchase anyway with our exclusive Sweatcoin rewards, available in the Energym Marketplace.

Train for Your Races

Get time on the seat rain or shine. The RE:GEN is the perfect companion for road bikers looking to train at a more professional level. You’ll get seriously challenged on this bike and set yourself up for success on the road.
column9:
/>

Many people want to get in shape and are passionate about fighting climate change, they just don’t know where to begin. They can’t find the time to workout or they can’t stay consistent. They see the forest fires, dying reefs, and insurmountable ocean pollution, but they feel it’s too big to tackle or make a difference.

Our mission at Energym is to empower you to be your healthiest and fight climate change from the comfort of your own home. Every time you workout on the RE:GEN, you improve your physical fitness and reduce your dependence on electricity generated by fossil fuels and natural gases.

The energy you generate powers your home office for a day, but what about the collective energy of all RE:GEN riders? Could it power buildings or even cities? What if entire countries ran off their own recycled energy? That’s our goal at Energym and we’re excited for you to be a part of it.

Take your seat in the race for our planet.

New to Indiegogo? No problem. Follow these simple steps to get your own RE:GEN.

At the end of the campaign, we’ll send you a survey to get your shipping information and deliver your RE:GEN when manufacturing is complete!

International Buyers – Please Note: Import duties, taxes, and charges are not included in the item price or shipping cost. These charges are the buyer’s responsibility. Please check with your country’s customs office to determine what your additional costs will be prior to buying.

Final shipping costs will be calculated post-campaign.

 

 

Commercial Enquiries please visit: www.energym.io

The FYTA Beam is a small sensor that connects your plants with your smartphone so you know when they need more water, fertilizer, or a different ambience. 

 

 

How does the FYTA Beam work?

The FYTA Beam measures critical factors for a plant’s wellbeing, including
column5:
>- temperature. 

 

Just insert it into the soil next to your plant and install the FYTA app – intelligent insights will be sent your way instantly via Bluetooth.

 

 

The FYTA Beam will seamlessly monitor the plant’s living conditions to ensure that it stays within the correct limits for the type of plant that you have. And when it’s time for action, you’ll get a simple notification on you App. No more guess work, lots more “it works!”.

If you have several plants, you can connect several FYTA Beams via Bluetooth with each other to create a network of up to 100m transmission range.

 

 

The FYTA Beam: better than smart

We couldn’t find a smart sensor that worked the way we wanted it to. Many existing sensors only measure one or two important parameters, have little design functionality, or are so badly designed that they look like they crash-landed from Planet Fugly. We wanted to do a better job!

 


 

This is what makes our FYTA Beam different from other plant sensors:
column6: >- Discrete: The FYTA Beam is small and has a reflective glass casing. It almost disappears in your planter.
column7: >- Eco-friendly: It’s powered by a built-in solar cell that extends the life of the CR battery every day. All components are detachable so they can be recycled separately.
column8: >- Accurate: It measures voltage across the entire length of its stainless-steel probes. This way it collects more data and calculates highly reliable values.
column9: >- Adjustable: Have large plants? No problem. The probes are detachable and will be available in different lengths.
column10: >-  Customizable: Fancy a different feel? There will be different casing colors and designs available soon.
column11:
> - Good value: Did you know that many of our houseplants could easily outlast us if they received proper care? The FYTA Beam probably costs as little as your phone case  -  and is packed with really smart technology that will make your plants last longer.  

 

 

 

 

​

 

 

 

The FYTA App: more than a messenger 

The FYTA App does more than just check on your plants and nudge you in the right direction – it digs up a whole host of smart insights to help your relationship flourish in new ways:

column1: - Plant identification: Do you know what plants you actually have? No? Well, the app is here to help you identify them!
- The FYTA plant library: Our plant library  includes plant care instructions for all common houseplants. It keeps all plant information handy and in one place. Simple.

column2: > - Virtual Garden: Create personal profiles for your plants and organize them in a virtual garden. Perfect if you have many to look after!
> - Customized notifications: Let your plants nudge you whenever they need something or simply choose how often you’d like to hear from your plants.
> - Tutorials: Enjoy fun tutorials that show you how to take better care of your plants. You’ll even learn how to make plant babies. Yes, you read that right.

column1:
All of these features come together to help you do one spectacular thing: better understand your plants and eventually connect with them device-free. 

 

Here is a sneak peek of our App:

Click picture to open an interactive demo reel of the FYTA App

 

The FYTA Base: check on your plants while you’re away

 

Leaving your beloved plants behind? Don’t fret. With the FYTA Base, it’s easy to check in on them while you’re away and share care instructions with a friend or neighbor, for instance via email.

The FYTA Base is a WiFi hub that
column2: >- connects all of your FYTA Beams to your home WiFi network, extending their range way further.
column3: >- helps you manage multiple sensors with greater ease and security.
column4: >- constantly monitors all FYTA Beams and uploads data to a secure cloud, allowing you to access critical insights whenever, wherever.
column5: >-  provides better notification and sharing options  through the FYTA App.
column6:
> 

 

Prototyping

 

We’ve been working for over 12 months on creating the FYTA eco-system: The FYTA Beam, The FYTA Base, the App and the cloud back-end. 

Developing the FYTA Beam was fun but challenging. A few things were straight-forward such as building  an NTC-Thermistor into the microcontroller to measure temperature. In order to measure light intensity, we chose to use the current generated by a solar cell instead a  photoiode ( which is commonly used). This  approach helps to to prolong battery life. The most challenging part was to develop a capacitive soil moisture sensor which also measures the salinity of the soil. Finally, we had to figure out how to have the sensors interact in a Bluetooth Mesh Network. 

Over time we built several generations of sensors to test different aspects of the electronics and the Bluetooth communication. The following picture shows several of our prototypes: 



 

Eventually, over the course of months and three generations of prototypes, the FYTA Beam became what it is today. In this video, our engineer Jacob is demonstrating the basic functionality of the sensor within a Mesh network with the help of a third party Bluetooth application.
column8:
showinfo=0"">

 

Another important part of the process was the parameter calibration which we did with the help of a solar simulator (for light intensity). To calibrate the soil parameter, we used an array of soil samples with fixed values for moisture and salinity to derive the interdependency of both parameters. Finally, we compared our results with measurements taken with highly sensitive, professional measurement devices. 

 

 

Current Status and Next Steps

Hardware development and programming is now complete. We have visited several manufactures in China and entered into an early stage cooperation with an experienced high-quality producer. 

 

We have a demo version of the App and are now working on connecting the devices to the FYTA App and FYTA server (about 50% done).  We are aiming at completing this stage by end-July to have sufficient time for further testing and calibrations before we order the first batch of products.

 

Why Indiegogo?

 

We have sufficient funds to complete the development process of the FYTA Beam. We have successfully collected funds on Kickstarter to finance the tools required for mass production with our manufacturing partner and run a test production of the alpha units. We are now taking pre-orders for the first production batch which we like to deliver to a dedicated group of early adopters that help us

· to improve the FYTA Beam eco-system with the help of your feedback.

· to connect people to plants all over the world!

 

 

 

As seen in

 

Let's grow the FYTA community together

 

Please help us grow the FYTA community. Click on a button below and spread some plant love.
column10:
description="" rel=""noopener nofollow"">

 

Perks

Our perks include the following products:

The FYTA Beam System

The FYTA Beam System consists of the FYTA Beam, the FYTA App and the optional FYTA Base. Our rewards include single Beams, as well as three different bundles (Plant Lover, Plant Addict, and Plant Nerd) to meet different needs.

 

 

Soil pH Test Kit

Plants need to sit in the right potting mix to to grow and thrive. If your plants sits in wrong or poor quality soil, even the most accurate measurements and best care schedule won't prevent your plant from stunting. This is why each perk will come with a complimentary soil pH test kit. This test kit will help you to determine whether your plant needs different soil. The FYTA App will lead you through the process and advise you.

 

 

Our Team

 

Berlin-based, but with an otherworldly vision. We are FYTA, and we develop inventive, intuitive and cool products for a new generation of indoor gardeners.

FYTA was founded in 2018 by Claudia Nassif and Sylvie Basler. We are two passionate plant lovers who failed to find the products and insights we needed to create our own urban jungles at home. So we decided to develop them ourselves, for us and others who may struggle to keep these wondrous green creatures alive and happy.

 

Before embarking on this journey, Claudia and Sylvie held executive positions in large international companies. Together, they combine over forty years of experience in finance, management, product development, branding and design. Their work today is supported by an international team of plant scientists, developers, designers and creatives. 

","The FYTA Beam is a small sensor that connects your plants with your smartphone so you know when they need more water, fertilizer, or a different ambience.   How does the FYTA Beam work?The FYTA Beam measures critical factors for a plant’s wellbeing, including  - soil moisture- nutrition levels- light intensity and - temperature.  Just insert it into the soil next to your plant and install the FYTA app – intelligent insights will be sent your way instantly via Bluetooth.  The FYTA Beam will seamlessly monitor the plant’s living conditions to ensure that it stays within the correct limits for the type of plant that you have. And when it’s time for action, you’ll get a simple notification on you App. No more guess work, lots more “it works!”.If you have several plants, you can connect several FYTA Beams via Bluetooth with each other to create a network of up to 100m transmission range.  The FYTA Beam: better than smartWe couldn’t find a smart sensor that worked the way we wanted it to. Many existing sensors only measure one or two important parameters, have little design functionality, or are so badly designed that they look like they crash-landed from Planet Fugly. We wanted to do a better job!  This is what makes our FYTA Beam different from other plant sensors: - Discrete: The FYTA Beam is small and has a reflective glass casing. It almost disappears in your planter.- Eco-friendly: It’s powered by a built-in solar cell that extends the life of the CR battery every day. All components are detachable so they can be recycled separately. - Accurate: It measures voltage across the entire length of its stainless-steel probes. This way it collects more data and calculates highly reliable values.- Adjustable: Have large plants? No problem. The probes are detachable and will be available in different lengths. -  Customizable: Fancy a different feel? There will be different casing colors and designs available soon.  - Good value: Did you know that many of our houseplants could easily outlast us if they received proper care? The FYTA Beam probably costs as little as your phone case  -  and is packed with really smart technology that will make your plants last longer.      ​   The FYTA App: more than a messenger The FYTA App does more than just check on your plants and nudge you in the right direction – it digs up a whole host of smart insights to help your relationship flourish in new ways:

column1: - Plant identification: Do you know what plants you actually have? No? Well, the app is here to help you identify them!
- The FYTA plant library: Our plant library  includes plant care instructions for all common houseplants. It keeps all plant information handy and in one place. Simple.
- Virtual Garden: Create personal profiles for your plants and organize them in a virtual garden. Perfect if you have many to look after!
- Customized notifications: Let your plants nudge you whenever they need something or simply choose how often you’d like to hear from your plants.
- Tutorials: Enjoy fun tutorials that show you how to take better care of your plants. You’ll even learn how to make plant babies. Yes, you read that right.

All of these features come together to help you do one spectacular thing: better understand your plants and eventually connect with them device-free.  Here is a sneak peek of our App:Click picture to open an interactive demo reel of the FYTA App The FYTA Base: check on your plants while you’re away Leaving your beloved plants behind? Don’t fret. With the FYTA Base, it’s easy to check in on them while you’re away and share care instructions with a friend or neighbor, for instance via email.The FYTA Base is a WiFi hub that - connects all of your FYTA Beams to your home WiFi network, extending their range way further. - helps you manage multiple sensors with greater ease and security. - constantly monitors all FYTA Beams and uploads data to a secure cloud, allowing you to access critical insights whenever, wherever. -  provides better notification and sharing options  through the FYTA App.   Prototyping We’ve been working for over 12 months on creating the FYTA eco-system: The FYTA Beam, The FYTA Base, the App and the cloud back-end. Developing the FYTA Beam was fun but challenging. A few things were straight-forward such as building  an NTC-Thermistor into the microcontroller to measure temperature. In order to measure light intensity, we chose to use the current generated by a solar cell instead a  photoiode ( which is commonly used). This  approach helps to to prolong battery life. The most challenging part was to develop a capacitive soil moisture sensor which also measures the salinity of the soil. Finally, we had to figure out how to have the sensors interact in a Bluetooth Mesh Network. Over time we built several generations of sensors to test different aspects of the electronics and the Bluetooth communication. The following picture shows several of our prototypes:  Eventually, over the course of months and three generations of prototypes, the FYTA Beam became what it is today. In this video, our engineer Jacob is demonstrating the basic functionality of the sensor within a Mesh network with the help of a third party Bluetooth application.   Another important part of the process was the parameter calibration which we did with the help of a solar simulator (for light intensity). To calibrate the soil parameter, we used an array of soil samples with fixed values for moisture and salinity to derive the interdependency of both parameters. Finally, we compared our results with measurements taken with highly sensitive, professional measurement devices.   Current Status and Next StepsHardware development and programming is now complete. We have visited several manufactures in China and entered into an early stage cooperation with an experienced high-quality producer.  We have a demo version of the App and are now working on connecting the devices to the FYTA App and FYTA server (about 50% done).  We are aiming at completing this stage by end-July to have sufficient time for further testing and calibrations before we order the first batch of products. Why Indiegogo? We have sufficient funds to complete the development process of the FYTA Beam. We have successfully collected funds on Kickstarter to finance the tools required for mass production with our manufacturing partner and run a test production of the alpha units. We are now taking pre-orders for the first production batch which we like to deliver to a dedicated group of early adopters that help us· to improve the FYTA Beam eco-system with the help of your feedback.· to connect people to plants all over the world!   As seen in Let's grow the FYTA community together Please help us grow the FYTA community. Click on a button below and spread some plant love.  PerksOur perks include the following products:The FYTA Beam SystemThe FYTA Beam System consists of the FYTA Beam, the FYTA App and the optional FYTA Base. Our rewards include single Beams, as well as three different bundles (Plant Lover, Plant Addict, and Plant Nerd) to meet different needs.  Soil pH Test KitPlants need to sit in the right potting mix to to grow and thrive. If your plants sits in wrong or poor quality soil, even the most accurate measurements and best care schedule won't prevent your plant from stunting. This is why each perk will come with a complimentary soil pH test kit. This test kit will help you to determine whether your plant needs different soil. The FYTA App will lead you through the process and advise you.  Our Team Berlin-based, but with an otherworldly vision. We are FYTA, and we develop inventive, intuitive and cool products for a new generation of indoor gardeners.FYTA was founded in 2018 by Claudia Nassif and Sylvie Basler. We are two passionate plant lovers who failed to find the products and insights we needed to create our own urban jungles at home. So we decided to develop them ourselves, for us and others who may struggle to keep these wondrous green creatures alive and happy. Before embarking on this journey, Claudia and Sylvie held executive positions in large international companies. Together, they combine over forty years of experience in finance, management, product development, branding and design. Their work today is supported by an international team of plant scientists, developers, designers and creatives.",24.0,1,"1 Campaign

column2:
>Meet Soleman

Nowadays technology is taking over. There are separate gadgets for every possible occasion, work, productivity and leisure. With Soleman you only need to have 1 Gadget!
column3:
>

 This unique notepad is equipped with multiple solar panels both on the outside and inside, wireless power bank, global Wifi Hotspot, fully eco-friendly paper and high end fabric.
column4:
>Compact and Powerful

Soleman will be your portable Working Station on the Go. Thanks to its unique design and productive features with Soleman you will always have what you need. It is perfect for portable and on the go work.

Thanks to its design Soleman will always be charged for you. In just 1 hour of solar light your Soleman will be charged for up to 3800 mAh. Don’t bother, take Soleman with you and you would not even notice how fast you are juiced to the fullest!
column5:
>Charge Anything!!!

Soleman has enough power to charge up to 5 devices simultaneously. The 12000 mAh battery will ensure that not only you but your friends will have charge in Your essential devices.

Thanks to the universal magnetic cable that comes with your Soleman you can make sure that all type of devices will be charged. Rotating connector design allows to more comfortable usage.
column6:
>

The Magnetic Connector Cable, makes Soleman applicable to Apple, Android and Windows devices. 1 Soleman can charge all possible devices. The Soleman will be there in the time of need.

column1:
Compared to the Qi chargers, Soleman has a clear edge. With the custom developed extended power profile the Soleman gives wireless charging twice faster than most Qi chargers available in the market.

Soleman brings fully functioning surface of QI! Put your stuff on any part of the surface and get your charge within counted minutes. All of the surface is your charging pad!
column3:
>Wifi everywhere

With Soleman no more delayed Skype calls, canceled downloads or uncomfortable cellular payment.  The embed Hotspot would ensure you always have that internet connection in the time of need.
column4:
>High End Materials

As a fabric, Soleman is made from moisture-wicking, antibacterial, easily blended and degradable material. The special natural fabric is durable. The colour of Soleman is made for everyone so it can match with all clothes and outfits.

Top notch design solutions as well as durable materials in the inside make Soleman a thing of beauty. Equipped with, eco-friendly paper, multiple pockets, 5 solar panels and 12000 mAh li-ion batteries.
column6:
>Timeline

 The idea, concept, prototyping and the production stages has been a challenge for us all, however after the sleepless nights and so much effort we are finally at this stage of our journey. Join us as you can help us to make into reality.

Imagine being multilingual and traveling around the world without a language barrier, rapidly markdown words you read in books, or recording all content of the conversation to improve language learning and work efficiency. It might have been a dream before, but not anymore! Boeleo can help you understand and speak any language you want! Translate any words or sentences in a foreign language you hear or see on paper, screen, or anything you can take a photo of. Travel? International trade? Language learning? Take Boeleo with you, and language barrier is no more.
What’s unique about Boeleo that makes it stand out from other translation pens is as follows:
• It’s the first of its kind that is 4G compatible
so you can have that translation capability with you on the move, abroad or anywhere you            want to go
• It has the largest data memory of 1GB RAM +16GB storage
which means a much higher speed of translation and access to saved data
others could easily cost you more than $200USD while falling short on versatility of                         functions

The default translate mode is scan. When the nib senses the right amount of pressure, it seamlessly captures every letter and outputs accurate translation neatly paralleling the scan. There are 11 languages supported in offline mode. It can scan and translate even if it is disconnected from the Internet.

With a 23mm macro camera at 120FPS, Boeleo captures words once the scanner crosses the words. No matter how quickly you scan, Boeleo can capture every letter and record it on the screen. Once scanning finishes, Boeleo translates and reads the translation for you instantly.
Boeleo is not limited to scanning and translating words on papers. Screens of mobile phones, tablets like iPads, laptops and computers can also be scanned.
Click on a single word in the sentence, you can understand and learn the meaning of the word and its pronunciation. Improve the efficiency of language learning.
Scan words, sentences, paragraphs, or even pages you’d like to excerpt and have them immediately converted to text stored on Boeleo. You can download it on a laptop and edit it anytime you want.

Boeleo covers 116 languages in online mode. When connected to the internet via WIFI or 4G cellular (compatible with 200 countries’ SIM cards), Boeleo takes just seconds to translate and read aloud, ensuring Zero Barrier communication at work, in meetings, or while traveling. With Boeleo, you can be a “multilingual speaker.”

Do you want to translate road signs, menu, packaging in the blink of an eye without typing the words on a translator? Why not take a photo of it using Boeleo and have it automatically translated for you? Boeleo has an other embedded 500M pixel camera at the back of the screen. Simply snap a photo, and Boeleo will show the translation directly on the screen or on the saved pictures.

Boeleo can achieve 98%+ accuracy when connected to WiFi or 4G network, as it can reach and apply the online translation engines such as Google translate and iFlytek translate. You can become a “native speaker” without learning the language!

Boeleo is not restricted to a translator. It is also a durable recorder. With one click, you can focus on the business meeting, interview and lecture. It is compatible with up to 128G memory cards to save a high volume of content. Feel free to export, listen, make notes, and share afterward.

Boeleo Intelligent Co., Ltd advocates to the principle of continuous technological innovation and the pursuit of continuous improvement of product experience. The company is committed to providing global users with more fashionable, advanced, more intelligent, relaxed, and interesting products.

The company is committed to the design, development, production, and sales of AI intelligent terminal products (including intelligent speakers, intelligent robots, intelligent learning machines, intelligent cloud translators, intelligent scanning dictionary pens, etc.). At present, the main products of the company are intelligent translators and scanning dictionary pens. With the intelligent technology brand, Boeleo serves as global intelligent product enthusiasts, and brings conveniences, and provides intelligent hardware to branded companies and business friends.

column8:
>

Most ocean plastic comes from developing nations where no recycling infrastructure exists.

Via Plastic Bank we pay collectors “Social Plastic” premium rates (3 to 5 times the market value) ensuring them a consistent a liveable income in underprivileged communities in Haiti, Brazil, Philippines and Indonesia.
column9:
>

This empowers the recycling ecosystems around the world, driving responsible economic development in underprivileged communities and reducing the flow of plastic into our oceans.

column41: >We know that Indiegogo projects are not known for complying with timelines, but we promise we will do our best to actually stick to what we are declaring and if something does not go according to plan, we will promptly tell you.
column45:
>Transparency and Impact 

In the design of REBO we engaged a wide range of stakeholders to receive their views and feedback and make the best product that delivers the greatest impact. We followed the guidelines and requirements of the Gold Standard for a stakeholder consultation process. If you have questions or comments regarding REBO, please let us know at hello@rebo-bottle.com. The project description and certification documents are available on the Gold Standard Registry.

column2: >Help us get to 50,000 and NOW A NEW PERK!!!

column1: FEATURES NEW LIGHT SENSOR, with automatic turn on when it goes dark!
USE IT IN YOUR GARDEN OR YARD!
Keep it by your window and it will light up when the sun goes down!

This particular Solar Helix-LS Model was used in the famous  MIT Technology Festival Light Installation and the OZY FEST NY CENTRAL PARK. Designed by Artist Vanessa Hooper, to share awareness of how we all have the power to do something about climate change!! The Original SolarPuff was made to replace kerosene lanterns in regions with out electricity. NOW YOU can create CHANGE One light at a time! AND you can also help a family in need in Puerto Rico when you buy a light for yourself! The Light Sensor Helix is not out in the market yet and this is the first time this product is available!!!
Light Forest with Light Sensor HELIX : The Helix LS is not out on the market yet and was only used in this stunning light art installation that has traveled from Boston to New York Central Park!

Now you can have one for your garden or home and also give light to the 1.5 Million people who are living with out electricity in Puerto Rico! Use the Helix-LS to light your gardens at night! hang them anywhere! They will turn on by themselves!!
Solar Flat Pack Cube with Light Sensor Helix LS by Solight
3 Settings, low, high, and blinking settings, Light sensor setting is activated when you push the power button down and hold for 3 seconds.
up to 8-12hrs of light on full charge
Buy a Solight for yourself + Give a light to Puerto Rico.

This lady is holding the Helix in her hand and can move around her house in Puerto Rico with a light that needs no batteries, just the SUN! She had no light for two months and was constantly trying to find batteries, for her flashlight, now she just needs her Solight Helix!

By contributing one light to Puerto Rico you are helping a whole family. Right now less than 50% of the island has power. During our recent visit we went into the hills just 15 minutes outside of San Juan and no houses had power. Many of the elderly living alone have been locked in with no light when the sun goes down.  Through our partnerships with The Clinton Foundation, Mayor Yulin Cruz, Third Wave Volunteers, Solar4PR and Operation Blessings, Studio Unite has provided over 14,000 lights to Puerto Rico. Our goal is to send  another 10,000 lights now and another 10,000 and then another for as long as it takes to light up Puerto Rico.
Take a look at original video of Mayor Yulin Cruz and Clinton with inventor Alice Chun of Solight Design.
Right now there are 1.5 million people still living in the dark!
The power grid will not be fixed for at least 6 months and for some people it will take closer to a full year until they have electricity and light (if they're lucky).

One light from you can make a big difference to an entire family. Get a tax deduction for giving SolarPuffs(™)!  Studio Unite is a 501.c.3 and when you buy a perk with the GIVE option, you will automatically get a receipt that says this is a GIFT for families in need in Puerto Rico. Many of the people in Puerto Rico are our families and friends who have been through some of the worst traumas of their lives losing everything they own. A little light gives them hope. As Mayor Yulin Cruz of San Juan called the SolarPuffs(™)
column2: ”They are not just a cube of light but a cube of hope”.  Help us light up their world. AND YOUR WORLD!!!

column1: ""Buy one , Give One"" covers the cost of one light for you and one light that will be sent to Studio Unite, a 501.c.3, non profit organization and will be distributed by our charitable partners in Puerto Rico to families that have no light or Power RIGHT NOW!

column2: >When you choose Give SolarPuff(™), you do not receive a product. Only choose this option if you would like the selected number of lights to go to Puerto Rico's Hurricane Maria relief efforts.

column1: YOU can also buy a light for yourself, for friends or family or to use for outdoor activities in the New Year.
This is the TWILIGHT!! With red, blinking SOS, low white, and bright white settings!
The future of lighting is SOLAR, MOBILE, and ADAPTABLE to any situation! Solight Design's newest line of products: The small solar light called the Twilight!!

column2: >To learn more go to  Studio-Unite.org.

column1: 1. Buy the lights through our GIVE SolarPuff(™) program.
2. Your GIVE light goes directly to our non-profit partners who are distributing the lights in the rural areas of Puerto Rico.
Our non-profit partners are working actively on the ground to deliver them to where they are most needed.
When you choose Give SolarPuff(™), you do not receive a product. Only choose this option if you would like the selected number of lights to go directly to Puerto Rico.
Watch this short documentary film on Studio Unite and Solight Design's efforts in helping communities all over the world!
We need YOU to light up your hearts, your homes, and Puerto Rico!!

column3: showinfo=0"">Short documentary by Franklin Covey on Studio Unite and Solight Design!!

column1: Studio Unite has impacted over 200,000 people all over the world!
""The Risk of doing nothing is GREATER than the risk of being wrong...."" --Seth Godin
Some people simply can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:
• You can help get word out and make some noise! Please share our campaign with all your friends and family!

Buy a Solight for yourself + Give a light to Puerto Rico.

This lady is holding the Helix in her hand and can move around her house in Puerto Rico with a light that needs no batteries, just the SUN! She had no light for two months and was constantly trying to find batteries, for her flashlight, now she just needs her Solight Helix!

By contributing one light to Puerto Rico you are helping a whole family. Right now less than 50% of the island has power. During our recent visit we went into the hills just 15 minutes outside of San Juan and no houses had power. Many of the elderly living alone have been locked in with no light when the sun goes down.  Through our partnerships with The Clinton Foundation, Mayor Yulin Cruz, Third Wave Volunteers, Solar4PR and Operation Blessings, Studio Unite has provided over 14,000 lights to Puerto Rico. Our goal is to send  another 10,000 lights now and another 10,000 and then another for as long as it takes to light up Puerto Rico.
Take a look at original video of Mayor Yulin Cruz and Clinton with inventor Alice Chun of Solight Design.
Right now there are 1.5 million people still living in the dark!
The power grid will not be fixed for at least 6 months and for some people it will take closer to a full year until they have electricity and light (if they're lucky).

One light from you can make a big difference to an entire family. Get a tax deduction for giving SolarPuffs(™)!  Studio Unite is a 501.c.3 and when you buy a perk with the GIVE option, you will automatically get a receipt that says this is a GIFT for families in need in Puerto Rico. Many of the people in Puerto Rico are our families and friends who have been through some of the worst traumas of their lives losing everything they own. A little light gives them hope. As Mayor Yulin Cruz of San Juan called the SolarPuffs(™)
column2: ”They are not just a cube of light but a cube of hope”.  Help us light up their world. AND YOUR WORLD!!!

column1: Buy one , Give One"" covers the cost of one light for you and one light that will be sent to Studio Unite, a 501.c.3, non profit organization and will be distributed by our charitable partners in Puerto Rico to families that have no light or Power RIGHT NOW!
When you choose Give SolarPuff(™), you do not receive a product. Only choose this option if you would like the selected number of lights to go to Puerto Rico's Hurricane Maria relief efforts.
YOU can also buy a light for yourself, for friends or family or to use for outdoor activities in the New Year.
This is the TWILIGHT!! With red, blinking SOS, low white, and bright white settings!
The future of lighting is SOLAR, MOBILE, and ADAPTABLE to any situation! Solight Design's newest line of products: The small solar light called the Twilight!!
To learn more go to  Studio-Unite.org.
1. Buy the lights through our GIVE SolarPuff(™) program.
2. Your GIVE light goes directly to our non-profit partners who are distributing the lights in the rural areas of Puerto Rico.
Our non-profit partners are working actively on the ground to deliver them to where they are most needed.
When you choose Give SolarPuff(™), you do not receive a product. Only choose this option if you would like the selected number of lights to go directly to Puerto Rico.
Watch this short documentary film on Studio Unite and Solight Design's efforts in helping communities all over the world!
We need YOU to light up your hearts, your homes, and Puerto Rico!!
Short documentary by Franklin Covey on Studio Unite and Solight Design!!
Studio Unite has impacted over 200,000 people all over the world!
The Risk of doing nothing is GREATER than the risk of being wrong...."" --Seth Godin
Some people simply can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:
You can help get word out and make some noise! Please share our campaign with all your friends and family!
Use the Indiegogo share tools!",11.0,3,"1 Campaign

column83:
>FAQ

About

What is it? GrowStrip is a smart indoor growing platform that brings bring data, community, automation, and programming to farmers, enthusiasts, researchers, and students around the world.

What is Grow Computer? Our company is called Grow Computer. We build smart platforms that support growers of all kinds.

How much does it cost? You can purchase a GrowStrip for only $450 on Indiegogo. But after the campaign, a GrowStrip will retail for $600.

What do we get when we order? One GrowStrip, one temperature/humidity sensor, and one mountable camera.

Why are you crowdfunding? We are on a mission to make indoor growing smarter, easier, and more accessible. To do this, we need your help in bringing to life not only GrowStrip, but Grow Computer. While the contributions we receive here on Indiegogo will help fund our initial production run, the community we build by launching on crowdfunding will help us develop more exciting products into the future.

 

Product Features

What features are available? Surge-protected power supply, power monitoring and control for eight individual outlets. Our app supports 3rd party integration, recipe building and sharing, and remote monitoring of any grow.

What colors do you offer? Just white for now, but we may add more in the future.

What sizes do you offer? Just one: 15.5"" x 3.6"" x 3.3""

What is it best used for? Farmers growing crops of any kind indoors, researchers and students experimenting with agriculture, hobby growers

Which option is best for me? You can buy a single GrowStrip for 35% off on Indiegogo right now. But two GrowStrips for 45% off is an even better deal. You can always give the extra one to a grower friend.

What kind of power does this support? Currently the GrowStrip will take 110v at 15 amps for a US based electrical outlet. But, If we hit our funding goals, we are going to open up other options for electrical systems

 

Tech Specs

How is this unique? GrowStrip works out of the box, letting you power, monitor, control, and automate any grow. No assembly, tools, or code required.

What are the dimensions? 15.5"" x 3.6"" x 3.3"" at the bottom end and 15.5"" x 5.1"" x 3.3"" on the top with mounting brackets

How does it work? Plug it in, plug in your grow controllers (lights, pumps, fans, or other devices), and sync your GrowStrip with the app over wifi. From there, you can use the GrowStrip app to monitor, control, and automate your grow from any phone, tablet, or computer.

What sensors does it come with? Every GrowStrip comes with a our basic temperature and humidity sensor, and a separate mountable camera. We have some exciting perks to unlock starting at our first stretch goal of 150 units sold.

Will there be updates to it in the future? Yes! We have big plans for GrowStrip. We will be releasing new sensors, peripherals, software, and ways to visualize data, third party integrations, and much more. 

How does it integrate with other connected devices? Through your wifi connection. Connect it with your Alexa, Google Home, or Apple Homekit. Connect it to your phone or computer.

 

About the App

How do I access it? The GrowStrip apps works on smartphone, tablet, and desktop via a webbrowser.

What smartphones/tablets is it for? iOS and Android.

When will the app be available? Early 2019, with delivery of the first units.

How does the device connect to the app? Through the magic of wifi and cloud computing.

What can we expect from the app? Manage individual parts of your grow, from power to any smart device. Share photos, build and download recipes, and automate your grow.

 

Setup

How do I set it up? Plug it in, connect it to your wifi through our app, and plug in your grow devices. That's it! You can also add any integrations with other smart devices through the app.

How do I control it? You can customize your growing settings using your the GrowStrip app or let it run automatically for optimal, consistent results.

 

Shipping

When does shipping begin? December 2018

When can we expect it to reach our doorsteps? First batch for the holidays 2018, subsequent batches each month following.

Where does it ship? Worldwide, pending local restrictions. You'll need a converter for non-US outlets.

How much is shipping? In general, Shipping is free to the US and Canada, $10 to the EU and UK, and $20 everywhere else. Please click on the pre-order options on the right-hand side to find the shipping that applies to you.

What are the risks &
column84:
challenges of getting the device today? We need to meet our funding goals to cover manufacturing and logistics costs. We've put together a realistic timeline and are certified by Arrow Electronics for our components and delivery timeline.

 

Customer Service

What is your refund policy? Refunds are available through Indiegogo at any time during the crowdfunding campaign. After that, you will need to email us at info@growcomputer.com for refunds on a case-by-case basis.

What is your return / exchange policy? If you received your product and you aren't satisfied, you may exchange it for a new one within 30 days, shipping and handling fees not included.

How do I choose more than one reward? To get more than one perk, please make a new contribution for each perk.

","As Seen On ""The days of plugging different system components into multiple power strips each with different timers is over""- Agritecture.com""GrowStrip offers a user-friendly way for growers of all kinds to make their grows smarter through a simple hardware and software platform.""- iGrow.News What Does It Do? GrowStrip lets you power, monitor, and control your entire grow from any digital device.With GrowStrip, you can automate your grow by programming timers and power modulation based on sensor readings. Every GrowStrip comes with an air quality sensor and camera for monitoring your grow. You can also use your own sensors and integrate with our API.  The eight programmable outlets include powerful surge protection. We included four USB ports for external sensors or any other USB devices. The First 'App for That' for Your GrowGrowStrip gives you access to your key growing information on any device, wherever you are.Get valuable information about light, temperature cycles, low water levels and more.Build recipes to automate your grow. Set alerts so you know how your grow is doing wherever you are. Access the Grow Computer app for iOS or Android, or just connect to your dashboard on any browser. How Does It Work? Simply plug any component from your grow into a GrowStrip outlet or USB port to give yourself full monitoring and power output control from the GrowStrip app.Use a smartphone, tablet, or desktop to manage your grow and track its power consumption.Build “if this, then that” recipes with your sensors and GrowStrip to produce optimal grows.  Why Indoor Growing is ImportantUrban populations are growing, bringing with them a growing need for high-quality, sustainably produced food.To meet global demand, the world needs more farmers, and farms that are more efficient than ever.We believe that indoor agriculture is the answer. Hydroponics, rooftop greenhouses, and vertical farms are proliferating in major cities and in people’s homes around the world. But, the available technology is still either prohibitively expensive or stuck in the 1980s.That’s where GrowStrip comes in. Our team at Grow Computer is developing a suite of devices that make indoor grows simple, smart, and bountiful. At the core of this system is GrowStrip, a single device for powering, monitoring, and interacting with the different parts of a grow.Our ultimate goal is to give any grower the technology to grow any plant, anywhere in the world. Our StoryGrow Computer grew out of the agtech communities in Brooklyn, NY, and the other in Sacramento, CA.Our Founders, Ian McEachern and Dan Nelson, met through MIT’s Open Agriculture Initiative, where they connected over a shared passion for empowering farmers, students, and growers around the world. They realized that, for the open agriculture movement itself to grow, they had to remove the need to know electrical, computer, and software engineering to get started.This is a photo of Dan’s “Personal Food Computer v2.0”. It cost over $3,000 to build, took 10 weeks to assemble, and NEVER WORKED. This experience was the driving force behind creating a simple, easy to use device that any grower can use out of the box.And so, Grow Computer was born....The rest of our team came together through New York’s dynamic agtech community and the urban farming co-working space AgTech X in Brooklyn. It was the amazing hard work and support from David, Dylan, Monti, Wythe, and Andrew that got us here today. Today our team is split between California and New York, two incredible states with rich agricultural and technological histories.  Under The HoodIn the box: Made In USAEvery GrowStrip pre-ordered during this campaign will be made domestically in the United States! From design to manufacturing, we’ve developed efficient processes and strong partner networks that allow us to produce locally.Use of FundsWe are raising $40,000 to get manufacturing started for GrowStrip.This will finance the first 100 units, and will get our assembly, testing, and packaging program off the ground.Additional contributions will be used to expand our production runs, finance marketing efforts, and grow our team so we can scale our operations and bring GrowStrip to the world. This is just the start of our journey, and we hope that you will join us.Spread The Word!Thank you for reading this far! We hope you are as excited as we are about GrowStrip. Please share our campaign with your agriculturally inclined friends, colleagues, and family. The more people that know about GrowStrip, the more more successful this campaign will be. With that success, we can show that indoor agriculture truly is the next agricultural revolution and the GrowStrip is at the forefront of it. FAQAboutWhat is it? column1: • I wish to change the way we think and drink tea with my revolutionary packaging concept that can be adapted to all loose leaf products.

• Think recycle and compost -  A tube, manufactured from recycled paper, (in the United States) holds fresh loose leaf.  The lid is a measuring devise and the plastic plug keeps contents secure.  This product contains no filters or sachets, no paper, no box or cellophane, no staples or strings.

• Think portable - Easily carry TeGo tubes in your purse, backpack or briefcase.  Great for work, camping and traveling.   Store tubes in a drawer or cabinet.  TeGo Tubes also take up minimal space on the grocery shelves.

• Think freshness -  Loose leaf is poured into each tube and the plastic plug secures the contents.  The contents will not run through a machine for making teabags.  There is no extensive handling of the loose leaf so exposure to light is very minimal.  The contents are kept dark and dry and can be kept fresh up to 1 year.

• TeGo Tubes are a simple but revolutionary concept developed (with a patent pending) by Becky Corbett.  The concept behind this idea is to be able to recycle and compost the whole product in order to create a zero waste scenario.  The added benefit to this concept is a more portable package which makes carrying, storing and displaying easier.  Less handling of the contents and a minimal exposure to processing allows the contents to stay fresher longer.   TeGo Tubes eliminate the need for filters, staples, paper, boxes, strings, cellophane and guessing.

• The United States sends only 34% of its waste into the recycling pool  I believe in the conservation of our resources and wish to contribute by making smaller footprints on this beautiful earth of ours.  This is my contribution.
• Becky at Bec's Tea is launching her first crowdfunding campaign.
• The money generated from the crowdfunding campaign will allow us to purchase our first printed TeGo Tubes.

I am asking for your help to get this great idea and campaign off the ground    This brilliant product/concept is ready for retail.   My goal is to raise $5,000.00 so that I can get my first TeGo Tubes printed.
Please help me to make a change in this industry with regard to packaging waste.    I want to create an awareness with our packaging concept and the benefits of recycling.

multi-functional (it supports power AND data), small and universally compatible.
